A gyerekek imádják az ilyesmit! A mondókák nem feltétlenül egy korosztálynak valók. De nem baj, hogy vannak nehéz szavak. Pont ez az érdekes a nyelvben: minden szó absztrakció. Amikor egy kisgyerek ráérez a beszéd ízére, sokszor azért ismételget egy szót, mert tetszik neki a hangzása. Addig mondogatja, amíg már szinte függetlenedik a jelentéstől, és csak a ritmus, a dallam, a kimondás öröme marad. A könyv szómágiás hangulata megragadó, és fejleszti a szókincset, ritmusérzéket is. Egy kis skandálás után mindegyik mondóka ritmusára rá lehet érezni. Van, ami nyelvtörőnek is beillik.  Érzem benne az apát, aki a gyerekével együtt fedezi fel újra a nyelv sokszínűségét. És persze az is lehet, hogy van benne olyan mondóka, ami csak apának fog tetszeni." (Stein Katalin, 5 éve anya)A könyv célja, hogy bátorságot adjon az apáknak a saját szójátékaik, mondókáik megalkotásához. Ez a könyv az Apa Könyvek első könyve. Mi az az Apa Könyvek?2018-ban lettem apa. Az elmúlt néhány évben, azt vettem észre, hogy az apák szeretnének jobban részt vállalni a gyermekük életében, de az igazság az, hogy nagyot változott a világ a mostani apák gyerekkora óta. A minták nagy része, amiket apáinktól kaptunk, már csak részben érvényesek, és vannak új helyzetek, amikre nem is kaphattunk mintát tőlük. Kissé magunkra hagyva keressük az utat, milyen az elég jó apa.Sokkal többet is tudok erről írni. Ha érdekel, akkor tobvábbi részleteket az Apa Könyvekről a blogunkban olvashatsz: https://apakonyvek.hu/mi-az-az-apa-konyvek/ Mit kapsz a támogatásodért?A támogatási összegtől függetlenül minden támogató kap egy példányt A Tarka című mondókás könyvből, ha a kampány összeg 50%át elérjük. Miért kell ez a kampány?Ennek a kampánynak az elsődleges célja, hogy A Tarka becsülettel megjelenhessen. Ehhez nagyjából 2 millió forintra van szükségünk. Másodlagos célként a következő könyvek előkészítését tűztem ki. Tehát a célként kitűzött 4 millió forint a következőkből áll össze:
A Tarka könyv grafikus tiszteletdíja (mert eddig ingyen dolgozott)
A Tarka könyv tördelő tiszteletdíja (mert eddig ingyen dolgozott)
E kampány marketingköltsége (mert valahogy hallanod kellett rólunk)
A Tarka könyv nyomdaköltsége (mert a könyv nem a fán terem)
A támogatásért küldött jutalmak postaköltsége (mert ezzel is számolnunk kell)
Tőkeképzés az Apa Könyvek további terveinek megvalósításához (mert rengeteg tervünk van)
Minden támogatást szívesen fogadunk, de bizonyos összegek felett jutalommal köszönjük meg az adományodat!A jutalmom postázásához fel kell vennünk veled a kapcsolatot, ezért a támogatás megadásakor járulj hozzá, hogy neved és e-mail címem továbbítodjon a Kampány tulajdonosának. Hosszú távú célok...Leírhatatlanul sok tervem és elképzelésem van. Nagyon sokféle könyvet szeretnék kiadni, amiben a természettudományos érdekességektől kezdve, a nevelési helyzetek bemutatása is jelen van. Érdemes a Facebook oldalunkat figyelni. Előkészületben van Pőc és a tengeri kaland című könyv, amiben az esti rutin keretében keveredik Pőc és apa egy tanulságos cápás kalandba.Jobban megismernél minket?Apa Könyvek Facebook oldalApa Könyvek HonlapGyakran ismételt kérdésekMiért 4 millió a cél? Rengetegnek tűnik.Hozzávetőlegesen a számok: A grafikai munka, 32 oldal esetén, 500.000 forint.  A nyomdai előkészítés 100.000 forint. 1000 db könyv nyomdai előállítása 600.000 forint. Az 1000 db postai küldése 500.000 forint. Ahhoz, hogy legyenek támogatók, hirdetni kell, erre 200.000 forintot számoltam. Így járunk 1,9 milliónál járunk. Ha 2000 darabot szeretnénk, akkor a nyomdai költség egyharmaddal nő, a postai költség duplázódik. És ezzel a kampánnyal szeretném a következő könyveket is megalapozni... Köszönöm, hogy végigolvastad.Sablik Henrik, 3 éve apa

story:
Anna is the inner child in me. Before May 2016 I didn’t pay much attention to her. She was of no importance to me. I was living my life with no clear direction, with low confidence, I didn’t believe what I want out of life is the right choice for me until the point I was encouraged to look for my inner child through method OCTO CODES.

A year later I feel like a different person - I am proud of Anna. I love my story and I found my unique voice. I feel so happy and I am ready to share my story in the book called “Grey coat. Yellow dress.”

What is the book about?

Content of the book: Anna has been living her life through her dreams. At the end of her day she returns to her flat from her dreary, monotonous work, throws off her grey coat and waits for sleep. In her dreams she experiences the joy of what her life could be, if only she was a different person. But one night, one special night she has three very different dreams which change her life forever...

If you decide to get the EBOOK “Grey coat. Yellow dress.” you will receive it by email on 25 December 2017 (when the campaign ends).

What I Need & What You Get?

I am offering an Ebook "Grey coat. Yellow dress".

WHERE WILL YOUR MONEY GO?

1.      Raising up to £6 000

As we live in a world where we pay for the services with the money - to PUBLISH hard copy of the book “Grey coat. Yellow dress.” in English and Slovakian will cost me around £6 000. I would also like my parents to have an opportunity to read this book as well as those living back home in Slovakia.

This will include:

Campaign Logistics - Running a crowd fund campaign incurs costs such as video production, design, transaction costs and fees with Indiegogo and payment platforms. (£1 000)

2.      Raising above £6000 will go towards creating my next project -  8 books as 8 stories for the inner child. These are based on the method "OCTO CODES = 8 styles" - created by the Czech fashion designer, Táňa Havlíčková,  who studied the connections between the way people dress and their personality...more on http://www.tanahavlickova.cz/kdo-jsem/ (use google translate as her work is only available in the Czech language). This unique methodology of OCTO CODES deserves to be shared and implemented in life, to help those, for whom it resonates, achieve a greater sense of joy.

If you need more details about my work connect with me through FB page/ Instagram: "stories for the inner child."

Risks & Challenges

I am very excited to share my passion for life with you through my book. I don't feel you are taking any risks. I see life as a path of exploration - of other people's work, hearing their views and enjoying their work - that is how I learn about life the most.

CALL FOR ACTION

There are few ways you can support me - words, thoughts or action :)

Thank you with all my heart for any kind of support you can give. If you cannot contribute financially please share this campaign via online platforms so it reaches the right people.

For an easier access this is the link that you can share:

https://igg.me/at/loveyourstory

YOUR financial support will directly contribute to printing the book "Grey coat.Yellow dress." -in English and Slovakian.

story:
Short Summary

This book is a rarity in women's studies and social activism. It introduces the biographies of fifty radical women of color activists from over 25 countries and territories. This eclectic collection show that 'Third World' females are active on a wide range of issues, from women's and children's health, to housing and labor rights, the environment and climate change. The life stories also establish that women in the Global South were some of the earliest feminist thinkers and writers in the world. Each life story refutes the common misrepresentation of Indigenous, African, Asian, Latina, Muslim, Dalit and other females as docile creatures in need of Western rescue.

What We Need & What You Get

We will use the funding to help promote and distribute this book:

  • We are looking to raise $500 that will be spent on posters, post cards and other promotional materials that will be mailed to publishers, schools and organizations
  • Be among the first to receive a copy of this unique and inspiring book!
  • If we do not reach our goal, we will use whatever is raised to promote the book

The Impact

The is the fourth book by Xpyr Press and  and your contribution will help to support independent publishing:

  • There are few books on 'Third World' women activists
  • This is our second crowdfunding campaign to launch a book on Indigo
  • Your support is deeply valued and appreciated

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Please help us to get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.
  • Please use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
Summary

I am a long-time Star Wars fan.  I saw the original in the theaters way back in 1977.

 

When Disney purchased the property from George Lucas, I was skeptical.  But I saw the trailer for Episode VII and was cautiously optimistic.  I went to see The Force Awakens.  I walked in anticipating the next Star Wars film.  I walked out not caring if I ever saw another.  What’s interesting to me now, however, is not the franchise itself.   But rather, all of the drama that surrounds it instead.  It’s clear to thinking people that the Golden Goose that was the Star Wars franchise is now being cooked.  I find the story of how the Star Wars franchise is in the process of imploding to be absolutely fascinating.  I’ve attempted to express my opinions on blogs, discussion forums, and comments sections.  However, because those venues are more often controlled by progressives, opinions contrary to their own are expectedly deleted and/or marked for spam.  So I’ve opened a blog as a way to publish contrary and perhaps unpopular opinions that are not allowed to be expressed in various online safe spaces.  That blog will provide the foundational research for this book.

 

Due to popular demand, I have opened a campaign to transform my blog into a book.  This campaign will fund the 6 to 9 months needed to collate and organize the pre-existing research as it exists on my blog, into a cohesive and coherent narrative.  Additional research and investigation will also take place during this time period.   Research to determine image usage and fair rights will also be ascertained.  During this time, my blog will also continue to chronicle events until The Rise of Skywalker leaves theaters.  The funds will also cover the IndieGoGo and Stripe percentages, cost of publication, shipping, packaging, etc.

 

The narrative of the book will be organized according to The Phases of the Geeker gate, which is really the most important finding to come out of all of this.  It can then serve as a tool for others seeking to fight Geeker Gates in their own hobbies.

 

Also, since Disney is notorious for their lawsuits, and Disney Star Wars is a knock-off version of genuine Star Wars anyway, I will be recreating certain images with photographs of knock-off Star Wars Action Figures, such as Ideal's STAR Team and others.

The completion of this book will put into record a fan's perspective of the events surrounding Disney's takeover of the Star Wars franchise.

 

This will serve as a nice souvenir or memento of the trials and tribulations that fans have endured over the past couple of years for the genuine Star Wars fan.

 

#DisneyStarWarsIsDumb

 

What We Need

 

To get this project rolling properly will require a minimum of $30,000 raised.

 

The Impact

 

Not only will this provide a record of the fan's perspective, but it will also provide a detailed account of the Star Wars Geeker Gate.  The book can then serve as a sourcebook to others wishing to fight a Geeker Gate in their own hobby.  The book will organize events as to how they happened according to The Phases of the Geeker Gate.  

 

Risks & Challenges

 

If $30,000 cannot be raised then the project will not be funded, and all contributors will receive a refund.  This is an all or nothing scenario.

If more than $30,000 is raised, then stretch goals and other perks may be posted.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

 

If you can't contribute, that's okay!  Just sharing this campaign on social media, or emailing to friends, or talking about it on YouTube or podcasts will help very much!

story:
(Masturbate: [latin] To Defile or Disturb with One's Hand.)

vs.

Self Pleasure: 

Sex Positive Term for a Wide Range of Sexual Self Loving and Erotically Empowered Acts.

The Self Pleasure Project: 

Getting Real about What is Perfectly Natural and Healthy. Real People, Real Stories. Real Pleasure.

      "I am inviting people to share their stories and relationship (the good and the challenging) with this most fundamental of human activities. My hope in doing this is to normalize the normal, to inspire permission and self acceptance of pleasure for its own sake and to show the beauty of people taking pleasure into their own hands" ~Victor Warring, SPP Creator


The end result will be a coffee table sized book filled with gorgeous images and authentic stories of Self Pleasure...        and a multi media presentation. 

The process of making this book involves people who are taking pleasure into their own hands---and sharing it with the Self Pleasure Project through in depth interviews and photo sessions. These Self Pleasure Activists are bravely owning their self pleasure and giving others permission to do the same.


Why Self Pleasure? Isn't that a private thing? Isn't that what you do when you can't get "real sex"? Or something you give up once you get "real sex"?

Because YOU are your primary sex partner. 

Your First Lover.


Re-claiming Sexual Self Pleasure from the clutches of cultural shame (and late night television jokes) is an act of deep revolution. 

 It is the doorway to deeper erotic connection with self and other.  How we “do ourselves” can show us so much about who we are sexually, where our joy lives, how to access it and how to become better and better lovers. Our culture consistently encourages us to be disconnected from our bodies; to either repress our sexuality or look to our partners to "give" us pleasure and our sense of sexual self-worth. Conscious Self-Pleasure is the first frontier for re-claiming the grand and unique imprint of ourselves as erotic beings.

Self Pleasure is you engaging with your most primary and life long sex partner...you! 

How to Join the 

Self Pleasure Revolution!!!

  1. Tell Your Story.  How did you discover your your Self Pleasure?  What is your current relationship to it?  Where is your Shame and your Joy?  Tell it to a friend, a lover, your teen.  Or get in touch, and tell it to us if you want to be a part of the Self Pleasure Project!!! (People of color and people in diverse sexual, sexual orientation, gender communities; I particularly want to hear your stories in this project!)
  2. Contribute Funds to support the Continued Artistic Process of interviewing, transcribing, photography and editing and piecing together of the interviews and photo sessions conducted for the Self Pleasure Project. Then publishing an amazingly beautiful, artistic, empowering photo/essay book!
  3. Tell Your Friends, Family, and Sex Positive Community about this project.  
  4. Bring Victor and Elena to your community to teach a Re-claiming Eroticism and Self Pleasure Workshop and to collect Self Pleasure Stories from you and yours.  
  5. Join the team!! Do you feel really strongly about making this project a success? Let us know.  We are working collaboratively to get the word out far and wide! Would you like to donate a perk to this project?
  6. Help us find our publisher!  If you have connections in the publishing community or are a publisher yourself and interested in this groundbreaking work, please connect. 
  7. Self Pleasure Abundantly with Joy, Pride, Consciousness, and Authenticity. Make time for it...its as important as yoga or softball practice or picking up the kids (or maybe do it before yoga!)

What Your Contribution Supports:

*Hundreds of hours of transcription time for hours of Audio Recorded Interviews 
*Photo Selection and Editing Hours for Thousands of Photos
*Updated Photographic Equipment Including:
*Digital SLR Camera + Lenses
*New Mac Computer with High Resolution and Large Memory
*Art Quality Photo Printer 
*Travel Budget for at Least 30 Additional Interviews to Various Cities, Communities, and Locations with the intention to increase diversity of participants. 
*Publishing Costs
*Post Campaign Follow Up Costs
*Indiegogo + Paypal Fees

Total = $21,500

***If we go above our funding goal, additional funding will go towards the Self Pleasure Project Multi-Media Educational Presentation available to Organizations, Groups and Communities who value Sex/Pleasure Positive, Fun and Honest Education!***

What you will RECEIVE!

In Gratitude for Your Generosity and Support.

  • Donate $25. (The Randy Thought) Receive an email thank you and self pleasuring tip from the Self Pleasure Project team.
  • Donate $50.  (The Pinky) Receive a short erotic quote from the Self Pleasure Project in your email inbox. And a thank you in the Self Pleasure Project book. (200 available)
  • Donate $150. (The Palm) Receive all the above + a hot fresh autographed copy of The Self Pleasure Project. Goal Release Date: Spring 2016. (50 Available)
  • Donate $350. (The Curling Toes) Receive all the above + an hour long Embodied Intimacy and Sexuality Coaching Session with Victor Warring, in person or over SKYPE. (20 available)
  • Donate $750 (The Arching Back) Receive a hot fresh autographed copy of The Self Pleasure Project  + a thank you in the book +3 sessions Embodied Intimacy and Sexuality Coaching with Victor Warring and Elena Zubulake, in person or over SKYPE (3 available)
  • Donate $1500 (The Giving-Gasm) Receive a hot fresh autographed copy of The Self Pleasure Project + a  big thank you in the book + Reclaiming the Erotic and Self Pleasure Daylong Workshop in your community (2 available)

Risks & Challenges

We would like to say with certainty that there are not any risks involved with this project, after all it's self pleasure.  Who could be hurt by a practice that encourages delight and joy in oneself?  One of our self pleasure loving friends said, "it's really hard to be mean to myself or others when I am touching myself with love, affection, and joy." The irony is that many would argue otherwise.  There is a whole plethora of dominant culture mythology about just how BAD self pleasure is.  

So, we cannot guarantee that your neighbor or another mother at your kid's school won't glare you down for supporting the open and healthy pursuit of pleasure for it's own sake.  We can say, that we think, despite cultural resistance, having more simple body based pleasure in our work and car filled lives CANNOT really be such a bad thing, despite what many of us were told.  

We encourage you to come out of the closet.  

And if you want to give anonymously and give us a whisper of support, we honor that too.  


The Self Pleasure Project Team

Victor Warring is the Creator of the SPP.  He is a multi-disciplinary artist, working in the mediums of photography, oil painting, performance art, writing, and dance.  His work centers around sexuality, embodiment, and  sexual diversity.  He has an MA in Somatic (Body-Centered) Psychotherapy from Naropa University. He currently works as a somatic (body-centered) sexuality/relationship coach and educator and teaches workshops around the country about creating pleasure based life and community with his partner Elena Zubulake.  Here are some links to his other works and writing: 

Ab Ovo Sexuality and Relationship Coaching 

Embodied Intimacy

Elena Zubulake; co-producer and networking supporter of the SPP.  She co-teaches body-based relationship and intimacy classes with Victor Warring. She is a bodyworker, dancer, and creator of women's sacred spaces.  She has a vibrant self pleasure practice. 

Elana Sobol; campaigner, transcriber, interviewee, and networking supporter of the SPP. She is a re-wilder, crafter of many things, body based educator, 10k runner, and avid cyclist.  She has an empowered relationship to self pleasure and is a sexuality explorer. 

Jennifer Nealon Garone; campaigner. She is a ritualist, wedding officiant, and holder of sacred woman's space, as well as a mom of a 12 year old.  She is an avid supporter of all kinds of self and communal expressions.  She is married to her high school sweetheart. 

Brenda Johnson; campaigner. Co-owner of Love Revolution, a beautiful, sex positive, conscious love boutique in Ashland, OR.  She is a dancer, sex educator, mother, and holder of space for healthy community sexuality conversations and empowerment. 


Want to join the Team?  Let us know!!


(All photos on this site are original photography by Victor Warring and part of the Self Pleasure Project.)

My hope in doing this is to normalize the normal, to inspire permission and self acceptance of pleasure for its own sake and to show the beauty of people taking pleasure into their own hands" ~Victor Warring, SPP Creator


The end result will be a coffee table sized book filled with gorgeous images and authentic stories of Self Pleasure...        and a multi media presentation. 

The process of making this book involves people who are taking pleasure into their own hands---and sharing it with the Self Pleasure Project through in depth interviews and photo sessions. These Self Pleasure Activists are bravely owning their self pleasure and giving others permission to do the same.

Why Self Pleasure? Isn't that a private thing? Isn't that what you do when you can't get "real sex"? Or something you give up once you get "real sex"?


Because YOU are your primary sex partner. 

Your First Lover.

Re-claiming Sexual Self Pleasure from the clutches of cultural shame (and late night television jokes) is an act of deep revolution. 

 It is the doorway to deeper erotic connection with self and other.  How we “do ourselves” can show us so much about who we are sexually, where our joy lives, how to access it and how to become better and better lovers. Our culture consistently encourages us to be disconnected from our bodies; to either repress our sexuality or look to our partners to "give" us pleasure and our sense of sexual self-worth. Conscious Self-Pleasure is the first frontier for re-claiming the grand and unique imprint of ourselves as erotic beings.



Self Pleasure is you engaging with your most primary and life long sex partner...you! 



How to Join the 
Self Pleasure Revolution!!!
 

Tell Your Story.  How did you discover your your Self Pleasure?  What is your current relationship to it?  Where is your Shame and your Joy?  Tell it to a friend, a lover, your teen.  Or get in touch, and tell it to us if you want to be a part of the Self Pleasure Project!!! (People of color and people in diverse sexual, sexual orientation, gender communities; I particularly want to hear your stories in this project!)
Contribute Funds to support the Continued Artistic Process of interviewing, transcribing, photography and editing and piecing together of the interviews and photo sessions conducted for the Self Pleasure Project. Then publishing an amazingly beautiful, artistic, empowering photo/essay book!
Tell Your Friends, Family, and Sex Positive Community about this project.  
Bring Victor and Elena to your community to teach a Re-claiming Eroticism and Self Pleasure Workshop and to collect Self Pleasure Stories from you and yours.  
Join the team!! Do you feel really strongly about making this project a success? Let us know.  We are working collaboratively to get the word out far and wide! Would you like to donate a perk to this project?
Help us find our publisher!  If you have connections in the publishing community or are a publisher yourself and interested in this groundbreaking work, please connect. 
Self Pleasure Abundantly with Joy, Pride, Consciousness, and Authenticity. Make time for it...its as important as yoga or softball practice or picking up the kids (or maybe do it before yoga!)
   


What Your Contribution Supports:
*Hundreds of hours of transcription time for hours of Audio Recorded Interviews *Photo Selection and Editing Hours for Thousands of Photos*Updated Photographic Equipment Including:*Digital SLR Camera + Lenses*New Mac Computer with High Resolution and Large Memory*Art Quality Photo Printer *Travel Budget for at Least 30 Additional Interviews to Various Cities, Communities, and Locations with the intention to increase diversity of participants. *Publishing Costs*Post Campaign Follow Up Costs*Indiegogo + Paypal Fees
Total = $21,500
***If we go above our funding goal, additional funding will go towards the Self Pleasure Project Multi-Media Educational Presentation available to Organizations, Groups and Communities who value Sex/Pleasure Positive, Fun and Honest Education!*** What you will RECEIVE!
In Gratitude for Your Generosity and Support.


Donate $25. (The Randy Thought) Receive an email thank you and self pleasuring tip from the Self Pleasure Project team.
Donate $50.  (The Pinky) Receive a short erotic quote from the Self Pleasure Project in your email inbox. And a thank you in the Self Pleasure Project book. (200 available)
Donate $150. (The Palm) Receive all the above + a hot fresh autographed copy of The Self Pleasure Project. Goal Release Date: Spring 2016. (50 Available)
Donate $350. (The Curling Toes) Receive all the above + an hour long Embodied Intimacy and Sexuality Coaching Session with Victor Warring, in person or over SKYPE. (20 available)
Donate $750 (The Arching Back) Receive a hot fresh autographed copy of The Self Pleasure Project  + a thank you in the book +3 sessions Embodied Intimacy and Sexuality Coaching with Victor Warring and Elena Zubulake, in person or over SKYPE (3 available)

Donate $1500 (The Giving-Gasm) Receive a hot fresh autographed copy of The Self Pleasure Project + a  big thank you in the book + Reclaiming the Erotic and Self Pleasure Daylong Workshop in your community (2 available)



Risks & Challenges

 We would like to say with certainty that there are not any risks involved with this project, after all it's self pleasure.  Who could be hurt by a practice that encourages delight and joy in oneself?  One of our self pleasure loving friends said, "it's really hard to be mean to myself or others when I am touching myself with love, affection, and joy." The irony is that many would argue otherwise.  There is a whole plethora of dominant culture mythology about just how BAD self pleasure is.  
So, we cannot guarantee that your neighbor or another mother at your kid's school won't glare you down for supporting the open and healthy pursuit of pleasure for it's own sake.  We can say, that we think, despite cultural resistance, having more simple body based pleasure in our work and car filled lives CANNOT really be such a bad thing, despite what many of us were told.  
We encourage you to come out of the closet.  
And if you want to give anonymously and give us a whisper of support, we honor that too.  


The Self Pleasure Project Team





Victor Warring is the Creator of the SPP.  He is a multi-disciplinary artist, working in the mediums of photography, oil painting, performance art, writing, and dance.  His work centers around sexuality, embodiment, and  sexual diversity.  He has an MA in Somatic (Body-Centered) Psychotherapy from Naropa University. He currently works as a somatic (body-centered) sexuality/relationship coach and educator and teaches workshops around the country about creating pleasure based life and community with his partner Elena Zubulake.  Here are some links to his other works and writing: 

Ab Ovo Sexuality and Relationship Coaching Embodied IntimacyElena Zubulake; co-producer and networking supporter of the SPP.  She co-teaches body-based relationship and intimacy classes with Victor Warring. She is a bodyworker, dancer, and creator of women's sacred spaces.  She has a vibrant self pleasure practice. Elana Sobol; campaigner, transcriber, interviewee, and networking supporter of the SPP. She is a re-wilder, crafter of many things, body based educator, 10k runner, and avid cyclist.  She has an empowered relationship to self pleasure and is a sexuality explorer. Jennifer Nealon Garone; campaigner. She is a ritualist, wedding officiant, and holder of sacred woman's space, as well as a mom of a 12 year old.  She is an avid supporter of all kinds of self and communal expressions.  She is married to her high school sweetheart. Brenda Johnson; campaigner. Co-owner of Love Revolution, a beautiful, sex positive, conscious love boutique in Ashland, OR.  She is a dancer, sex educator, mother, and holder of space for healthy community sexuality conversations and empowerment. Want to join the Team?  Let us know!!(All photos on this site are original photography by Victor Warring and part of the Self Pleasure Project.)

story:
Hello And Thank You For Joining My Adventure

My name is Janet Mattingly and I LOVE the outdoors! By trade, I am a graphic designer, market researcher and award winning photographer, but when the economy crashed, many of my clients closed their doors for good. That put me in the position of needing to find a more steady form of income. I didn't want to just get a job, I wanted to do something that I enjoyed which lead me to getting a job at  a nation chain of outdoor sporting goods store.  

As the Promotions and Events" coordinator, over the past five years I have worked with literally thousands of kids and adults, teaching them about the outdoors and exploring all it has to offer them through seminars, classes and workshops. In doing this, I am sad to say, that I have seen first hand how little our children today know about, or are connected to, the wonders and beauty of the world that surrounds them. 

I found every time I taught a class that had anything to do with animals, birds or even fishing classes, the kids eyes' would light up and the hands would go flying with questions, even the parents joined in, having questions of their own. It was wonderful to see everyone opening up and wanting to learn more than I had time to teach in my classes. 

With all the questions that were being asked, I went to the book section of our store to find a book that I could reference if I didn't know the answer to a question. What I found was, we didn't have a single animal identification book or field guide in our entire store. 

Even after searching online for a kids basic field guide that could be taken on a hike camping trip, park or even the zoo, I came away empty handed. I found everything but. There were books on insects, trees, plants and tons on birds. I couldn't find any that covered birds, animals and fish found across North America. That is why I created the"Kid's Great Outdoors Field Guide".

The Ultimate Kids Field Guide For Exploring The Great Outdoors

A Truly Environmental Friendly Kids Field Guide “Good for kids… Good for the environment!”

Being an outdoor enthusiast and conservationist, when I decided to create the Kid's Great Outdoors Field Guide, I not only wanted to get our children interested in discovering the outdoors, I also wanted to incorporate conservation into the book's development. While researching the differences between virgin paper vs. recycled paper, I came across stone paper. I was amazed at what I found, and that I hadn't heard of it before. Based on what I discovered, I made the decision to print the "Kid's Great Outdoors Field Guide" entirely on stone paper. That’s right, it will be printed on paper made from stone, not trees! 

I selected stone paper, which is basically made from pulverized cast-off marble or limestone because of how good it is for the environment. 

Although it is critically important to recycle all paper, stone paper requires less energy to produce than virgin or recycled paper and there is NO water waste.

Not only is it ECCO friendly, stone paper is durable, waterproof, kid tough and 100% recyclable. To learn more, visit www.fieldguide4kids.com or click link at bottom of page.

 My Reasoning Is Simple.


One Ton Of Virgin Paper:

On average, creates 16,000 gallons of contaminated waste water and uses approximately 11,134 kWh of energy to produce. This is equivalent to 10 months of energy used by an average household.  

One Ton Of Recycled Paper:

On average, creates 9,000 gallons of contaminated waste water and uses approximately 7,034 kWh of energy to produce. This is equivalent to 5 months of energy used by an average household.  

One Ton Of Stone Paper:

On average, creates 0 gallons of contaminated waste water and uses approximately 752 kWh of energy to produce. This is equivalent to less than 1 month of energy used by an average household and we are saving trees! 

Why The Campaign?

The Kid's Great Outdoors Field Guide is intended to bring the world of North American animals, birds, fish and waterfowl along with some of Africa's favorite animals to kid’s fingertips. But I can't do it without your help.

I need to raise $10,500 to cover the costs of the photography and illustrations being used to identify the animals in the field guide.

In order to go to press or print, I must acquire legal permission from all the photographers and illustrators to use their copyrighted images and artwork.  Meaning, I must pay the photographers and illustrators for the rights to use their photos and illustrations in the Kid's Great Outdoors Field Guide. 

Full-color photographs and illustrations are essential to correctly identify the variety of animals, birds, fish and waterfowl species. Basically, there is no Field Guide without the images, and I have over 200.

After contacting some of the photographers, I have found that the cost for 1 image can range from $20 to $250 depending on the photographer.

So, I am asking for your support and in exchange I am offering a variety of perks. Everything from the Kid's Great Outdoors Field Guide's revolutionary eBook, to hiking essentials.

Once I reach this goal, I can now go to press or should I say, have the hard bound book printed. So my stretch goal will be to raise the funds needed to print the hard bound book on the ECCO friendly stone paper. 

If I meet my stretch goal, as a thank you for your support, every contributor to this campaign will also receive a hard copy of the Kid's Great Outdoors Field Guide, no matter what your contribution amount.

Contribute And Explore The Great Outdoors!

Complete Description Of Perk Items

Prismatic Sighting Compass with Pouch Features:

• Thermo-elastic liquid-filled capsule with floating dial

• Rotating bezel ring

• Ruler units on the sides measuring in both inches and centimeters

• Built-in bubble level

• Folding thumb ring

• Tripod screw hole on base

• Adjustable diopter sighting lens

• Sighting lines on cover

• Conversion chart for angle, gradient & distance on back plate

• Heavy-duty digital camouflage print cover

• 36” lanyard

• Water-resistant nylon pouch

10x26 Pair of Binoculars Feature:

• Fully coated optics (for clear viewing)

• Non-slip rubber armor absorbs shock

• Nylon carrying case

• Neck strap

• Weight: 6.7 oz.

• Length: 4-1/2''

Trekking Pole Features:

• Adjustable, shock absorbing aluminum trekking pole

• Constructed from durable 6061 anodized aluminum

• 3-section pole extends from 26" to 52.5"

• Built-in Antishock spring system - absorbs shock

• On/Off positive locking system lets you lock pole at the perfect height

• Rubber-coated contoured handle and adjustable nylon wrist strap

• Carbide steel tip, rubber tip cover, and trekking basket for different terrains

• Lightweight 11.4 oz.

Basic Hydration Pack Features:

• Lightweight and ergonomic low-profile hydration pack

• 50oz. no-taste hydration reservoir with on/off bite valve

• Rugged water-resistant polyester construction

• Breathable mesh shoulder straps with sternum strap

• Front bungee compression system

• Reflective accents for increased low-light visibility

• Zipper accessory pocket for gear

• Pack weight: 16 oz.

• Dimensions: 17'' x 9'' x 2''

Hydration Backpack Features:

• High performance pack with 2L hydration reservoir

• No-taste hydration reservoir with a bite on/off valve

• Large main compartment

• External dual layer mesh stuff pockets

• Zippered front pocket

• Durable water resistant polyester construction

• Side and bottom compression straps

• Deluxe padded shoulder straps with adjustable sternum strap

• Removable waist belt

• Dimensions: 8" x 4" x 20"

• Carry weight: 1.5 lbs.

story:
My name is Eniola.

I am a Dallas-based writer. As a child, I wrote to experience life as I imagined it: through plays, songs, stories, and poetry. Years later, through daily poetry shared through social media and custom poetry in print, I invite people to the table.

Beauty is the wind behind the words and the intention is to create libraries of contemplative, inspirational and beautiful literature for my readers.

The Goldheart publication is an anthology of currently released poems. Curated poetry that has impacted hearts and inspired many to engage with our God, in a new way.

This campaign is Goldheart's step beyond past failures and into faith.

story:
A Brief About Me

Hi,

My name is Anshuman and I am a Technologist, a Leadership expert and a First-Time-Author.

With over 12.5 years of experience in this IT world, I have got the opportunity to work with a lot of great people, explore multiple technologies and wear multiple hats in my career.

Now I am focused in giving back to the society. I help organizations, technologists, managers and young entrepreneurs to achieve their goals, by unleashing their true potentials.

A Brief About The Bad Manager

“The Bad Manager” is the story of Aiden. A young man from Goa, who knew no failure. He was a star performer throughout his life. However, he fell prey to office politics and earned the title of “The Bad Manager”, when he was at the peak of his career. As the story unfolds, we will learn how he bounces back and set an example for others.

Apart from being a good-read, “The Bad Manager” also teaches a lot of life lessons, plenty of productivity hacks and exemplary leadership skills. The story also demonstrates a practical example of the RHHHK methodology, with the intention of helping organizations, technologists, managers and young entrepreneurs to achieve their goals.

It has taken me years to gain the confidence to write my first story and I hope to see it all the way through to publication. For reference, I’ve added the prologue of the book below so you may be able to judge the quality of the book. Please note that I’m still in the editing process so there may be spelling and grammatical errors.

 

What I Need & What You Get

After months of spending my nights typing away in front of my monitor, I managed to write an 65000+ word novel. Now I'm faced with the dilemma of getting the book professionally edited and a cover designed.

I'm looking for $1000 to fund my project.

The money raised for this project will be utilized in the following manner:

- Hiring a copy editor

- Designing the book cover

- Any money left over will be utilized for promoting this book.

I have a lot of great perks at every donation level. Please check them out here on the Campaign page.

I hope that you will join me in this venture and lend your support. Donations at any level will be helpful toward reaching the funding goal. 

The Impact

Let me walk you through a situation. You are working on a project, where requirements are not clear. You work hard to build a module just to learn that it has got a number of change requests. This results in you missing your deadlines even while you over exert yourself while trying to meet the expectations of the client. The client started screaming on you. You try to explain to your boss about this situation, but she says it is your fault, as you were not paying attention to the requirements while the client was explaining. In such a scenario, what would you do? Would you like to just keep pushing yourself and try to meet the expectations of the client? Or would you like to resolve the conflicts, so that you can deliver a good product? I always opt for the latter.

To handle such situation, I have developed a methodology which I call “The RHHHK methodology” and "The Bad Manager" is based on the RHHHK methodology. The main objective of this book is to demonstrates a practical example of the RHHHK methodology, with the intention of helping organizations, technologists, managers and young entrepreneurs to achieve their goals.

Other Ways You Can Help

As well as donating monetarily, I would like to ask you to help out by spreading the word to your friends. Don't forget to click the sharing buttons and let's make this a successful project.

story:
Meet the Artist

Alayna’s story

Alayna is 15 years old and is a Special Needs child on the Autism Spectrum.  She is exceptionally talented, and she spends her free time reading, drawing cartoons, singing, and playing the violin.  She is always coming up with new characters and story lines for those personalities.  She never ceases to amaze me with the depth of her characters’ backstories.  Alayna loves music and her favorite violinist is Lyndsey Sterling.  In fact, when she’s not drawing or reading, she’s listening to Sterling and mimicking her style with her ‘air violin’.  She is currently in her third year of orchestra and hopes to be as good as her idol someday.  Alayna has a passion for helping children, especially those who might feel disconnected or stigmatized by their peers or by society.  Being a Special Needs child, she has a unique understanding of the children around her and she utilizes that understanding in developing her characters. 

Meet the Author

My name is Stephanie, and I am the mother of three amazing children.  And yes, I know every mother thinks their children are amazing, but mine really are. (OK, so I’m a little bias.)  I am a writer and public speaker, and while I can sketch a little here or there, the true artistic talent lies in my children.  As the mother of three children with three different personalities, it’s a juggle but one in which I take the most pride.  Each one has his/her own strengths and styles, and I truly love watching them grow and develop.  As the mother of a Special Needs child, I have learned so much. The most profound quote I’ve ever read on Autism was, “We’re not here to fit into your box.  We’re here to show you there is no box.” This book is the brainchild of Alayna and myself, and it was inspired by the children of cancer research.  I have the pleasure of personally knowing some rather remarkable superheroes, and it’s they who inspired me to write and Alayna to draw.

About the Book

Vikki Victorious is the first of its kind.  Vikki is a superhero, who just happens to be a cancer survivor.  It is her ultimate battle with cancer that provides her mission to help other children who are fighting their very own, very real battle.  It is for this reason that 5 percent of all profits made from the sale of this book will benefit children of cancer research and their families.  

This book is the first of a series. This book, and the others that will follow, will not only provide hope and inspiration to a specific audience that is often overlooked, but it will also allow Alayna the opportunity to reach out to other children, like herself, and make a positive impact in their lives. 

Your support in this project makes all this possible, and that is why we need you.

What We Need 

Your support is needed for publication costs (printing, licensing and associated legal fees), and it is estimated to be about $8,000.

What You Get

We are so excited to offer you some very special perks! You can check these out to the left, but here's an easy description of each Donation Tier.

Tier 1                     You rock!

·         Our sincerest gratitude

                It’s people like you who make a difference in the world.  From the bottom of our hearts, we sincerely thank you for your kind generosity. 

Tier 2                    The All-Star Society

·         Our sincerest gratitude

·         8.5 x 11 Vinyl sticker sheet

Not only do you have our sincerest gratitude, but your little one will also receive an 8.5 x 11 sheet of vinyl stickers, featuring Vikki Victorious and the Victorious League® logo.

Tier 3                    The Conquerors’ Gang

·         Our sincerest gratitude

·         8.5x11 Vinyl sticker sheet

·         First Edition copy of Vikki Victorious

You not only have our sincerest gratitude, but you will also receive an 8.5 x11 vinyl sticker sheet and a first edition copy- first printing- of the Vikki Victorious book. 

Tier 4                    The Champions’ Club

·         Our sincerest gratitude

·         8.5x11 Vinyl sticker sheet

·         First Edition copy of Vikki Victorious, personalized and signed by the artist and author

Not only will you receive an 8.5x11 vinyl sticker sheet and a first edition copy- first printing- of the Vikki Victorious book, but the book will also be personalized and signed by the artist and author- just for you!  Upon checkout, please let us know to whom you would like the book to be personalized.  If you’re not sure, that’s ok- the artist and author will still sign it for you. 

Tier 5                    The Winners’ Circle

·         Our sincerest gratitude

·         8.5x11 Vinyl sticker sheet

·         First Edition copy of Vikki Victorious, personalized and signed by the artist and author

·         Tote emblazoned with the Victorious League® logo

In addition to our sincerest gratitude and our pervious perks, you will also receive a magnificent 10 oz. natural cotton tote.  It’s large enough to hold books, snacks, and even a small plush friend.  Featuring sturdy construction and a zippered closure, we took great strides to bring you a quality product that your child will enjoy for years to come.  Emblazoned with the Victorious League® logo that declares [I’m] “Victorious!”, this is more than just a fashion statement.  It’s a LIFE STATEMENT.

Tier 6                    The Victors’ Ring

·         Our sincerest gratitude

·         8.5x11 Vinyl sticker sheet

·         First Edition copy of Vikki Victorious, personalized and signed by the artist and author

·         Tote emblazoned with the Victorious League® logo

·         Dedication

In addition to our sincerest gratitude and the aforementioned perks, you are also invited to make a lasting memorial for your loved one.  As a very special perk, you will be able to dedicate this book to whomever you wish.  Upon checkout, please let us know in the comments section, and your dedicated name will be listed in alphabetical order in the first pages of the book.  This is not a temporary gift.  For as long as this book remains in print, we will see to it that your special dedication will remain memorialized forever. 

Tier 7                    The Heroes’ Guild

·         Our sincerest gratitude

·         5- 8.5x11 Vinyl sticker sheets

·         5- First Edition copies of Vikki Victorious, signed by the artist and author

·         5- Totes emblazoned with the Victorious League® logo

·         Dedication

·         *Special acknowledgement

·         *Bonus surprise

Hospital Donation: At this level, not only do you receive our sincerest gratitude, but you will receive the gratitude of the children you touch with your generosity.  Your kindness will be memorialized and acknowledged in the front pages of the book, just after the dedications.  Upon checkout, don’t forget to let us know to whom you wish to dedicate the book, and if there is a particular children’s hospital where you’d like us to ship your donation.  If you don’t know, that’s ok.  We’ll be happy to choose for you.  Either way, we will include a note that the donation came from you, unless you prefer to remain anonymous, in which case it will read “Anonymous donation”.  Five children in the pediatric cancer ward of the designated hospital will each receive a sticker sheet, a first edition signed copy of the book, a zippered tote, and as an added bonus, each child will also receive a very special gift from Vikki Victorious herself!

On a Personal Note

I really want to thank you for expressing an interest in this project.  It has been such an amazing journey watching my daughter blossom into the talent that she has become.  Seeing her make a difference in the lives of other children who have had obstacles thrust before them at such a tender age is truly remarkable and quite honestly, inspiring.  Like other children with Autism, she faces many challenges, but she does with a sweet smile and a loving heart.  I truly appreciate your support in this endeavor.
story_txt:
Meet the Artist

Alayna’s story
Alayna is 15 years old and is a Special Needs child on the Autism Spectrum.  She is exceptionally talented, and she spends her free time reading, drawing cartoons, singing, and playing the violin.  She is always coming up with new characters and story lines for those personalities.  She never ceases to amaze me with the depth of her characters’ backstories.  Alayna loves music and her favorite violinist is Lyndsey Sterling.  In fact, when she’s not drawing or reading, she’s listening to Sterling and mimicking her style with her ‘air violin’.  She is currently in her third year of orchestra and hopes to be as good as her idol someday.  Alayna has a passion for helping children, especially those who might feel disconnected or stigmatized by their peers or by society.  Being a Special Needs child, she has a unique understanding of the children around her and she utilizes that understanding in developing her characters.

story:
For the first-timer and/or inexperienced author, the self-publishing route can often turn into a time-consuming and very expensive maze - resulting in more failures than successes.

 

Three-Legged Elephant Publishing's goal is to be the bridge between that first-time writer with a raw manuscript in hand - and an author with a professionally-polished book for sale.

Hello, my name is Malcolm Boyd.  I am the published author of the Mann Walker crime fiction trilogy, and the children’s book ‘My First Train.’  My own first attempt at being published quickly turned into a nightmare:

·       My book is selling, but where was the money?

·       My publisher is saying THIS, but doing THAT 

·       The constant infighting with my Editor, who was changing my manuscript into their personal vision of my story. 

·       Why isn’t my book in bookstores?

The number of self-published authors is rising rapidly, and I personally have mentored numerous first-time authors who otherwise would have ended up like me: broken down on the side of Publishing Road.

According to trade magazine, Publishers Weekly, “Self-publishing continues to expand, with ISBN registrations jumping 21% from 2014 to 2015 (the most recent data available), according to the bibliographic solutions company Bowker.”

But even for self-published authors who choose to put their collective noses to the grindstone, too many are left to second-guessing and wishing they had ‘fixed this’ or ‘changed that’ - after the fact.  Signing a ‘one size fits all’ contract is how most first-time authors’ budgets are exhausted. 

However, every author has different needs.   

Three-Legged Elephant Publishing (TLEP) knows this, and we have tailored an author’s contract to those individual areas of concentration.  We work WITH the first-time author to make sure we stay on point. 

TLEP is not only a good idea: it’s NEEDED.

Robin Cutler, director of the self-publishing arm of Ingram Book Company, the world’s largest distributor, stated: “…indie authors who had previously focused on digital are looking to publish in print and other formats. “Getting their titles into brick-and-mortar bookstores as well as into libraries continues as a goal for many indie authors this year and into next year.”

Successful indie authors see themselves as entrepreneurs who are running a business.   Successful authors have to focus on their business – their books - and manage the ups and downs.  And that is the truth!

I had to become an entrepreneur, not only to get my own books published - printed and sold - it also became my personal goal to share my knowledge with other newbie authors!

Anyone with a computer and an internet connection can be a printed author in a matter of days, and an eBook author in a matter of minutes. BUT - without a concerted marketing strategy, which most self-published authors have neither the expertise nor the resources to generate, these books are more than likely to be lost in the crowd, and a financial loss for the author.

THREE-LEGGED ELEPHANT PUBLISHING has chosen a system to give every writer the chance to have their work evaluated. This puts the emphasis back on talent, and allows writers the opportunity to have their books edited and designed at the highest level. Our marketing department will then deliver a fully-integrated campaign tailored to each book.

If you support this campaign I can (ALMOST) GUARANTEE YOU FOUR THINGS:

1.     You will sleep better at night.

2.     You will live longer.

3.     Your blessings will be returned.

4.     You will get to read at least one of the most entertaining books available.

story:
A New Book from the Guy Who Knows A Guy

My name is Michael Whitehouse, and I am known by many in Southeast Connecticut as The Guy Who Knows A Guy. The moniker comes from the name of my first book, detailing the skills and strategies I employed in going from a newbie knowing no one in 2014 to a well connected guy in 2017.

Aiming for release in March 2020, I am now writing The Four Foundations of Building Business, a one stop, easy to read resource for people in business to learn the key skills they need to succeed.

After writing my first book, The Guy Who Knows A Guy, I spoke to many business owners and discovered that there is a core set of soft skills that every person in business needs, and I could not find a simple, approachable go to guide to get the basics of those four areas.

The Four Foundations

Marketing, Sales, Networking, and Problem Solving are four foundations upon which the success of any organization is built. Many resources focus on technical issues like accounting and budgeting and logistics, but any technical issue can be effectively outsourced. While consultants and teams can assist in the execution of these four foundations, leaders must be proficient in all four areas to have success.

Over the last twenty years, I have worked with numerous for-profit and non-profit organizations in a variety of leadership roles. Some of these organizations benefited from leadership who were proficient in all four foundations.

Unfortunately, many leaders have gaps in one or more foundations. They are hard working and highly competent people, but they have simply not had an easily accessible way to fillthose skill gaps. This book will be an easily approachable, easy to read resource for people in all levels of business to achieve awareness and basic proficiency in these four key foundations.

Many businesses fail because the owners and key people lack proficiency in one or more of these key areas. This is a tragedy because so many of these owners are excellent in their chosen field, but they simply lack education. My goal is to create a simple, go to resource that the overwhelmed person in business can read and put right to work, giving them vital information and possibly saving their business.

Be A Part Of My New Book

The purpose of this campaign is to give you the chance to be involved in the process of this book. Supporters will have the opportunity to be beta readers and read the manuscript before it's released, pose questions to be answered directly in the book, and become a part of my campaign to share foundational knowledge with people in business.

The Impact

Your support will help build awareness of this book and get it into the hands of people who will benefit the most from it. There are so many books out there, but many can be intimidating to the average entrepreneur. The Four Foundations will be that starting handbook to help business owners and others in business gain those basic skills they need to succeed.

What's the Money For?

This book is going to be written and published on demand like The Guy Who Knows A Guy is. The money raised in this campaign will go towards promoting and marketing the book as well as promoting my talks to educate business people live on the Four Foundations.

Depending on how much is raised, it may also go to professional cover design.

Other Ways You Can Help

Beyond committing to financially support the campaign, there are a number of other ways you can help.

  • Share this campaign on social media
  • Tell your friends, colleagues, and coworkers about the campaign
  • Introduce me to event organizers looking for speakers
  • Connect me with venues to host book launch events in March

story:
"Printing Architecture"

Printing Architecture explores different layers of unseen structural form. Through 3D printing, you can locally source, produce and construct new structural forms that respond to your local climate. The visual atlas showcases new facade systems to improve the performance, natural comfort and climatic resilience of the tropical building. If you are an architect, designer, student or simply somebody who enjoys looking at beautiful patterns, printing architecture will inspire and guide you to the infinite possibilities of new technology, its outlook, and new architectural products.

 

The Purpose

Are you a designer, architect, student or visionary? The content in this publication remains broad and captures the various possibility of a new technology. It investigates how sustainability can be achieved through additive manufacturing. It might change the way you design and construct in the future. 

Printing Architecture unravels the process of adapting 3D printing into architecture, reveals its limitations and journey towards a future of possibilities in form, structure and performance. Studio Florian Schätz curates and outlines compiling drawings, ideas, forms and pictorial representations.  A team of more than 200 students, architects and engineers contributed to this unique catalogue of ideas for the tropical facade. 

"We want to share our knowledge within and outside of the architectural and building industry. Designers, students, practitioners and academics alike will be able to tap on the body of inspiration available in this book", says Florian Schätz, Architect and Assistant Professor at the National University of Singapore, who is one of the authors behind Printing Architecture. Join in discovering the future of architecture and construction and support this publication with your own copy. 

Our journey began in 2009 with the Design & Construction Hands-on-Workshop, where we were rediscovering the tradition of the tropical facade with casting ventilation blocks. As automation replaces manual making we aim to train the future generation of architects to use 3D printing as a design tool and to open up new visions and possibilities in the early days of their education. Some of their incredible Ideas you will find in Printing architecture; species of the tropical envelope. 

 

Get your own copy. Funding received will be channelled towards the book's content, design and layout and to print, publish and distribute these new ideas for tropical facades. 

- Your personal copy will be fresh from the printer at your home, work table or office in September 2017.

Challenges & Opportunities

The hardcover book of 144 pages (16 x 21cm) will contain vector graphics of patterns, more than 5 species and 25 typologies of tropical facades and 3D forms, model images, drawings, renderings and images. We want to to make this book as affordable as possible and helping architecture students, the design and building community. With your copy, you contribute to sharing knowledge to an affordable price. 



Let's Make This Happen

Any support big or small brings open new opportunities to the get inspiration for the future of architecture.  Please share the word of this project -  within the next generation, millions of houses in the tropics and subtropics will have to be built. We need to think about sustainability and low energy solutions for the production of mass housing.  3D Printing will be one solution. You can make it happen!

Some of their incredible Ideas you will find in Printing architecture; species of the tropical envelope. 
 
Get your own copy. Funding received will be channelled towards the book's content, design and layout and to print, publish and distribute these new ideas for tropical facades. - Your personal copy will be fresh from the printer at your home, work table or office in September 2017.

Challenges & Opportunities
The hardcover book of 144 pages (16 x 21cm) will contain vector graphics of patterns, more than 5 species and 25 typologies of tropical facades and 3D forms, model images, drawings, renderings and images. We want to to make this book as affordable as possible and helping architecture students, the design and building community. With your copy, you contribute to sharing knowledge to an affordable price. 


Let's Make This Happen
Any support big or small brings open new opportunities to the get inspiration for the future of architecture.  Please share the word of this project -  within the next generation, millions of houses in the tropics and subtropics will have to be built. We need to think about sustainability and low energy solutions for the production of mass housing.  3D Printing will be one solution. You can make it happen!

story:
The Story - 

When a boy dreaming of becoming an astronaut, is heartbroken for not getting into Space Exploration school, he tells an old Scientist-wizard his dream. Their friendship grows, expands his horizons, and changes his life. Soon the boy discovers he is destined to save the world… if only he could help a Nanobotic Alien civilization in their fight with Mutating Evil monsters. And so his Interstellar journey begins... 

 

Why Kids Will Love This Book - 

  • Relatable - The main character is just a regular boy like any other kid 
  • Inspirational - We all need more courage, more hope, and more persistence 
  • Fantastic World - Fun to explore, and get fascinated by Space and science 

And here is the Story in more detail - 

Space Adventures of Oliver Wonderbie -

Kids' Sci Fi Story

What Lies Beyond the Stars?

From the depths of the night sky, sprinkled with flickering silent stars, distant galaxies hidden in mystery, a story that will make you dream, comes to life. Close your eyes, open your heart, and let the wings of your imagination carry you higher and farther…

There is a charmed reality, where life flows in colorful waves of abundance, energy, love and rich harvest, a world free of pain and sadness, where we feel liberated, light and unstoppable. But can we ever get there? 

Here Comes an Unusual Hero –

Oliver Wonderbie was just a smart boy… who dreamed of being an astronaut one day. But his dream was crushed when he got a rejection letter from the Space Exploration School. Luckily he befriends Mr.Twinklegart, a scientist-wizard living next door, whose tiny pair of glasses, made him look like Einstein, combined with a mild temper of a fairy. Oliver visits the old man, plays with his cat named Acorn, and gazes through the telescope Mr.Twinklegart has on his front porch, at stars and constellations. 

Fast forward to a few weeks later… when life changed so suddenly and strangely.

His best friend Finn gets sick, and Oliver desperately wishes to do anything to help him. A new mysterious disease spreads fast and people everywhere fall sick indiscriminately. 

As fear and confusion in his home town grow, Mr. Twinklegart reveals a vital message to Oliver.

Looking for the "Key" to Life -

The fateful message suggests that humanity has a secret ally that can  help erase all illnesses. The friendly Nanobotic Alien civilization – as Mr. Twinklegart explains, has the answer to everlasting life - but they are thousands of light years away. It will take forever to get there. 

Beside that, a powerful enemy - Mutating Evil monsters are trying to destroy the Nanobots. 

Is Oliver ready for this big mission? And will he get there in time?

Humanity’s future depends on it. 

 

 

The Social Impact - 

Why this new book now?

The current Pandemic situation has created a tremendous pressure on families and is especially challenging for kids. In this time of uncertainty and stress, we all could wish life was simpler and happier. From Tokyo to Paris, Sao Paulo to Toronto, or Beijing to Madrid, we share similar fears, emotions and hopes for the future.

And it’s particularly in this moment, that we like to bring some joy and a piece of entertainment into homes around the world.

A story depicting the fascinating journey of a boy brave enough to explore Space and fulfill a mission on behalf of  humanity. Curious young minds like to explore and discover new worlds, we hope to inspire them to learn more and delve deeper into Astronomy, Physics and Science fiction. Where there is no limit on what can be achieved… as the future belongs to them.

We would love also to touch the lives of kids who might be underprivileged.  

And added a Perk that will help us do that. Thanks to you. 

 

Completion and Delivery - 

The project is currently about 1/3 complete. We are still working on the content - writing, editing, designs and illustrations.  In total the book will be 25+ pages with 12+ illustrations. This the preliminary art work, the final designs will be close to these illustrations but more detailed and complex, featuring scenes from the story. 

Delivery Time - September 25-30th, 2020 

Ways You Can be a Part of Our Project - 

If you love the idea and would like to support the project, you can - 

  • Order a Copy 
  • Donate any amount you like, to achieve our goal (if you choose not to get a copy).
  • Spread the word on Social Media by using Indiegogo share tools! Let others who might be interested, know about the book. 
  • Connect with us on Social Media as we would love to build a Community. And create meaningful entertainment. (check out Zengie_  Instagram - our new, kids entertainment brand) 

We will be posting updates often, so please stay tuned! 

Every contribution matters and makes a difference!! 

Thank you for all your love and support!

Order a Copy 
Donate any amount you like, to achieve our goal (if you choose not to get a copy).
Spread the word on Social Media by using Indiegogo share tools! Let others who might be interested, know about the book. 
Connect with us on Social Media as we would love to build a Community. And create meaningful entertainment. (check out Zengie_  Instagram - our new, kids entertainment brand) 

We will be posting updates often, so please stay tuned! Every contribution matters and makes a difference!! Thank you for all your love and support!

story:
Short Summary

This book was was published in November 2019. This dealt specifically with reversing Type 2 Diabetes. This book is now scheduled for a second edition release. Stay tuned for more relases of additional books.

If you have been diagnosed with Type 2 Diabetes, have digestion issues, food sensitivities, a slow metabolism, this is the book for you! This book is intended to help you learn new eating habits that will help you to maintain a good healthy weight. In the process it’s possible to reprogram your body’s metabolism to work more efficiently:

  • You will learn what foods cause weight gain and inflammation.
  • You will learn what foods will better help you to control sugar.
  • You will learn what ingredients in foods may be causing other health issues.

 

Ask yourself:

  • Do you want help to achieve normal sugar levels?
  • Do you want to achieve a healthy weight and improve your metabolism?
  • Do you want help to determine what may be causing digestive issues or possible food allergies?

 

These are additional things that will be addressed in this book and how they can relate to the foods you eat.

 

What We Need & What You Get

We want to bring Diabetes education and healthy living perspective to more people. Including those that can't afford to purchase these resources.

The more we raise the more you get:

  • $1,000 Contribution Goal - The funds raised will help cover the cost of publishing, graphic design. Each person who contributes will get a digital copy of the book + positive affirmation cards. 
  • $3,000 Contribution Goal - The funds will help us publish a book of recipes that is a companion to this book and will have a free podcasts available to listen to. Each person will receive a digital copy of the book + positive affirmation cards + a book of recipes.
  • $6,000 Contribution Goal - The funds will help us to have seminars and coaching programs available and a companion app. Each person will receive a digital copy of the book + positive affirmation cards + a book of recipes + a free ticket to a seminar + free access to podcasts.

 

The Impact

When you take control of your life regarding the foods you eat; the impact will make a tremendous difference in your life, and the lives of people you share this information with. It’s amazing how much better you feel when you are eating foods you love and that make you feel good! 

  • For every paperback book purchased, a digital copy of the book will go to someone who has limited resources that is in need of this information.
  • Coaching programs and podcasts will be available to more people.
  • Combines proven nutrition principals backed with medical data to help achieve normal blood pressure and normal blood sugar range.
  • The people that have tested this lifestyle, find that they feel better and don't want to go back to their eating old habits.

 

Risks & Challenges

Most people don't like change and they don't like to change anything in their life. Especially if they know it's good for them. There is too much negative thinking from past diets that have been tried. The biggest challenge that we have, is some people think.. Oh No not another diet. What makes this different?

  • This is a custom tailored plan that you can design yourself according you your health needs.
  • You don't deprive yourself of food. You get to eat foods you love. 
  • You eat things that help you eliminate the cravings that are bad for you.

 

In the past 20 years, I have had many health challenges that I found were all food related. Also some members of my family have diabetes and different challenges than myself. I have discovered ways that I can cook that will agree with everyone. I am a blogger and share recipes on a gluten-free website. In the last 10 years I have helped many people develop their own nutrition plan to get healthier according to their individual dietary and health needs. With most clients I work very closely with their primary care doctor to make sure I am giving them the proper recommendations. This has worked both for weight loss and reversing Type 2 Diabetes.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

We need to get the word out to more people. Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • How many people do you know that have Diabetes?
  • How many people do you know that have weight issues?
  • How many people do you know that have digestive issues?
  • How many people do you know that have food allergies?
  • Share this campaign with friends and family that this could help, by email or social media sites, Facebook messenger etc.  
  •  Indiegogo makes it easy to share on social media sites using their tools. Use #FeelGOODandGETtough when sharing.

Thank you so much for your support!

story:
What is your family's story?

(And who will remember it in fifty years?)

     This fundraiser is for "Hidden Appalachia: Coeburn, Virginia, Volume 3", the final volume of a three-book series that we created to preserve the hidden history of Coeburn, Virginia. Volume 1 was published and delivered earlier this year, while Volume 2 is in the works with a scheduled November delivery. The content of the first two books came largely from public materials, but this one will be different. Volume 3 is to be a collection of family stories and photos which will be shared with us by the members of Coeburn families themselves. So, much of the material in this book will never have been seen by the public before.

     This is your chance to write down your own family's story and see it published for posterity! Your kids, grandkids, and even your great-grandkids will all be able to read about your family in the book.

     But what if you're not a writer? Well, don't let that scare you, because we are here to help. We will provide guidelines, templates, and advice for your stories, editing to correct any problems with the text, and even photo retouching to make those less-than-perfect family images look great in print. But if you feel that you absolutely cannot write, then I bet you still have a relative or friend who can. So make that phone call to Aunt Mary who does family genealogy, or Cousin Jim who plans all the reunions, or maybe even that talented grand-child who really has a knack for words, and words, and words...

     It really doesn't matter who writes it down, so long as it gets written.

     Once this project is completed, each contributor will receive their own copy of the book as a perk. And to make sure the book will be available for future generations, several copies of "Hidden Appalachia: Coeburn, Virginia, Volume 3" will be donated to local and university libraries. Plus, it will be made available through print-on-demand (i.e. each book is printed as you order it) starting in 2023.


Book Design

     "Hidden Appalachia: Coeburn, Virginia, Volume 3" will be a soft-cover 6" x 9" book, similar to the first two volumes in the series. However, we expect this book will be much longer, maybe 200-500 pages, depending on how many families participate.

     For each contributor a minimum of one page will be set aside for their family story. This is enough space to print approximately 400 words of text, or 300 words plus a quarter-page photo, or 200 words with a half-page photo. And if one page is not big enough to tell all of your family story, then you can easily sign up for additional pages, either now or later.

     Your family story can be about almost anything you want. It can be a genealogy / family tree, a narrative of your family's overall Coeburn experience, an original story or poem from your family, or even a tribute to that special grand-parent or grand-child.

     So what do YOU want people to remember about your family?


Hasn't This Been Done Before?

     Yes, sort of. In 1994 the Coeburn Kiwanis Club published a marvelous book called, "Coeburn, Virginia Area History - Celebrating the Centennial of the Town of Coeburn." This was an 850 page hardcover book with scads of Coeburn history, including the biographical sketches and photos of 216 Coeburn families. Unfortunately, this book is now out of print, and it is difficult to even find a used copy without spending $400 on eBay.


So How Will This Work?

     (1) At the end of the fundraiser each contributor will receive an information packet by email which will include submission guidelines, writing samples and templates, release forms, and other useful and necessary stuff.

     (2) You (or another family writer) will then write your story, choose and scan your photos, and forward everything to us with completed releases by email and/or postal mail. The deadline for your submissions will be 31 January 2022. This may seem like a long way off, but it's really not. And if you want to send your submissions in early then that will be great too. However, this schedule is intended to afford you some time to confer with distant family members during any upcoming reunions or holiday gatherings, and maybe learn more about your family's story.

     (3) Once we receive your submissions we will polish up the text and photos as necessary, format it for printing, and then send you a page proof for approval. If you like it, then great. But if anything needs to be changed before it's published, then all you have to do is ask. We will make the necessary corrections and then send you another page proof for approval.

     (4) Starting in February 2022 we will compile all the submissions into book format. This should be finished by the end of April 2022, then we will send the book to the printer to await a proof copy. If the proof copy looks perfect then we can promptly order up a big batch of books.

     (5) After we receive the printed books they will be mailed out to each contributor, as a perk, in July 2022.

     (6) Once you receive your own book, the one you helped create, you can sit back and be happy to know that you helped save the hidden history of Coeburn, Virginia, our fascinating Appalachian hometown!


What We Need From You

     To make this project work, we will need the support of many people who, like us, feel a special connection to Coeburn, Virginia. We not only need your financial support, but also your participation and encouragement with this project. We absolutely cannot make this book without you!


Other Ways You Can Help

     People who cannot contribute to the fundraiser can still help out by sharing the campaign on Facebook with their family members, friends, co-workers, and anyone else who might be interested in Coeburn history. You can do this by simply clicking on the Facebook icon at the top of the page.


About The Authors

     Dee Ratliff Kenady grew up in the forests of the Cumberland Plateau, living the rare life of a free mountain child. As an adult she has worked hard to share her journey in print, publishing many poems, stories, and books that are well-rooted in her Appalachian life experience. Dee's knowledge and insight about the "old ways" has been invaluable in framing this project in a meaningful context.

     Wade Kenady is originally from Caney Ridge, just inside Dickenson County. He began his education in the two-room Rugby School and later attended schools at Clintwood and Coeburn. As an amateur historian he has studied local stories and Appalachian culture for over a decade. Wade still has kinfolk living in the Coeburn area, and consider it to be his memorable hometown.

Thanks so much to you all for your tremendous encouragement and support!
Wade & Dee
