What makes this even worse is the fact that after you’ve spent all of this time, they buy from someone else! Which means you don't make any commissions.You’ve been told that sales is just a numbers game. You have to keep knocking on strangers' doors and making cold calls.  But what if there was a shortcut, a way to turn the tables on this process and deal only with people you already have a relationship with, and who fit the profile of your ideal customer. That’s exactly what this book will show you, how to make and keep strong connections with enough people to keep your pipeline full without cold calling or knocking on doors. So, if you're a Sales Professional who really wants to sell more products, keeps wasting time because of unqualified or unready buyers, "How To Become Known, Liked & Trusted By Your Ideal Customer" is the answer you've been looking for!Don't miss this opportunity to learn how to become the person everyone trusts for advice when it's time to make a buying decision! - Pre-Order Now!

story:
My Story. Why did I write the book?

What is the scariest thing that can happen to you after getting married? – Once upon a time you get aware that you are unhappy because you’ve really made a mistake.

Perhaps, it’s just a passing thought that you will hurriedly brush off convincing yourself that everything is OK. But, then you start thinking: the love you had in the beginning has gone, and the only one person you could spend all your time with is no longer interesting.

And, even the sex is no good anymore, your fantasies remain only fantasies. Once you wanted diversity and tried to change something, but you yielded and left those desires untold.

After several years you suddenly realize that your dreams are still dreams, and you are no longer the same as you used to be.

This realization makes you think: what’s next? – Give up everything and start all over again or allow yourself to make your dreams come true… with someone else.

Both options are frightening. You want to be truly happy, but you don’t want to ruin safe relationships with your partner. Because you’ve been together for such a long time. If you get a divorce, is there any guarantee that the next relationship won’t end in the same way?

Calm down, you are not the only one. Over 50% of married women feel exactly the same.

That’s why a lot of families often fight, experience depressions, betrayals, and divorces – all those things that a happy woman shouldn’t pass through.

What about your dreams?

In childhood we usually have tremendous dreams, but when we get older, we happen to wake up and realize that life is quite different. It is filled with notorious daily chores instead of bright colors.

For example, have you ever dreamt about opening your own company, become a prima ballerina, travel around the world, or live in a house at the seaside? I have.

Dreams may change, but the question is if we make them come true or just keep dreaming?

In fact, all my life before getting married was filled with dreams and ambitions. I wanted a lot of things. But gradually, dreams became only dreams separated by a thick wall from the reality.

Have you ever wished, just once, to start all over? With another person and in another place? Have you ever thought as I did that you married too early, and your life is not the kind of life you dreamt of? Have you ever felt that the passion in your relationship died, you got only common daily life instead, and there is nothing more between you two than just a habit mistakenly called love?

My life used to be routine, it was like in many other families: home – work – home, walking, going to the cinema, visiting friends on the weekends, and sex twice a week.

I was always taught to be a carrying and wise wife and to take care of the house. But nobody has ever told me that to achieve all those things you should keep silent and suffer as much as possible.

That time I didn’t know that sex is very important, and that your partner should be both a good handyman and a good lover that can light up your fire at any time. That diversity should be everywhere in your kitchen and in your bed.

Just imagine, even before you’ve decided to say no to all your dreams, lock up all your desires and forget about them once and for all, it happens as if someone has heard you yelling for help, and a person, who changes everything, appears in your life.  

When something like that happened to me, my life was split into two worlds, two realities, and I had to make my choice. To stay with someone reliable and tested with years, support, family, friends. Where everything is familiar. Or to jump into the abyss, hoping to grow wings while falling…

  You are sure this man will make you different, and you will be yourself and real. You can make all your dreams come true, and you don’t have to be scared of failures, as you always have another try any time. He will support you. He will be with you.

You get aware that you will be able to overcome your fears and family’s pressure by realizing your dreams and wished. You have this right! You deserve much more than you have now!

Why have I decided to share this story with the whole world? It wasn’t easy. The society judges everyone who doesn’t follow its rules. At first, I shared it with my closest friends, and they shared it with theirs, presenting this story as an example that everything is possible in this life, it is never too late to start all over again. One of them dared to move abroad, another one to break up relations being like a cage for her.

My story tells you how to find courage to leave the comfort zone, how to get strong enough to make an important step. This is a story about passion that never fades away but burns brighter with each year. The story showing how a grey and dull life can turn into life of your dreams. Your age and status do not matter, it is not important where you live, what you do and how you look like. A clean slate is the same for anyone.

I dreamt about writing a book, but everyone used to tell me that I am just a journalist, and it was impossible. But here I am, I’ve written a book. Exactly about the things restraining me and many other married women that I know.

I met my love and like-minded person, with whom I managed to realize myself in all the spheres, despite the fact that I married the wrong man in the beginning.

I kept good relationship with friends, family and even with my ex-husband. By the way, he was also able to build a new happy relationship taking into account the mistakes of the past. Both his and my lives changed for the good.

Today I’ve stopped envying people who make their dreams come true, because now I know everything really depends on me.

If you want to know more about keeping the flame burning in the relationship and avoid cheating, how to stay desirable for your partner, how to get everything you have ever dreamt of and find courage to go against the rules, help me make my book available in the English language as well.

A mysterious stranger that came into my life wasn’t just good luck, it was my desire and readiness to get changed.

Ultimately, everything depends only on you.

 

Passion is the key ingredient to make everything in life meaningful. It’s a fundamental part of love, family, hobbies, work and dreams. There’s nothing you can successfully achieve without passion – and that’s the key ingredient of ‘In a Free Fall. Manipulator’. That’s why it has been changing the lives of so many women. The two interconnected books, which readers can choose in which order to read, tell a story of repressed passions that were released by the spark of a man who has greatly impacted my life, encouraging me to overcome my fears and doubts and reclaim the command of my destiny.

About the novel “In a free fall. Manipulator”

Originally written in Russian, many women have seen themselves in Christine, the book’s main character. Christine once wanted to be a famous journalist and write about the most beautiful places in the world, but she ended up selling lifeless diamonds in a trading center. Her dreams of fame were limited to a not very popular blog, and, while she hated routine, she got married at 24 to a life where each and every one of her dreams was sacrificed for the sake of the home and the family. As much as she didn’t like it, she coped with being patronized and controlled, she accepted jealousy, and she got used to live a life where her true self was crushed every day.

That was until she met the one man that was going to make her shatter all that rotten stability that she fought so hard to maintain… while hating it. And so she did. Enamored by his inspiring confidence, ambition and daring ways, she fell in love with a man who didn’t care about rules or conventions. She found a lover that fulfilled every desire that she could ever have, and who was the living example of the kind of liberty that Christine had always wanted to live by.

The choice wasn’t easy, though. Should a stable, robust and family-driven relationship take priority over an adventurous chain-breaking relationship with a man that truly wanted to see Christine being happy and free on her own terms? What would friends and family members think? How would one husband react? How would this new love behave, once she took that step? How would she transition from a repressed soul into a free spirit?

 

I’m sure that, just like I once felt, you need the right dose of motivation to live the life you were meant to live. You know that life as you’ve lived it this far is nothing like what you dreamed for you, but you also know that the fear of change is beyond intimidating. More than reading self-help messages that no one ever really puts in practice, you feel that you need real-life examples that can prompt you into creating meaningful change. You know that this will give you the kind of confidence and encouragement that no vague idea can.

What are the benefits of the book?

So these are all reasons for you to read this book. It will help you to visualize how you could make this kind of change in your life. It will help you to understand the peculiarities of male and female logics, and how the thought process differs so strikingly in both genders. It will help you to be certain that your thoughts, doubts and wishes are correct, and that you have every right to act upon them.

The reason why I am sure that ‘In a Free Fall. Manipulation’ will help you is because hundreds of women have told me so. They read it in Russian, in the book’s original version, and they told me how much it changed their lives. They told me that I had to have it published in English, so that more women’s lives could be changed.

And that’s exactly what I am inviting you to do – help me change your life while also helping other women to change theirs. That’s why I am seeking to raise $67,000 to:

Where will funds go?

  • have the book professionally translated into English. A good professional translator who knows how to work with literature doesn’t come cheap – and the book’s message is too important to have a poor translation that wouldn’t help anyone
  • have the book edited by a professional editor who can ensure that the English version of the book is perfectly written to please and help the women who will read it
  • have a talented design artist to create a spectacular book cover and illustrations – to honor the inspiring spirit of beauty and freedom that it talks about
  • have a marketing campaign run to promote it efficiently, so to make sure that as many women as possible know about it and have a chance of reading it
  • organize the interior layout of the book and have it converted into an eBook, to easily reach all audiences
  • fulfill the promised perks of the campaign
  • pay for every IndieGogo-related fee

Other ways you can help

That’s why I am asking you to support the translation and publishing of the English Edition of ‘Free Fall. Manipulator’, in any of the precious following ways:

  • Secure your early and very special access to this life-changing book by choosing one of the great rewards that I have on offer
  • Share this campaign with your friends and family members who may also need to read inspiring words of freedom and happiness to claim them for themselves
  • Use Facebook Posts, YouTube video sharing features, Tweeted Links to our IndieGogo page, and Shared Perk Pictures on Instagram to help get the word out

 

Zinaida K.

Lada Goldin! THANK YOU for this very useful and wonderful publication. Each woman should remember that nobody has TWO LIVES. It is THIS LIFE that YOU have to live AS YOU THINK it should be, without thinking about what other people could say. It is NEVER late to start AGAIN!!!

Olga W.

Unfortunately, your story came to an end… It filled me with pleasure and happiness, as I became aware that dreams are something so important in my life. It does not matter what other people think and say about them, whether they approve or disprove me for them… now I know I have to value every second and situation of my life. Well, we all understand that, but we rarely do it. I would like to follow this rule in my life and never forget it! Your story gave me warmth and showed light at the end of the tunnel. I was so absorbed in reading that heartfelt joy or fear, always wishing to know what was coming next. Frankly speaking, my heart stopped beating when I was reading about some situations… actually, I was still in this emotional state long after I stopped reading. The book is fabulous, you described everything with so many details, and it was wonderful! BRAVO! BRAVO! BRAVO! It goes without saying, I will read your book again!))). I am looking forward to your new story! By all means inform me about your new publication!

Ira Sh.

I just finished the book. It really helps to understand yourself and develop your relationship with a partner in an appropriate way, it really shows we should not be afraid of changes, as they are always for the better. 

Maria L.

I got interested in the book, as I am in a similar situation only 8 years after my marriage. Now I would like to sort out all my doubts. I, myself, prefer to go off the beaten paths. So, it was interesting to read and learn about a similar experience.

 

Why does your contribution matter a lot?

The beauty of crowdfunding is that every individual person holds the power in her hands to make a book project become a life-changing reality. We don’t need picky corporate publishers to decide what gets published, and we don’t need anyone’s permission to make something good positively affect thousands or even millions of lives. I’m calling on you to take that power in your own hands, support this project and use social media to make it go as far as it should – for the happiness, freedom and fulfillment of every woman on earth!

Pre-order your copy of the book

“In a Free Fall. Manipulator” today!

story:
Let Lefty, the living, dancing leftovers from the fridge of an absent minded doctor, bring smiles, giggles, imagination and dancing into your life. Conceived in 2003, and finally paired with a publisher and a very talented illustrator, The Doctor's Leftovers is a heartwarming callback to the rhyming stories we all knew and loved as children, with a dynamic, if a bit stinky, protagonist who just loves to move!

 

More Information:

He took it all home,
And put it away
Right there in his fridge
For some other day.

Now we all know too well
How quickly time passes,
And old food in the fridge
Makes int'resting gasses.

...

Lefty looked at the doc
With a puzzley glance,
Scratched his head and his nose
And hiked up his pants.

(Now I'd just like to note
that I put in the pants
cuz it's so hard to rhyme
with a word such as glance.)

Author's Note (yeah, a little wordy):

Waaaayyyy back in 2003, things in my life were bleak, to put it mildly (bear with me, the story gets better, I promise!) I was a living stereotype: 30 years old, freshly divorced, suddenly unemployed, and living in my parents' basement. Suffice to say that I was in a morbidly depressed state. But somehow, in the middle of it all, I felt inspired to turn to writing for therapy.

For a while, I was punching out VOLUMES of dark, heavy poetry and prose. But one day, in the midst of all that pain and unhappiness, and totally out of the blue, my imagination was tickled by Lefty, a whimsical, colorful, and dynamic "science experiment" of forgotten refrigerated leftovers. This was something I had to get written down. His story, though short, compelled me... enigmatic and smelling of spoiled onions and stinky cheese, Lefty loved nothing more than to be alive and to dance.

And so I wrote. It's not a long story, but it's a story full of smiles and surprises. It was Lefty that taught me to smile again. From the day that Lefty visited my imagination, things have been getting steadily better and I have wanted to share that sense of childlike glee with others ever since. As time passed I would occasionally talk to publishers or illustrators, but nothing ever clicked. So I just carried the story around with me, looking for opportunity but not pushing for any particular result.

Which is why now, today, I am delighted to be partnering with with the insanely talented illustrator Bernadette Craig and publisher Kore6 Media. After years of wishing it could be so, I present you, dear reader, with the opportunity to share in The Doctor's Leftovers. - Jared Rypka-Hauer, July 2019

What We Need & What You Get

Kore6 is a very small publisher and this is our first "actual book". Typically a publisher of comics and related fan art, we decided that this was a perfect opportunity for us to do a unique and interesting project. As such, we're using IndieGoGo to fund this as a boutique project, with potential for more projects to come if this one does well.

PLEASE HELP IT DO WELL! :-D

We aren't asking for more than it will take to fund the project. Basically, there's minimal profit in this project for any of us. The joy of sharing the characters and the story with adults and children alike are all the motivation we need.

We have surprises in store as the funding progresses! Cool things like... stickers! We can't tell you more or it won't be a surprise, but the keychains are REALLY COOL. Err... oops. OK, there will be stickers and keychains, but the rest is all surprise! You get the idea, right?

Stretch Goal #1 $3500

Stretch Goal #2 $4000

Stretch Goal #3 $4500

Stretch Goal #4 $5000

Stretch Goal #5 $5500

Stretch Goal #6 $6000

Stretch Goal #7 $6500

Stretch Goal #8 $7000

Stretch Goal #9 $7500

 

If we don't achieve the entire goal, all funds collected will be returned to the funders. We will only move forward with the project if we are fully funded.

 

The Impact

For Jared, "meeting" Lefty was a life-changing encounter. There was suddenly color in a very dark world. We believe that whimsy, color, imagination and motion are all critical to a life well lived, and even more for finding your way out of dark places. We want to share the story both because it was so key to Jared's own rediscovery of a world worth living in and because it's just a really cute story. We hope that by being able to publish this book we can bring a little more color and a whole bunch of smiles, giggles and fun to the world... for children and adults alike!

But, because we are doing this as a fully-funded-or-bust project, without the support we need? It just won't happen. We REALLY need your support to bring this little guy to the printed page.

Risks and Challenges

Kore6 is a very small publisher and we can't afford to carry an experimental project on our own dime. We have all the contacts for printing, distribution, delivery, and all the other elements necessary to make this a successful project, but we are turning to crowdsourcing the funds for this to mitigate our risk and evaluate interest in an independently published story book. If this works, there will be more!

As such, we'll say it one more time: this project is either fully funded (which strictly covers our production costs) or it won't move forward. Out of fairness to all involved, any funds collected will be returned to the funders if we don't hit our goal.

This itself is a bit risky on the "other side of the coin", because we believe this book deserves to be published but we are currently entirely dependent on meeting our fund raising goal.

Let's do this!!

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't afford to contribute to the project but believe in Lefty and his message of joie de vivre, even if you smell like spoiled onions and stinky cheese, please feel free to share our campaign link on social media or with your friends and acquaintances! We would love to get a feeling for how much interest there is in the community at large is, so even if you can't contribute by all means... feel free to leave us an encouraging comment! And of course you can always pick up a copy once we've gone to print.

Mostly we need help with getting the word out that there's an awesome project in the works... anything you can do to share it in the world would be appreciated!

Thank you for reading and we'll see you on the flip side!
story_txt: Let Lefty, the living, dancing leftovers from the fridge of an absent minded doctor, bring smiles, giggles, imagination and dancing into your life. Conceived in 2003, and finally paired with a publisher and a very talented illustrator, The Doctor's Leftovers is a heartwarming callback to the rhyming stories we all knew and loved as children, with a dynamic, if a bit stinky, protagonist who just loves to move! More Information:He took it all home,And put it awayRight there in his fridgeFor some other day.Now we all know too wellHow quickly time passes,And old food in the fridgeMakes int'resting gasses....Lefty looked at the docWith a puzzley glance,Scratched his head and his noseAnd hiked up his pants.(Now I'd just like to notethat I put in the pantscuz it's so hard to rhymewith a word such as glance.)Author's Note (yeah, a little wordy):Waaaayyyy back in 2003, things in my life were bleak, to put it mildly (bear with me, the story gets better, I promise!) I was a living stereotype: 30 years old, freshly divorced, suddenly unemployed, and living in my parents' basement. Suffice to say that I was in a morbidly depressed state. But somehow, in the middle of it all, I felt inspired to turn to writing for therapy.For a while, I was punching out VOLUMES of dark, heavy poetry and prose. But one day, in the midst of all that pain and unhappiness, and totally out of the blue, my imagination was tickled by Lefty, a whimsical, colorful, and dynamic "science experiment" of forgotten refrigerated leftovers. This was something I had to get written down. His story, though short, compelled me... enigmatic and smelling of spoiled onions and stinky cheese, Lefty loved nothing more than to be alive and to dance.And so I wrote. It's not a long story, but it's a story full of smiles and surprises. It was Lefty that taught me to smile again. From the day that Lefty visited my imagination, things have been getting steadily better and I have wanted to share that sense of childlike glee with others ever since. As time passed I would occasionally talk to publishers or illustrators, but nothing ever clicked. So I just carried the story around with me, looking for opportunity but not pushing for any particular result.Which is why now, today, I am delighted to be partnering with with the insanely talented illustrator Bernadette Craig and publisher Kore6 Media. After years of wishing it could be so, I present you, dear reader, with the opportunity to share in The Doctor's Leftovers. - Jared Rypka-Hauer, July 2019What We Need & What You GetKore6 is a very small publisher and this is our first "actual book". Typically a publisher of comics and related fan art, we decided that this was a perfect opportunity for us to do a unique and interesting project. As such, we're using IndieGoGo to fund this as a boutique project, with potential for more projects to come if this one does well.PLEASE HELP IT DO WELL! :-DWe aren't asking for more than it will take to fund the project. Basically, there's minimal profit in this project for any of us. The joy of sharing the characters and the story with adults and children alike are all the motivation we need.We have surprises in store as the funding progresses! Cool things like... stickers! We can't tell you more or it won't be a surprise, but the keychains are REALLY COOL. Err... oops. OK, there will be stickers and keychains, but the rest is all surprise! You get the idea, right?Stretch Goal #1 $3500Stretch Goal #2 $4000Stretch Goal #3 $4500Stretch Goal #4 $5000Stretch Goal #5 $5500Stretch Goal #6 $6000Stretch Goal #7 $6500Stretch Goal #8 $7000Stretch Goal #9 $7500 If we don't achieve the entire goal, all funds collected will be returned to the funders. We will only move forward with the project if we are fully funded. The ImpactFor Jared, "meeting" Lefty was a life-changing encounter. There was suddenly color in a very dark world. We believe that whimsy, color, imagination and motion are all critical to a life well lived, and even more for finding your way out of dark places. We hope that by being able to publish this book we can bring a little more color and a whole bunch of smiles, giggles and fun to the world... for children and adults alike!But, because we are doing this as a fully-funded-or-bust project, without the support we need? It just won't happen. We REALLY need your support to bring this little guy to the printed page.Risks and ChallengesKore6 is a very small publisher and we can't afford to carry an experimental project on our own dime. We have all the contacts for printing, distribution, delivery, and all the other elements necessary to make this a successful project, but we are turning to crowdsourcing the funds for this to mitigate our risk and evaluate interest in an independently published story book. If this works, there will be more!As such, we'll say it one more time: this project is either fully funded (which strictly covers our production costs) or it won't move forward. Out of fairness to all involved, any funds collected will be returned to the funders if we don't hit our goal.This itself is a bit risky on the "other side of the coin", because we believe this book deserves to be published but we are currently entirely dependent on meeting our fund raising goal.Let's do this!! Other Ways You Can HelpIf you can't afford to contribute to the project but believe in Lefty and his message of joie de vivre, even if you smell like spoiled onions and stinky cheese, please feel free to share our campaign link on social media or with your friends and acquaintances! We would love to get a feeling for how much interest there is in the community at large is, so even if you can't contribute by all means... feel free to leave us an encouraging comment! And of course you can always pick up a copy once we've gone to print.Mostly we need help with getting the word out that there's an awesome project in the works... anything you can do to share it in the world would be appreciated!Thank you for reading and we'll see you on the flip side!

story:
Maev is a buxom bounty hunter who doesn’t take $h!t from anyone...especially demons.

After a falling out with the legendary hunter's guild, Maev starts her own agency that specializes in demon exorcism, recovery, and destruction. 

Maev's aided by her tech wiz and confidant, Abe, who built the agency's website for people all over the world to submit their bounty hunter requests. Sometimes the targets are just dangerous humans, but demons dominate the top requests and those customers pay top dollar to get Maev to perform her powerful and effective exorcisms. Each exorcism allows Maev to perform some deliciously deviant and violent acts on her targets, something she craves constantly. It's an addiction she can't and won't shake. But she's damn good at her job, and she's got an edge over other bounty hunters...she's half demon.   

Her newest job takes her to THE BALTHABAR in New Orleans, USA, where she must perform an exorcism on her favorite kind of human...a woman. Her mouth drools from the anticipation as she makes her way to the target, but once on site, she quickly realizes that it's all a trap and must fight her way to safety.

Now, she's the hunted and must survive attacks from demons and veteran bounty hunters.

DIE DEMON! DIE!  has more than 30 sexy, steamy, erotic, and sordid black and white illustrations. Here's a sneak peek of some of the more detailed art in the book.

DIE DEMON! DIE! is a 100+ page erotic fantasy-action novella with more than 30 demonically delicious black and white illustrations.

There are four tiers:

THE DIGITAL DOWNLOAD 

Includes one digital copy (PDF) of DIE DEMON! DIE! with Original cover.

THE BOOK - ORIGINAL COVER or DEMON VARIANT

Includes one paperback copy of DIE DEMON! DIE! with your choice of the Original or Demon Variant covers and the digital download.

THE BOOK AND A PRINT - THIRSTY OR THIRSTY DEMON VARIANT

Includes one paperback copy of DIE DEMON! DIE! with your choice of the topless THIRSTY or THIRSTY DEMON variant cover, along with a special GOOEY 5 x 7 print, and the digital download. 

THE HARDCORE EDITION - ANY VARIANT

Includes one hardback copy of DIE DEMON! DIE! with your choice of any of the variant covers, along with a 5 x 7 print (any variant), and the digital download.

 Are you an adult that likes erotic action thrillers with a flair of fantasy and a taste for the supernatural? Then DIE DEMON! DIE! is the book for you!

story:
PARA ESPAÑOL VEA ESTE VIDEO 

 

The Story of my Book & Course 

My book and course is about loving who you are, increasing self-esteem, spiritual growth, confidence and relieving even eliminating self doubt lack of confidence. 

My name is Carolina Duarte, and this book is inspired based on exercises that, I believe, God gave me during difficult times to help me discover my true value and eventually leading me to find my true purpose.  

In these challenging times, people need guidance, love, to feel important and valued. To find love for themselves, grow spiritually and see the love of God. We all need the sense of a loving and caring community. Through this book and course, I'd like to help them discover their greatness, self-love, how much they have to give, and how valuable their talents and qualities are. Be a light so they can see their own light within.

Your contribution could have a double impact in the world :

 1. You will help change  people's lives by making this project become a reality.

2. It will give you, as a backer, the opportunity to make an impact in your own life, by finding your own greatness.

If the purpose of this book and course touches your heart, would you like to contributed and  be part of bringing positively to the world?

 

The Impact

My vision is to have  as many participants as possible from around the world, impacting individuals, families, and communities.  All guided by love and God. As the intention is to  reach out as many people as possible and taking advantage that I am bilingual; it would be in English and Spanish.  

Happiness is contagious, by impacting someone's life, the people around that person will be  impacted positively. That is how we can change the world, one person at   time, one day at a time.  Your contribution  could help people around the world, starting with  this project of discovering your greatness, which will open the doors to the ones to come.

 

The Journey and What it Needs

The journey is composed of 3 aspects: 

The book, "Discover Your Greatness" which is the based for the journey.

The creation of the course

Getting people to know about it. 

The money raised on this crowdfunding, will go to help cover for the following:

For edit, proofread, translate, and publish the book. Also it needs a book cover design.

For the creation of the course, which includes, the production, editing, uploading, hosting of the videos, also the platforms needed to keep them online. 

For the marketing of the course including social media, Facebook Ads, email marketing, book sites that offer promotions, etc. (I have a marketing background, which makes things easier, however, it is so much involved and I had never done marketing for books or courses and I need help from experts. )

The book is already written, it will be soon in the editing phase, then translation and finally publishing, once this is finished, the course creation part starts. The marketing started already and will continue until the course starts. 

My goal is to pre-sale 1000 books and have 100 participants for the journey. 

What it is About & What You Get

As a backer of this journey, you will get lifetime access,  you will actually experience the journey of discovering your talents and gifts. Discovery Your Greatness is meant to change your life, to have a positive impact in you and those around you. This is a 5 week self discovery journey that guides you to look deeply into yourself and find all the greatness within you. Every week there will be a recorded session and a support group meeting, where participants get the opportunity to share their challenges and successes. Little by little, you will discover and accept how much you have to offer, how valuable you are to God, His love and your love for you. 
I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who sign up for the journey or pre-order the book now:

You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish.

You will have the opportunity to be involved in selecting my cover.

You will be invited to join my Author Community and get behind-the-scenes sneak peeks into the publishing process.

As the first participants of this journey, you have exclusive access to the journey, the advantage of actively participating in giving feedback on how it can be improved for the next ones to come. You will  have a voice and an opinion on this process. 

And much more!

Risks & Challenges

I have launched similar projects, however, not on this industry. I have the knowledge and experience in marketing, I am learning the process for a book and a course. It involves a lot of work, I have limited resources so I will be doing many things myself and outsourcing others like book editing, proofreading and video editing. 

The main challenge will be staying on time with all the tasks as they are so many and I could under estimate the time they take. However, I am truly passionate about this project and what it means to me and people who will be impacted. My life mission is to help people have a happier and more fulfilling life, by find their greatness, their purpose, grow spiritually, overcome obstacle and many other ways. This is the beginning of a lifetime of on going projects to bring light to the world. 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

If this project touches your heart, tell everyone about it, help spread the word. 

If you, family member or a friend could benefit from this journey, tell them about it. 

Share it on social media, tell your friends about it. Share the love.

My Story

My name is Carolina Duarte, I changed my life completely to follow God's calling of becoming a writer and speaker. I took a big leap of faith leaving my career to step into the unknown. It has been challenging but I am happier and have a more purposeful life now. I want to do the same for others. God believed in me before I did. He saw in me qualities I didn't know I had so I can fulfill my purpose. Now, my mission and purpose is to help others find in them talents and gifts they do not know they have, so they can also find their purpose, and have a happier and more fulfilling life.

story:
Help me get this book to the world!

Hi. I'm Armaan. I would like to introduce to you 'Foray - Life Unexpected', a fiction novel. I have been spending a lot on researching and editing the book, to give you the ultimate experience of reading. In order for me to publish this book, please help me raise funds by backing my project and i promise i wont let you down. A link to the sample chapters are given below.

About the book


Foray is a fiction novel under the thriller genre. The story revolves around the life of a young boy who one's had a happy family.He is thrown into a world of misery and sadness at a very young age and he grows up to be something dangerous. He fights his way to achieve a peaceful life which he once had. The question is did he?
The book is packed with action and tragedy. Read the story unfold with a series of events and also get ready for the ultimate mystery and suspense.

Why Crowdfunding?

As i mentioned earlier i need your help to publish this book and let the whole world read it. The magnitude i would be reaching with my book depends on you! So please help me by backing my project.

What do i get?

First of all everybody has my love :)













Timeline


Stretch Goals


Risks & Challenges

The whole process of writing the book has been hectic. I had to manage my studies, projects along with writing. Lots' of sleepless nights and sacrifices have lead to this finished product. 

Editing and designing the book was another great hurdle on my way. I had to spend a lot on reviewing and designing my book. All the money came from my pocket money and thus had to miss a lot on college life.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you do not intend to contribute, you could spread the word about the campaign by sharing it on social media or by any other form.

story:
Radio Zapote es un proyecto de radio comunitaria, popular y estudiantil que se fundó en el año 2001

Cuando la Marcha del Color de la Tierra trajo a los Zapatistas a la Cd. de México a discutir la Ley Indígena en el Congreso, lo cual después se convirtiera en un fraude. Sin embargo, durante esa visita un amplio grupo de estudiantes, profesores, trabajadores, comunicadores y gente de la sociedad civil, consideraron que era necesario tener un medio propio para dar a conocer y acompañar las actividades de la caravana Zapatista en la lucha que emprendían en aquel momento.

Después de 15 años ininterrumpidos de trabajo, el colectivo actual está conformado por un grupo diverso de personas entre estudiantes, profesores, artistas, activistas, músicos, productores indígenas, y se mantiene permanentemente abierta la invitación a participar en el espacio de la radio. Nuestras decisiones se conducen a través de un COMITÉ EDITORIAL en el que participan por igual todas las personas del colectivo en una estructura horizontal, así que no existe una figura como un director/a de la radio, por lo tanto siempre es posible acudir a las cabinas y plantear alguna situación directamente con las personas que se encuentren laborando en un día o turno.

Esta campaña es importante porque al recuperar y mejorar nuestras condiciones de trabajo mediante la adquisición de nuevo equipo; continuaremos con la labor de acompañamiento a diferentes movimientos sociales que han sido victimas del Estado Mexicano, a través nuestras producciones difundimos sus historias, palabra y su sentir, de la misma forma brindamos herramientas comunicacionales a comunidades para que ellos mismo puedan difundir sus problemáticas desde sus propias narrativas.  

Al recuperar nuestro equipo y con parte de las contribuciones podremos continuar acompañando procesos de comunicación en

Comunidades indígenas, casos de crímenes de estado, despojo de tierras, desaparición forzada, y rompiendo el cerco informativo que es evidente en los medios de comunicación convencionales imponen una narrativa alejada de la situación real cotidiana de los ciudadanos mexicanos.

Esperamos reunir lo suficiente para mejorar la infraestructura de nuestras cabinas, de igual forma poder solventar los gastos de coberturas de diversos temas en regiones alejadas y continuar con nuestros talleres en diversas comunidades. Al llegar a estos objetivos obtienes la seguridad de que haz contribuido a apoyar un proyecto real, que influye en la opinión publica ademas de premios por tu contribución, materiales desarrollados de manera autogestiva para difundir nuestros trabajos

Necesitamos de tu valiosa ayuda para volver a recuperar nuestro equipo y seguir acompañando movimientos sociales, con ello financiar viáticos, equipo de campo, estancias en comunidades.

Cuéntale a la gente sobre tus recompensas exclusivas. ¡Haz que se entusiasmen!

Si tu apoyo es de Más de 100 dolares el premio es de una playera más un disco de nuestros mejores programas.

Si tu apoyo es mayor a 500 dolares tu premio será de 5 postales de fotos de coberturas más una playera y disco de programas y un documental.

Si tu apoyo es de más de 1000 dolares tu premio será de 1 cuadro enmarcado más postales, más playera, más disco, más documental.

Si desafortunadamente no se logra recaudar lo estimado todos los fondos se destinaran a la infraestructura de la cabina. ( compraremos de acuerdo a lo recaudado, cables, consola, micrófonos, pedestales,

 Actualmente en México donde la libertad de expresión es atacada por distintos actores políticos el proyecto comunicacional de radio zapote

Es importante para romper el cerco informativo, así como para seguir impulsando proyectos en las comunidades indígenas, campesinas y populares para que sean ellos mismos los que tomen los medios de comunicación.

A lo largo de 15 años hemos impulsado talleres en diferentes comunidades campesinas, indígenas y populares

Hemos cubierto coyunturas como los terribles hechos de Atenco en (2006), Fraude electoral (2006), Ataque a caravana de la paz de San Juan Copala (2010) Encarcelamiento de Mario Luna en Sonora (2014) Ayotzinapa (2014) Bachajón, Chiapas (2015), acompañamiento a primeras elecciones por usos y costumbres en cheran2015),Nochixtlán (2016) y continuamos acompañando a diversos movimientos sociales en su esfuerzo por resistir la represión sistemática del estado Mexicano.

Al son de “Estamos en todas partes” mediolibristas de Radio Zapote y del Centro de Medios Libres participamos en la organización de actividades autogestivas de comunicación en la Carpa de Comunicación del Foro Social Mundial en el Zócalo de la Ciudad de México (2010), Nominados a mejor radio por Internet por parte de Indie-O Music Awards IMAZ (2011), Fuimos convocados para dar nuestra lectura acerca de la situación de la libertad de Expresión en el Tribunal Permanente de los Pueblos en la Audiencia de Medios y Desinformación (En Septiembre de 2014) Difundimos expresiones musicales artísticas solidarias, hemos tenido en nuestra cabina a artistas de la talla de Anita Tijoux rapera Chilena que reivindica diferentes movimientos sociales de su país y del mundo así como a Rudolph “Garth” Dennis miembro original de la fraternidad musical de Trenchtown en Kingston, Jamaica, el lugar de nacimiento de la música reggae, miembro fundador de Black Uhuru (junto con Don Carlos y Duckie Simpson) en loa años 70’s, agrupación con la que hizo sus primeras grabaciones, para después integrarse a los Wailing Souls (cuya llegada, le dio mas popularidad a la agrupación). Garth ha sido cuatro veces nominado al Grammy y ha trabajado en la industria del entretenimiento por unos 30 años. Por mencionar a algunos.

Actualmente Trabajamos en el acompañamiento de diferentes movimientos sociales, por ejemplo: caravana de victimas del estado en la Unión Americana, Caravanas de Madres de desaparecidos de Centro América, Presos Políticos de México y del Mundo, Policías Comunitarias del Estado de Guerrero, Comunidad Indígena de Cherán, Comunidad Indígena de San Francisco Xochicuautla, Comunidad Indígena de Huitzizilapan, Comunidad Indígena de San Sebastián Bachajón, Comunidades Zapatistas, Pertenecemos a la red #RompeElMiedo red impulsada por articulo 19 México, medios libres y defensores de derechos humanos para la denuncia de la criminalización de personas que documentan manifestaciones, Pertenecemos a la red Tejemedios que vincula a diversos medios libres e independientes, Colaboramos con diversas redes de radios comunitarias de Oaxaca y Guerrero.

Esta es la primera vez que realizamos un fondeo, nuestro trabajo ha sido siempre colaborativo y autogestivo, la motivación de esta nueva etapa es la necesidad de afrontar un panorama adverso mediante nuestra herramienta comunicacional, de esta manera continuaremos apoyando y difundiendo los ataques a defensores de derechos humanos ya que creemos que en los siguientes dos años se agudizará la represión y criminalización de medios independientes, periodistas comprometidos, defensores de derechos humanos, defensores de la tierra y en general de la población civil por parte del estado, empresas transnacionales y del crimen organizado.
story_txt:
Radio Zapote es un proyecto de radio comunitaria, popular y estudiantil que se fundó en el año 2001
Cuando la Marcha del Color de la Tierra trajo a los Zapatistas a la Cd. de México a discutir la Ley Indígena en el Congreso, lo cual después se convirtiera en un fraude. Sin embargo, durante esa visita un amplio grupo de estudiantes, profesores, trabajadores, comunicadores y gente de la sociedad civil, consideraron que era necesario tener un medio propio para dar a conocer y acompañar las actividades de la caravana Zapatista en la lucha que emprendían en aquel momento.
Después de 15 años ininterrumpidos de trabajo, el colectivo actual está conformado por un grupo diverso de personas entre estudiantes, profesores, artistas, activistas, músicos, productores indígenas, y se mantiene permanentemente abierta la invitación a participar en el espacio de la radio. Nuestras decisiones se conducen a través de un COMITÉ EDITORIAL en el que participan por igual todas las personas del colectivo en una estructura horizontal, así que no existe una figura como un director/a de la radio, por lo tanto siempre es posible acudir a las cabinas y plantear alguna situación directamente con las personas que se encuentren laborando en un día o turno.
Esta campaña es importante porque al recuperar y mejorar nuestras condiciones de trabajo mediante la adquisición de nuevo equipo; continuaremos con la labor de acompañamiento a diferentes movimientos sociales que han sido victimas del Estado Mexicano, a través nuestras producciones difundimos sus historias, palabra y su sentir, de la misma forma brindamos herramientas comunicacionales a comunidades para que ellos mismo puedan difundir sus problemáticas desde sus propias narrativas.  
Al recuperar nuestro equipo y con parte de las contribuciones podremos continuar acompañando procesos de comunicación en
Comunidades indígenas, casos de crímenes de estado, despojo de tierras, desaparición forzada, y rompiendo el cerco informativo que es evidente en los medios de comunicación convencionales imponen una narrativa alejada de la situación real cotidiana de los ciudadanos mexicanos.
Esperamos reunir lo suficiente para mejorar la infraestructura de nuestras cabinas, de igual forma poder solventar los gastos de coberturas de diversos temas en regiones alejadas y continuar con nuestros talleres en diversas comunidades. Al llegar a estos objetivos obtienes la seguridad de que haz contribuido a apoyar un proyecto real, que influye en la opinión publica ademas de premios por tu contribución, materiales desarrollados de manera autogestiva para difundir nuestros trabajos
Necesitamos de tu valiosa ayuda para volver a recuperar nuestro equipo y seguir acompañando movimientos sociales, con ello financiar viáticos, equipo de campo, estancias en comunidades.
Cuéntale a la gente sobre tus recompensas exclusivas. ¡Haz que se entusiasmen!
Si tu apoyo es de Más de 100 dolares el premio es de una playera más un disco de nuestros mejores programas.
Si tu apoyo es mayor a 500 dolares tu premio será de 5 postales de fotos de coberturas más una playera y disco de programas y un documental.
Si tu apoyo es de más de 1000 dolares tu premio será de 1 cuadro enmarcado más postales, más playera, más disco, más documental.
Si desafortunadamente no se logra recaudar lo estimado todos los fondos se destinaran a la infraestructura de la cabina. ( compraremos de acuerdo a lo recaudado, cables, consola, micrófonos, pedestales,

Es importante para romper el cerco informativo, así como para seguir impulsando proyectos en las comunidades indígenas, campesinas y populares para que sean ellos mismos los que tomen los medios de comunicación.

story:
The Story

Hi there! Thank you for dropping by. The adventurous Young Adult novel ‘Smoske, the Reluctant Rhino’ has been published in 2014 in the Netherlands. It had some great reviews and almost a 1,000 books were sold and it supported World Wide Fund for Nature (WWF) with €2 per sold copy to help them saving rhinoceros. Unfortunately, 4 years later, it is still necessary to contribute to the protection of these ancient animals against poaching. Now we would like to publish an English version of the story.

We are delighted to announce that WWF will benefit with 10% from all our book sales. In the future, we may even collaborate with the WWF on many other associated publishing projects. We are thinking of a picture book, translations in other languages like French and German, and there are even thoughts of developing an animation movie.

It all starts here and now, with publishing the translation of Smoske, the Reluctant Rhino. You can help us in many ways, and we will need it!

 

So what’s the plan?

We have actually started with translating the novel already. David Scherpenhuizen, who has published several novels himself, is in charge of that. We hope to get support to be able to adapt the story better to a new language and to have it edited and print a beautiful product again.

Also, Smoske will have a new look! That awesome old cover was made by illustrator Marike Knaapen. She is working on a new design as of now, and she hopes that we will have enough funds to be able to get started with the picture book for the little ones. One of the perks you can back Smoske with is a beautiful poster of her hand.

Jenny Ferguson, Marie-Louise Klerkx and Michiel Kamphuis himself, the author and publisher of the original Dutch version, will be in charge of managing the project and available for any of your questions.

 

Is there a timeline?

Yes, there is. After publishing Smoske in Dutch we have already been talking about going abroad. In summer 2017 we started looking for a translator and after having compared proofreads from different translators David Scherpenhuizen was the  obvious one to work together with.

In 2018 we started setting up this crowdfunding campaign and from here we will need you. In August, September and October we will continue to write, edit, re-write and re-edit the story while also the cover will be redesigned. In November we will get the book ready for printing and have it on your doormat well before Christmas making it an ideal present for that wonderful time of year.

 

To make it happen

To make the publishing of ‘Smoske, the Reluctant Rhino’ happening we will need to raise at least €10,000. These funds will go to the creative part of the job, the printing, distribution and of course the World Wide Fund for Nature.

 

Any more funds will mean we will be able to make a better product (think of better paper and extra editors) and creating possibilities for the picture book, translations in more languages and it will mean more support for rhinoceros. The first stretched goal: €15,000 - Smoske becomes a picture book!

 

The challenges of what is left to be done...

As said the translation has already been done for a large part. What remains is adapting and editing the story.

In meanwhile the cover will be perfectioned and we will need to find a company to help us getting the books actually printed and distributed. We hope to find a similar company as we have done for the Dutch version, but one that is specialized in the English language market. We are actually on that already and comparing offers. We need to keep going because the timeline towards Christmas is tight, yet possible.

A last risk we are facing is having a lot of distribution costs. Therefore part of the funds will be set aside for this already and backers will have to contribute extra shipping costs if applicable to the ordered perk.

 

Stop it!

Of course there are other ways you could be a help. First of all: stop using rhino horn for your hangovers and stop poaching rhinoceros!

Surely you have never done this at all... well then, share our story, that will be of great help. You can use the tools on this page to copy this link to your social media, send emails, whatsapp messages or any other platforms you use to communicate with your friends.

Thank you so much for your support!

Michiel and the Smoske team.

story: [...]

Short Summary

My name is Deniz and I am a curious sociologist. Being a sociologist is one of my dreams and I am practising it willingly now. I conducted lots of Projects until now, especially on my favourite subjects; cinema, cinema and women, women silence on the cinema, old people, aging, youth, children and the relationship between children and elder people.

I wrote two books depending on my researches. First one is about an oral history research which I conducted for 4 years. I studied elder people with the Project. It drew my way for the second book. My second book is a fairytale book for children. This one is very important for me because I studied with elder people and children aged 4-7 together. It was an amazing and useful research for me. Thanks to it I learned lots of things and especially new and original tales from the elder people. That's why I decided to continue my research about the relationship between children and elder people. 

Here is my first fairytale book: 

 

Culture changes types of relationships and it worths to investigate. Every culture creates its own tales and the way of telling them to the next generations. I believe that the way of telling sth. or oral customs are the most important and simplest  way of tranferring the knowledge and experience. Thanks to my Project, Ubuntu, I intend to maintain these customs through listening fairy tales from the elder people. I did it in my country Turkey at first, and I will continue in various parts of the World. My next station will be United States of America. 

What 'UBUNTU' means?

When I was thinking about how can I describe you the perspective of 'Ubuntu', I remembered a story. Here is the story and also the meaning of 'Ubuntu': 

An antropologist proposed a game to the kids in an African tribe. He put a basket full of fruit near a tree and told the kids that who ever got there first won the sweet fruits. When he told them to run they they all took each others hands and ran together, then sat together enjoying their treats. When he asked them why they had run like that as one could have had all the fruits for himself they said: "UBUNTU, how can one of us be happy if all the other ones are sad?"

UBUNTU means 'I am because we are'.  

I will proposed these type of games for the children and grandparents, and these times will be our UBUNTU sessions. 

How will the Project come true? 

Briefly, there are 3 main phases of the Project. 

1. Conducting different meeting point with the elder people and children aged 4-7. (It can be at home, at school or at a nursing home.)

2. Practising the Ubuntu sessions (In these sessions we all experience the motto 'I am because we are'). 

I will observe the relationship between grandfathers-grandmothers and grandkids;

- How they play,

- How they communicate,

- Which subjects they talk.

I will ask for listening fairy tales with grandkids, and after that we will talk about it together.

- How the kids find the fairy tale,

- Listening a fairy tale is funny or boring,

- How they all analyze the relationship between each other and so on. 

3. Writing the aimed fairy tale book. (I will arrange the fairy tale that I heard from the elder people, the real story of them and the relationship between them. After that I will narrate my own fairy tales.) 

What We Need & What You Get

Arranging  minimum 50 interviews is the main goal of the Project. The score of the interviews broaden diversity o the fairytales. 

It will continue 9 months. The interviews will be conducted in the first 6 months. Analyzing the interviews and writing the book will be at the last 3 months. 

All meeting's will be photographed, and they will be shared throughout the Project. So I will update followers frequently. These photographs will be also used in the book. 

The name of the book can be chosen with the contributors.

 

Where will the money go?

All the funding generated from this campaign will go directly towards the travel requirements, editing, proofreading, rewards, supplies and support staff to complete the project. The most pressing financial needs are meeting the enormous burden of travelling and transcribing the interview content. I live in İstanbul, and I need to travel and live in the USA for 6 months. It is hard for me to cover all of the expenses. 

Budget Breakdown:

Project Goal Total: $20,000

Interview Transcription: 28%

Travel: 28%

Video/Photo : 5%

Editing: 12%

Web Support: 10%

Creative Design: 7%

Contributor Rewards: 5%

Indigogo Costs: 5%

 

The Name of the Book

I believe we will make a great Project thanks to you, and we will read an interesting and funny fairytale book together. Because of that I thought we should choose the name of the book together. You can all join the process! 

How will it be possible? 

When I start writing the book, I will share small pieces of tales and suitable names for the book. According to your comments or votes we will decide the name of the book. So you will be definitely contribute the book. 

You can see some photos from my first book: 

 

 

 

 

 

 

If you want to learn more details, please contact with me..

story:
When I raise enough money for this high fantasy, adventure, and a hint of romance e-book, I will be able to let my story out in the open more. For example, ads, merchandises, and even one day turning Cast Spellers into an adventure game. Which will be incredible. But who knows, I might get it published in print instead. And that will be equally great.

Please, read the free sample version and donate if you wish too. Also, if you really enjoyed it(which I know you will fall in love with it) buy the full version for 2.99 on Amazon.

Just search for 'Nige Cooper' and my story will appear. Or click the link below. 

Thank you. :) --Nige Cooper

Cast Spellers

For example, ads, merchandises, and even one day turning Cast Spellers into an adventure game. Which will be incredible. But who knows, I might get it published in print instead. And that will be equally great.Please, read the free sample version and donate if you wish too. Also, if you really enjoyed it(which I know you will fall in love with it) buy the full version for 2.99 on Amazon.Just search for 'Nige Cooper' and my story will appear. Or click the link below. Thank you. :) --Nige CooperCast Spellers

story:
The Cause:

Enable our daughters to discover the truth about themselves:

  • who they are
  • how God defines and determines their worth and value
  • walk out the destiny God has purposed for each one of them
  • understand the proper definition of truth, love, and beauty

The Purpose:

Bring the life transforming truth of God to our girls in a non-threatening, easy to read, thought provoking format. Each chapter exposes a specific lie, prompts them to search their hearts, journal, and motivates them to take action. Each step sets them free of the lies, misconceptions and faulty thought patterns that have enslaved us. I expect, and fervently pray, this new found freedom will serve as a catalyst, fueling their passion to become everything God purposed them to be. As the truth soaks into the hearts and minds of our girls, they will have the confidence to walk into this deceptive world  armed and empowered to influence rather than be influenced and leave their indelible mark in this world.

Sadly the majority of our girls lack the confidence, self esteem and courage they need to accept and believe in themselves. Having worked as a youth leader, I saw first hand how most strive to fit into the world's definition of beauty, success, and confidence.  My suspisions proved true when I surveyed girls for this book. The girls surveyed all attended church, youth groups, retreats, and/or christian schools. Most of them did not know:

  • How God defines them and what that means for them
  • Why they are valuable and what determines that
  • Feel beautiful and confident
  • Understand that they have a purpose and destiny 

Additionally, the majority do not believe in absolutes. These are girls growing up in Christian environments across denominational lines, imagine those with little or no exposure to truth?!?! 

The Impact

Give rise to a generation of confident and empowered women influencing the world instead of the world influencing them.

By defining and describing love, truth, beauty, the voice of God, the voice of the Enemy and the voices of society, family, friends/peers, religion, media (music, books, magazines, TV, and movies) and social media we provide our girls with a solid foundation they can build upon. 

Imagine if every youth group in the whole world set out to spend a few weeks studying with our girls these life transforming truths. I see chains breaking off, walls tumbling down, spiritual eyes being opened, hearts being mended, the brokenhearted restored, the lost found, the weak strengthened and empowered, the rejected accepted, the hurting comforted, and the captive set free. We would see revival. 

However, this will only happen if we teach our girls truth. Without truth they cannot recognize the lies, deceptions and misconceptions they have accepted as truth and is wreaking havoc in their lives.

How do I know this will work? Because I am living proof that God's word is alive, active, powerful and will not return void or empty. The truth of who I am, what that means to me and for me is giving me the courage I need to face whatever comes my way. I know that I know, that my failures, past mistakes, people's opinions, weaknesses, successes, accomplishments and triumphs do not define me. God does!!! Grasping that truth is life transforming and liberating. I want my girls to know this and live it out! I want all women to know it and live it out! I want to invade the enemy's territory and take back what he has stolen from us. Do you want that for your daughters? I do!!! Therefore, with God's help and anointing, I will do everything in my power to get the truth out. Will you help me?

What We Need

I say we because I cannot do this on my own. My biggest obstacle is the finances. No surprise right, or I wouldn't be here. However, I don't just need or want money. Shocked?!?! Curious?!?!

Good, allow me to explain.

I've heard many stories about how promising ventures with healthy budgets have failed miserably due to inexperience. I don't want to be one of them. I've also heard how great projects have never come to fruition due to the lack of finances. I don't want that to happen to me. I'm not naive, I know I can't do it all, nor do I want to. So here's what I really want:

  1. Prayer: I don't want anything God doesn't want for me. Therefore, I sincerely covet your prayers. More than anything, I want this book to transform lives. Who cares if I sell hundreds of thousands of copies and lives are not changed for the better. I am not interested in being entertaining, sounding intelligent or as if I have it all together - because I don't, I'm still a work in progress. I am not interested in becoming famous and rich (Lord knows that is the last thing I want.) What I really and truly want is to see a generation transformed, armed, and empowered to invade the enemy's territory to take our promised land. This cannot be accomplished in my own strength. I need God, which means I need your prayers so that I stay focused and in tune to what the Holy Spirit tells me. Please cover this project, my life and family in your prayers because if God is not going with me, I'm not going. I don't want to meet my creator and have him say to me that my book was a financial success but a spiritual failure. I want to hear him say it was a spiritual success and show me how it transformed the lives of many.
  2. Experts: I am looking for people who are willing to use their talents and expertise in networking, marketing, social media, publishing, graphic design, videography, photography, sales, public relations and advertising  to help me out. Imagine how your services can be an invaluable help to this project. Using your talents to impact the lives of so many in this world will not only be rewarding in this life but in the next to come. Not all of us are called to go, but we are all called to send and sending does not always mean giving money.
  3. Money: If someone steps up to the plate in each of the above categories, I don't think I'll need any money. Seriously, as that's what the money will be going towards. However, If I need to fill those shoes, with God's grace and help, I'm up for the challenge. My goal will be to raise at least $10,000. 

The money raised will be used for:

  • professional book editing (as you may have noticed, my grammar can use the help ;-)
  • a graphic designer to take my word document and create the book's layout as a PDF document to the printer's specification and layout the design cover according to the printer's specifications. 
  • a social media expert to produce and ensure the success of quality and engaging posts geared specifically towards parents, youth leaders and our girls on Instagram, Snapchat, Twitter, YouTube, Google+, and Facebook.
  • marketing - I would like to hire a book publicist who can coordinate interviews (both print and broadcast) and handle public relations. I will need the help of someone who knows how to contact the right people and bring attention to the book using proven channels. This will deplete a significant part of the budget if no one steps up.
  • advertising - most of this will go towards sponsoring ads in social media, rather than traditional advertising. However, some will go towards banner ads on christian sites
  • a website
  • a photographer 

What You Get

I have created different levels of support that I pray will make it easy and rewarding for most to get involved and become a part of something significant and greater than ourselves.

Perk #1: Receive a pre-release signed copy of the book with your support of $35

Perk #2: Receive a pre-release signed copy of the book and Journal with your support of $65

Perk #3: Receive a pre-release signed copy of the book, aJournal and an 8x10 plaque with the quote "The World does not define me" for your support of $95

Perk #4: Receive a pre-release signed copy of the book, aJournal, an 8x10 plaque with the quote "The World does not define me"  and a T-shirt with the same quote for your support of $125

Perk #5: Aside from receiving the items of Perk #4, you will receive a #Becoming Backpack and your name will be mentioned and thanked in the book as a key supporter of this project for your support of $500

Perk#6: Aside from receiving the items of Perk #5, you will receive a #Becoming Bar Necklace and your name will be mentioned and thanked in the book as a key supporter of this project for your support of $1,000. 

 

Risks & Challenges

Risk Assessment: At the risk of sounding ignorant, I don't believe there is any risk. Allow me to explain. I say this because in the Fall of 2015 I published my first book, Journey to Faith - Through the Eyes of the Wise Men. I successfully brought that project to completion. I had never navigated the waters of self publishing before and would not allow my budget of $1,200 to deter me. With God's help I sold over 1,000 copies with no money for marketing, advertising, social media etc. My budget, if we can even call it that, allowed me to create a website through Wix (journeytofaithbook.com), under employ a very talented artist and graphic designer and pay for fees (ISBN numbers, copyrights, printing charges, etc.) 

Although to many this may be considered a failure, I see it as a successful stepping stone. Finding an agent for a seasonal children's story is impossible. The season is short and the market too small, they are not interested. When that door closed, I walked into self publishing. Although the odds were stacked against me,  I hadn't heard of crowdfunding and all I had was $1,200, I went ahead and published my book. After all was said and done, my Facebook page had more than 400 likes, my Goodreads profile had a 4.71 out of 5 book rating, and I sold approximately 1,000 copies of Journey to Faith, all while actually making a profit. Imagine what we can accomplish together now that I am more experienced and with your financial backing!

Challenges: I believe the greatest challenge is finances. However, not raising the money will not prevent me from completing this project it will only slow down my time table. It will take me a lot longer to get the word out as I will again have no budget for marketing, advertising or social media. However, having walked this road before only serves to make me more confident that, with God's help, I will accomplish the desire he has hidden in my heart. Since this is not a seasonal book, my efforts will not lose momentum and will ultimately produce a snowball effect. Please do not confuse my confidence with arrogance. I just know I have a struck a nerve with this subject and that God's word is liberating. The passion burning in my soul is fueled by the redemptive work God has done in my life. Therefore, nothing is going to stop me from getting this message out. Whatever happens, I am confident that he is in control. As long as he is, my time and effort will not be wasted  and should you partner with me, neither will yours --- ultimately, that is what matters most.

story:
THE WRITER

I am a science-fiction/fantasy writer from Cluj-Napoca, located in Transylvania, Romania. I am married and have 4 children. Even though I have started writing during my childhood a few novellas and short stories, this is the first full-length novel I intend to publish. To me writing has always had a cathartic effect; the images, stories and characters live within me, my life goes on simultaneously with that of my characters; I can feel their will, their motivations and desires as they flow through me and make me live a parallel life alongside them. The worlds in which my characters exist is every bit as real as the world in which we live.

THE NOVEL

The „Black Pigeon” novel was initially imagined as an initiation journey, both for the writer and those behind the characters and of course the readers. In unconventional fashion, the novel has 7 of its characters guided by real people, who act as avatars in the world of Black Pigeon. Being an interactive novel, each of the 7 characters can partially influence the story, with the author only controlling the overall storyline and the secondary characters. The characters „grow” as the action unfolds and can transform and evolve in order to meet the challenges which lay ahead. The novel is also a consecration journey for myself, a necessary and welcome metanoia, as Sagrada Familia was for Gaudi. Similar to the genius architect, I envision the abstract form of the novel, its basic structure made from interfering forces which can converge or divide. Its final structure will be a journey of discovery, growth and metamorphosis for all involved, myself included.

What is the novel actually about?

If we are to boil down the story, it is about a small group of friends who in the year 2223 are part of a little known organization, known as The Protectors of Igfon. The story revolves around them and around the adventures they go through in an attempt to solve seemingly impossible mysteries. One of these mysteries is The Black Pigeon, a woman possessing special paranormal abilities and whose aura awakens in those around her a sharp feeling of guilt and remorse, reminding them of their own sins and mistakes. The most serious effect is manifested in those who spend too much time around her, as they risk going insane or committing suicide. The small group, the generic party if you will, tries to uncover why such an entity is present on Earth and how they could go about stopping the negative effects she has to those around her. As the novel starts out in an easily-understandable fashion, I have decided to keep the cryptic and intricate stories towards the end in a not too sudden but constant crescendo, until such time that all the secrets are revealed in a more-or-less explicit fashion.

 

Where can we read the first few pages of the novel?

The first pages of the novel can be read on my website: https://theblackpigeon.com/ 

You can also download them here:

https://theblackpigeoncom.files.wordpress.com/2017/05/black-pigeon-for-public-0013.pdf

I will add more content on a weekly basis.

Why am I writing this novel?

I have always been fascinated by the field of futurology, by those who have the gift of presenting a possible future and a science-fiction novel is the perfect opportunity to dabble in the multitude of  possibilities. The future presented in this novel is an amplified one, as during the 200 years which have passed, the problems of today’s world have multiplied and become more serious. The world of The Black Pigeon is the scene of intense fighting between various organizations, each with a strong desire for power and control over the population, in both the real and virtual worlds. In this world, common sense is all but extinct and greed and exacerbated sexuality are common. It is a world which becomes more diluted with each passing day, becoming a sick mix of many small people who consider themselves to be outstanding. In many regards, today’s world is gradually shifting towards the one presented in The Black Pigeon. On the surface it appears interesting and appealing, but once you enter you discover it is faded and lacking the strength of sacred essences.

The second reason for writing this novel is the combination of science-fiction and fantasy, which beyond the obvious contrast, represents a challenge in itself. The science-fiction portion of The Black Pigeon stems from the environment and technology of the world and the fantasy portion is based on the link between the ancestral past and the highly technological future. Behind this revolution of the human ontological status are The Protectors of the Igfon (Igfon was the name of a sacred forest in the Apuseni Mountains, as attested in official records from the 9th and 10th centuries). They are the ones who are capable of establishing an essential connection between the sacred past and the technological present, being the keepers of ancient wisdom, hidden in myths and forgotten rituals kept only in small regions of ancient Dacia. One of these regions, known as Codru Moma (or The Woods of the Mother – Woods of the Mother of the Forest – an ancestral dendrological entity who supposedly rules the forests) is the home of the witches (chosen women, who are said to have been marked at birth by the forest entities and therefore gifted with special powers) and of the solomonari. The witches are the guardians of the feminine mysteries of birth and transformation, the ones who can tame the wilderness and make the world sacred. The „solomonari” are masters of the elements and holders of an enormous power through which they can command the elemental powers of nature, can heal or foresee the future. With the help of the Protectors of the Igfon this forgotten ancestral knowledge is integrated into the highly technological future, healing it and restoring its long-lost sacred meaning, which is in fact the basis of life itself.

This is what I wish from my novel – to bring a little ancestral magic in today`s world. I am not talking about spectacular magic, but about something much more tangible, something fundamental, rooted in a philosphical/religios/magical system possessing both mystical and practical traits. Modern society, as Mircea Eliade wrote, needs to rediscover the lost meaning of the sacred, forgotten meanings stemming from modern man’s technological advancements. I believe there is still a plethora of profound concepts that we no longer know and which can be restored and given back to humanity as to achieve an improved relationship between man and nature, as well as its own being. Ironically, modern man knows more about the non-European sacred aspects and mythology than about those which were the foundation of the Renaissance, Illuminism and modern culture.  There are numerous Eastern European folk tales which talk of myths, stories, songs, charms and proverbs which are completely unknown to modern man and could significantly enrich today’s world which finds itself at a lack of identity and purpose. In this sense, the novel is designed to be a preamble, an invitation to future spiritual treasure seekers who will search for the lost meanings of the old Dacia lands: Țara Crișurilor, Țara Moților, Țara Zarandului, Țara Oașului, Țara Maramureșului and many others.

Why is there a need for a fundraising campaign?

As we all know, any good book is made of time, hard work, dedication and passion. All those require a certain level of financial stability for the author to really immerse himself in its creation and do it to the best of his ability.

The Black Pigeon has, besides the author, another seven people who work on their novel characters. They have to be compensated for their work, as well, as do all the others involved in this project such as editors and translators.

The $20,000 shall be distributed as follows: 1,000 for design (the cover, website and logo), 1,000 for the those behind the driven characters, 5,000 for editing and publishing, 7,000 for translation and 6,000 for the author.

What happens if the campaign yields less than anticipated?

The money shall be spent in order of importance on editing and publishing, translation and design. The novel shall be published even if the campaign goal is not met but will take longer to complete. The estimated completion target date is 1 year following the end of the campaign if the goal is reached and 2 – 2.5 years if not.
