The first pages of the novel can be read on my website: https://theblackpigeon.com/ 
You can also download them here:
https://theblackpigeoncom.files.wordpress.com/2017/05/black-pigeon-for-public-0013.pdf
I will add more content on a weekly basis.

Why am I writing this novel?
I have always been fascinated by the field of futurology, by those who have the gift of presenting a possible future and a science-fiction novel is the perfect opportunity to dabble in the multitude of  possibilities. The future presented in this novel is an amplified one, as during the 200 years which have passed, the problems of today’s world have multiplied and become more serious. The world of The Black Pigeon is the scene of intense fighting between various organizations, each with a strong desire for power and control over the population, in both the real and virtual worlds. In this world, common sense is all but extinct and greed and exacerbated sexuality are common. It is a world which becomes more diluted with each passing day, becoming a sick mix of many small people who consider themselves to be outstanding. In many regards, today’s world is gradually shifting towards the one presented in The Black Pigeon. On the surface it appears interesting and appealing, but once you enter you discover it is faded and lacking the strength of sacred essences.

The second reason for writing this novel is the combination of science-fiction and fantasy, which beyond the obvious contrast, represents a challenge in itself. The science-fiction portion of The Black Pigeon stems from the environment and technology of the world and the fantasy portion is based on the link between the ancestral past and the highly technological future. Behind this revolution of the human ontological status are The Protectors of the Igfon (Igfon was the name of a sacred forest in the Apuseni Mountains, as attested in official records from the 9th and 10th centuries). They are the ones who are capable of establishing an essential connection between the sacred past and the technological present, being the keepers of ancient wisdom, hidden in myths and forgotten rituals kept only in small regions of ancient Dacia. One of these regions, known as Codru Moma (or The Woods of the Mother – Woods of the Mother of the Forest – an ancestral dendrological entity who supposedly rules the forests) is the home of the witches (chosen women, who are said to have been marked at birth by the forest entities and therefore gifted with special powers) and of the solomonari. The witches are the guardians of the feminine mysteries of birth and transformation, the ones who can tame the wilderness and make the world sacred. The „solomonari” are masters of the elements and holders of an enormous power through which they can command the elemental powers of nature, can heal or foresee the future. With the help of the Protectors of the Igfon this forgotten ancestral knowledge is integrated into the highly technological future, healing it and restoring its long-lost sacred meaning, which is in fact the basis of life itself.

This is what I wish from my novel – to bring a little ancestral magic in today`s world. I am not talking about spectacular magic, but about something much more tangible, something fundamental, rooted in a philosphical/religios/magical system possessing both mystical and practical traits. Modern society, as Mircea Eliade wrote, needs to rediscover the lost meaning of the sacred, forgotten meanings stemming from modern man’s technological advancements. I believe there is still a plethora of profound concepts that we no longer know and which can be restored and given back to humanity as to achieve an improved relationship between man and nature, as well as its own being. Ironically, modern man knows more about the non-European sacred aspects and mythology than about those which were the foundation of the Renaissance, Illuminism and modern culture.  There are numerous Eastern European folk tales which talk of myths, stories, songs, charms and proverbs which are completely unknown to modern man and could significantly enrich today’s world which finds itself at a lack of identity and purpose. In this sense, the novel is designed to be a preamble, an invitation to future spiritual treasure seekers who will search for the lost meanings of the old Dacia lands: Țara Crișurilor, Țara Moților, Țara Zarandului, Țara Oașului, Țara Maramureșului and many others.
Why is there a need for a fundraising campaign?As we all know, any good book is made of time, hard work, dedication and passion. All those require a certain level of financial stability for the author to really immerse himself in its creation and do it to the best of his ability.The Black Pigeon has, besides the author, another seven people who work on their novel characters. They have to be compensated for their work, as well, as do all the others involved in this project such as editors and translators.The $20,000 shall be distributed as follows: 1,000 for design (the cover, website and logo), 1,000 for the those behind the driven characters, 5,000 for editing and publishing, 7,000 for translation and 6,000 for the author.What happens if the campaign yields less than anticipated?The money shall be spent in order of importance on editing and publishing, translation and design. The novel shall be published even if the campaign goal is not met but will take longer to complete. The estimated completion target date is 1 year following the end of the campaign if the goal is reached and 2 – 2.5 years if not.

story:
City of Thieves - Fighting Fantasy Collector's Book

 

YOU have played Ian Livingstone and Steve Jackson’s Fighting Fantasy books before, but never like this!

The Games Collector brings Ian Livingstone’s ‘City of Thieves’ Fighting Fantasy book vividly to life in this sumptuously presented limited edition hardback. Experience the adventure as it leaps off the page, thanks to the hand-crafted interactive features in this special edition of a gamebook classic.

This limited hardback edition of ‘City of Thieves’ from The Games Collector will become a treasured and much sought-after addition to the world of Fighting Fantasy. It adds a new dimension to the Fighting Fantasy experience with the inclusion of interactive cardboard components. Decide your next action by opening envelopes or lifting flaps to uncover jewels, gold and other treasures needed to complete the adventure and defeat the villainous Zanbar Bone.

What is this new Limited Edition?

The original ‘City of Thieves’ gamebook was published in 1983 as a standard paperback with black & white interior illustrations. This new limited never-to-be-repeated edition from The Games Collector is presented in a larger, hardback format for the first time, and is full-colour, featuring entirely new illustrations. Also, for the first time in a Fighting Fantasy book, it includes physical envelopes and flaps to open, revealing the items, maps and letters you need to discover as you explore Port Blacksand. This offering comes with the full endorsement of Ian Livingstone.

Bound and printed to the highest quality by a long-established and highly reputable UK firm, each Games Collector Edition book is hand-crafted (excluding the Hero edition). The pages are hand-stitched together rather than glued, allowing the opened book to lie flat without needing to be held. The additional items are individually fixed to the inside pages.

The prototype for this edition was created and illustrated by the Brazilian artist and designer Daielyn Cris Bertelli. Using her design for this limited edition, City of Thieves has never looked so good, and is available in two languages - English and Portuguese.

Please select the correct language version when pledging.

 

What is Fighting Fantasy?

Created by Ian Livingstone & Steve Jackson, the Fighting Fantasy series of adventure gamebooks debuted in 1982 and has sold over 18 million copies worldwide. What started with ‘The Warlock of Firetop Mountain’ eventually spawned over 60 gamebooks, as well as board games and video games. As the 35th anniversary of Fighting Fantasy approaches, the legacy continues. This collector’s edition of City of Thieves is being published as part of a year-long celebration of the series which includes a brand new gamebook written by Ian Livingstone.

Fighting Fantasy gamebooks are exactly that – part game and part book. These are books in which YOU, the reader, are the Hero. Armed with a pencil and dice, YOU choose which paths to follow, which items to take, and which creatures to battle! However - as in real life - sometimes fate will decide for you. Read a passage from the story and then decide whether to turn left or right, talk to that little old man or fight him. Test you LUCK to see if you can steal the pouch from around the sleeping pirate's neck - or will he wake up? Do you have the STAMINA to fight the Serpent Queen? Do you have the SKILL needed to hit an assassin with your throwing knife? Will you survive?

 

City of Thieves

‘City of Thieves’ is one of the most popular Fighting Fantasy books ever published, and is considered a classic. Written by Ian Livingstone, it was the fifth book in the series and originally published in 1983. YOU can now experience City of Thieves, and visit the notorious Port Blacksand with this high-quality limited edition hardback from The Games Collector.

Terror stalks the night as Zanbar Bone and his bloodthirsty Moon Dogs hold the prosperous town of Silverton to ransom. YOU are an adventurer, and the merchants of Silverton turn to you in their hour of need. Your mission takes you along the dark, twisting streets of Port Blacksand where thieves, vagabonds and creatures of the night lie in wait. And beyond lies the most fearsome adventure of all – the tower stronghold of the infamous Zanbar Bone!

 

Who is Ian Livingstone?

Ian Livingstone has been described as ‘one of the founding fathers of the UK games industry’. He was one of the masterminds behind such iconic brands as Games Workshop, the Fighting Fantasy gamebook series and Lara Croft: Tomb Raider. He is also a keen games player, games designer and games collector.

In 1975 he co-founded Games Workshop with Steve Jackson, launching Dungeons & Dragons in Europe, and later Warhammer. In 1982 he co-authored The Warlock of Firetop Mountain, again with Steve Jackson, and went on to write 14 titles in the Fighting Fantasy gamebook series which has sold in excess of 18 million copies worldwide. His titles include Deathtrap Dungeon and the iconic City of Thieves. In 1995 he oversaw a merger that created Eidos plc where he served as Executive Chairman. At Eidos he launched global video games franchises including Lara Croft: Tomb Raider and Hitman.

 He is currently Chairman of Sumo-Digital, Chairman of Midoki, Chairman of Playdemic, Chairman of Antstream, Chairman of The Secret Police and Chairman of Flavourworks.

Ian has been awarded a CBE, a BAFTA Special Award and three Honorary Doctorates for his services to the games industry.

 

Who is The Games Collector?

The Games Collector Ltd is the result of decades of playing games, creating games and obsessive collecting of memorabilia by its founders. With a product line up featuring exclusive, exquisite and highly desirable collectibles, we aim to bring fans world-wide the items they long for, and maybe even a few they don't even know they long for!

This book is the first in a whole range of exciting new products coming soon from The Games Collector, including albums, figurines and other exclusive collectible merchandise.

 

Who is Daielyn Cris Bertelli?

Daielyn is a Brazilian artist and graphic designer who has a real passion for Fighting Fantasy and for ‘City of Thieves’ in particular. She produced an exclusive handmade edition of the book and sent it to Ian Livingstone as a gift. Her talent is now being brought to a wider audience with the release of these limited edition versions of her original book design, enhanced by The Games Collector. Please do take the time to look through the image gallery for this campaign and browse the photos of the creative process that produced the original handmade book!

 

The Indiegogo Campaign - The Perks

A maximum total of 1,016 English and 1,016 Portuguese Limited Edition books will be created for this campaign, spread across the three different handmade bindings.

The 'Hero' edition will be made to order for this campaign only, and never repeated or reprinted.

 

We cannot emphasis enough how rare these books will become. They will never be reprinted and won’t be available again in the future. Finished by hand (excluding the Hero edition) and to the highest quality in the UK by one of the oldest British printing and book binding companies, these are Fighting Fantasy books that both fans of the series and collectors or ultra-rare and unique items will treasure. With such a relatively small limited edition run, up to the most exquisite one of kind in each language version, this is a once in a lifetime opportunity to be part of this unique limited edition.

 

Please make sure you select the correct package and the correct language version when you order! (For delivery to any South American country, please choose ‘Brazil’ from the offered list, and then ensure you include your actual delivery country when supplying your full address.)

All editions will be shipped by signed for insured courier, as well as packed well to ensure your collectors edition will be received by you in perfect condition no matter where in the world you live, we have ensured this by working with the highest quality and best reputation logistics company we can.

 

The Fighting Fantasy Poster Collection

This set of four exclusive A3-size posters (297mm x 420mm, printed with a gloss laminate finish) feature for the first time the beautiful cover artwork for Forest of Doom, City of Thieves, Deathtrap Dungeon and Island of the Lizard King. The original paintings are by the world renowned artist Iain McCaig, who has since worked as a conceptual designer on movies including the three Star Wars prequels (for which he created Queen Amidala and Darth Maul), Terminator II, Hook, Dracula and Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire.

 

The City of Thieves Limited Edition Print (limited to 200)

This is a beautiful print of the iconic Iain McCaig painting that was used for the original City of Thieves paperback book cover. It will be presented as an A2-size (420mm x 594mm, with a matte laminate finish) high quality print, signed by Ian Livingstone. This is ideal for framing to proudly display in YOUR home. The iconic cover artwork will also be used for the Nicodemus, Lord Azzur and Zanbar Bone Edition slipcases.

 

The Hero Edition hardback book (limited to this one print run for this campaign only)

The Hero Edition is a hardback edition of City of Thieves that is non-interactive. It still features the brilliant artwork and design produced by Daielyn Cris and Ian Livingstone’s classic game book experience, but uses static artwork in place of the interactive sections of the other editions.

The Hero edition features a printed hardback cover with the iconic Iain McCaig cover artwork of course, glued rather than hand-stitched pages as per the other editions, but more importantly still containing the all-important collector’s edition 'new art elements' for fans of Fighting Fantasy. While not being handmade as per the other editions, it will of course be of the highest quality possible.

(Example image to follow ASAP)

 

The Blacksand Edition hardback book (limited to 500 per language)

The cloth-bound City of Thieves Limited Blacksand Edition hardback will come supplied with an Adventure Sheet, 2xD6 dice (stored inside a pouch) and a Fighting Fantasy pencil to help record your progress through the adventure.

 

The Nicodemus Edition hardback book (limited to 500 per language)

The cloth-bound City of Thieves Limited Nicodemus Edition hardback will be individually numbered, signed by the original author, Ian Livingstone, and presented in a matching high-quality slipcase featuring the iconic Iain McCaig cover artwork.

Accompanying the book will be an Adventure Sheet, 2xD6 dice (stored inside a pouch) and a Fighting Fantasy pencil to help record your progress through the adventure.

 

The Lord Azzur Edition hardback book (limited to 15 per language)

The Lord Azzur Edition is the gold standard version of the City of Thieves. Designed with the most discernible collector in mind, this extremely limited edition of the book is bound in leather and presented in a high-quality slipcase featuring the iconic Iain McCaig cover painting.

For this edition, only fifteen copies of each language will be available to the public, and are only available through the campaign. Each Lord Azzur Edition is individually numbered and comes inscribed with a unique personal message from the author, Ian Livingstone.

Accompanying the book is an Adventure Sheet, 2xD6 dice (stored inside a pouch) and a Fighting Fantasy pencil to help record your progress through the adventure.

 

The Zanbar Bone Edition hardback book (limited to 1 per language)

Only one English and one Portuguese version of this exclusive edition is offered for sale to the public. For the ultimate Fighting Fantasy fan, this top tier edition is impeccably presented. Bound in calf-skin leather, this astonishing edition is stored in a calf-skin Solander box, with gilt-edged pages, and laid on a luxurious bedding within a unique hand carved wooden casket.

Ian Livingstone will write a unique personal message inside the book for the buyer and sign it. Two gold-plated D6 dice stored within a pouch, an Adventure Sheet and an exquisite Montblanc pencil (engraved with words of your choice, subject to terms and conditions) are also included in a separate storage box. Bound in calf-skin leather and with gilt-edged pages, this astonishing edition is stored in a calf-skin Solander box, laid on luxurious crushed blood-red velvet bedding within a hand-crafted free standing wooden casket made from 300-year old oak. The casket lid features an inlaid laser- engraved brass clasp.

Finally, a meal at a top London restaurant, dining with Ian Livingstone (where he will deliver and sign your book) and the Games Collectors team completes this one-off prized possession.

Please be aware that the cost and all necessary arrangements for travelling to London is the responsibility of the buyer. If the buyer cannot get to London, then the book will be personally signed by Ian and couriered to the buyer instead.

 

Risks and Challenges

* We have of course already done our utmost to make sure these are almost non-existent for backers.

* The copyright material presented in these books has been fully licensed from the respective copyright owners.

* The books are produced in the United Kingdom to reduce as much as possible any transportation and currency risks.

* Members of our team have extensive experience in creative projects, manufacturing and project management and are committed to producing the best possible product for collectors and fans of the Fighting Fantasy brand.

 

F.A.Q.

Q: Is The Games Collector Edition the same as the original hand-made book?

A: We have taken the original design and creatively enhanced it to produce these new and exquisite limited editions.

Q: Will you ever produce more of these editions in the future?

A: Not of City of Thieves. This is a never-to-be-repeated print run and these editions are totally exclusive to The Games Collector.

Q: How long after the campaign has closed will I get my book?

A: We will endeavour to deliver the books to customers by the timescales indicated in the campaign, if not sooner. Of course, unforeseen circumstances always present challenges but we are as keen to get the book delivered as you are to receive it!

Once the campaign has ended and the funds transferred, the manufacturer will start the process of printing and assembling the books, allowing us to deliver to you as soon as possible.

Q: Will you deliver overseas?

A: Yes. We have postal costs for different territories, which are applied at the time of pledging.

Please be aware that we have priced the postage and packaging as keenly and as fairly as possible, but these prices are beyond our control.

Q: Can I buy the posters from anyone else?

A: No. They are exclusive to The Games Collector.

Q: Does the book come with additional Adventure Sheets?

A: As well as the master sheet supplied with the book, a downloadable PDF of the sheet will be available from The Games Collector web site so you can print off as many additional copies as you like.

Q: Can I specify a number when ordering an individually numbered edition of the book?

A: Unfortunately not. The numbers are allocated on a random basis and we are unable to enter into correspondence regarding a specific number.

* Minor details of the City of Thieves Limited Edition hardbacks may vary in the delivered books

_____

Fighting Fantasy is a trademark owned by Steve Jackson and Ian Livingstone, all rights reserved

Forest of Doom © Ian Livingstone 1983, 2017

City of Thieves © Ian Livingstone 1983, 2017

Deathtrap Dungeon © Ian Livingstone 1984, 2017

Island of the Lizard King © Ian Livingstone 1984, 2017

These products are officially licenced from the copyright holder

_____________

The images shown are rendered approximations of the anticipated final products. Minor details of the City of Thieves Limited Edition hardbacks may vary in the delivered books.

A: We will endeavour to deliver the books to customers by the timescales indicated in the campaign, if not sooner. Of course, unforeseen circumstances always present challenges but we are as keen to get the book delivered as you are to receive it!
Once the campaign has ended and the funds transferred, the manufacturer will start the process of printing and assembling the books, allowing us to deliver to you as soon as possible.
Q: Will you deliver overseas?
A: Yes. We have postal costs for different territories, which are applied at the time of pledging.
Please be aware that we have priced the postage and packaging as keenly and as fairly as possible, but these prices are beyond our control.
Q: Can I buy the posters from anyone else?
A: No. They are exclusive to The Games Collector.
Q: Does the book come with additional Adventure Sheets?
A: As well as the master sheet supplied with the book, a downloadable PDF of the sheet will be available from The Games Collector web site so you can print off as many additional copies as you like.
Q: Can I specify a number when ordering an individually numbered edition of the book?
A: Unfortunately not. The numbers are allocated on a random basis and we are unable to enter into correspondence regarding a specific number.
* Minor details of the City of Thieves Limited Edition hardbacks may vary in the delivered books

story:
20 years ago, while living in France, I came across a manuscript. It was written by a French merchant three hundred years earlier. Though it was short I was instantly drawn into its powerful drama. It was accompanied by his wife’s account and related their plight during the oppression of French Protestants known as Huguenots who were persecuted, imprisoned and executed unless they gave up their faith. But the merchant refused, and so did his wife. Their persecution by the French King, Louis XIV, led to an exodus and the world’s first 'refugees'. It also triggered a European war which spread to the New World where many Huguenots found refuge. It was such a remarkable story that I decided that one day, after many years of research; I would turn those memoirs into a novel, and then a trilogy. They became Jeanne and Jacob Delpech.

This campaign is all about raising the funds to finish book 2, Voyage of Malice, to get it into your hands. The manuscript is finished, I just need to get it properly edited and proofread. Then I need to finance the interior and exterior designs of the eBook and paperback.

  

I was living in Montauban where the story begins, and was able to do all the research I needed, given that the town centre hadn't changed much in three hundred years. Nevertheless, my work as a scriptwriter took up most of my time and though I had written up the broad lines of the plan, it wasn't until 20 years later that I decided to knuckle down and write the first novel. I had consequently been carrying around the story of Jacob and Jeanne with me all those years which enabled it to mature, and also gave me a good pretext to holiday in the various locations where the book takes place. I visited all the locations in Merchants of Virtue, how cool is that? During my travels I was also able to speak to all kinds of amazing and knowledgeable people from local historians, museum directors to the Huguenot secretary of the consistory of Geneva. And though this is a work of fiction, I have paid particular attention to keep the details historically correct. Merchants of Virtue was published last Christmas as an eBook and has been in print since late April.

Now that this first book is released and picking up rave reviews the time has come to publish the second book. Voyage of Malice takes us through the streets of Geneva to the straits of the Caribbean. It's the continuing story of Jeanne Delpech who resorts to spinning yarn and weaving for her livelihood, and of her husband who is sent to an island prison from which he escapes only to end up on a buccaneer ship.

Voyage of Malice is already written but still needs editing and proofreading. It will be published both as an eBook and as a paperback so the book's interior and exterior need to be designed as well.

The late 17th century was a time of change both in Europe and the New World—and the Huguenots were at the very the heart of that change which ignited wars between world powers. Those who managed to flee persecution took with them their technical expertise as merchants, silk weavers, clock makers, doctors and lawyers to Germany, Switzerland, Belgium, Holland, England and the Americas where they found refuge. These were the world's first 'refugees'.

Even today their heritage and notion of tolerance has brought us great men and women in many fields from President Roosevelt to Judy Garland and from Sir Laurence Olivier to Keith Richards. But most of all this is a story about the destiny of a family who strive to keep their faith in adversity and against all the odds—in a world where religion was hijacked by men of power.

The late seventeenth century has often been neglected by historians and writers of fiction, and the plight of the Huguenots has been pushed to one side for the pomp and glory of Louis XIV, the king who persecuted them. That being said, I want this book to be as entertaining as it is informative in a way that will keep readers on the edge of their seats, and keep the spirit of the world's first refugees alive. 

By helping me get this book to market now, you'll be part of their story, and help let their memory live on.

I’m Paul Monk, an award-winning author, scriptwriter and playwright. I've had a couple of plays staged in Cambridge and have written for scores of video games from indie projects to AAA titles. Last year I landed a Writers Guild of America nomination for outstanding writing on Assassin’s Creed Syndicate. Strange Metamorphosis, my first published novel, received rave reviews and won the 2014 Literary Classics Eloquent Quill book award. Merchants of Virtue, published last December, has also surpassed my expectations in terms of reviews and has allowed me to build up a reader list for Voyage of Malice.

I'm raising funds to help cover the costs of editorial and design aspects for Voyage of Malice. I have written and rewritten the manuscript which is now ready to meet the editor’s eyes for an objective point of view so that the book will be as good as it possibly can be. Then it will need the eyes of a professional proof-reader. In parallel, I will need to get the design aspects sorted. I'm asking backers to help me cover the remaining costs to get the book from my A4 manuscript into your hands.

I set up the Bloomtree Press imprint to publish my own books. It means I have total control over the rights, that I don’t have to wait for a publisher to fit my book into a slot (if there is a slot to be had at all), that I enjoy the freedom of being an indie and being able to rapidly get my work to market. That being said, as a professional writer I still need to go through all the editorial stages the big five publishing houses go through, because it is important for me that my books are as well created as any traditionally published book in any store.

All the funds will go towards professionally editing and producing the books plus the perks and their shipping costs—Both Voyage of Malice and Merchants of Virtue will be in high quality softcover. An additional 8% will go to Indiegogo's percentage and credit card fees.

Since first learning about the plight of the Huguenots more than twenty years ago, I have been fascinated by what became of them and their descendants. The more I learnt about the story of the characters in my book the more I realised the impact their persecution and exodus had on both the old continent and the “New World”. I also realised to what extent the latter part of the 17th century had been overlooked.

The first novel has been written and published successfully. I would like to build on that success and be able to launch the second book. Refugees and immigrants have always been an important part of history. To uncover what really happened required a lot of painstaking (and exciting) research. I believe it is right and important not to let the plight of the world's first refugees fall into oblivion. In many cases they form the missing piece of the puzzle of our collective and individual identity.

There are reference books that depict the times, however, most people have no need or desire to plough through such books. What they want is a good story, and what better medium for a story is there than the novel?

This may be the first time I have crowdfunded a project—and I am learning all the way—but the book is finished. What’s more, the first novel is already published and has allowed me to build up a solid list of readers keen to read the continuing story.

Voyage of Malice is scheduled to be published early this summer, although a slight delay is not impossible. I cannot promise that when it comes back from the editor that I won’t have to rewrite a scene or two, I can't say. Nevertheless, I can promise you that if you pre-order a copy of Voyage of Malice, you will receive a professionally designed paperback, signed and inscribed by me, as soon as the books become available.

It’s all under way, ready for you to jump on board. Anything you can give at all is a massive gift, so THANK YOU in advance!

Can't afford a perk but want to help out anyway? You have chosen a perk but still want to do more? You can help me tell Jeanne and Jacob's story by sharing this campaign on Twitter, Facebook, Tumblr or Instagram, or by emailing it to book-loving friends. You can use Indiegogo's share tools to do this, or you can cut and past the website url. Use the hashtag #VoyageOfMalice.  Tag me on Twitter if you like, and I'll do my best to respond.

Thank you so much for taking the time to read about my project! These are dark and difficult times for many people, and it is a privilege to be able to professionally pursue a topic of the past that carries so many echoes in our world today. My hope is that, through this book, the courage and convictions of past generations resound within you today and bring you a moment of fulfilment.

With deepest gratitude,

Paul

P.S. Here are some images of the Huguenot cross and dangle earrings perks:

story:
Actualización 16/6/2016

(English below)

Queremos darte las gracias de corazón por contribuir a la campaña para traducir al español More Than Two: A Practical Guide to Ethical Polyamory. Estamos tremendamente agradecidos por tu apoyo.

Desafortunadamente, como quizás ya sepas, la campaña no ha conseguido alcanzar la meta propuesta. De hecho, se quedó a bastante distancia, por lo que la cantidad recaudada no nos hubiera permitido publicar el libro. Por ello, dado que no habríamos podido cumplir con las recompensas prometidas, Indiegogo ya ha devuelto vuestras aportaciones.

Aún seguimos queriendo que este proyecto salga adelante y estamos buscando maneras de conseguirlo. En cuanto hayamos decidido el camino a seguir, nos pondremos en contacto contigo para informarte de cómo puedes apoyar la traducción y disfrutar del libro en español por adelantado.

Una vez más, gracias por creer en este proyecto.

Update 16 June 2016

 

We want to thank you with all our hearts for supporting the campaign to translate More Than Two: A Practical Guide to Ethical Polyamory into Spanish. We are tremendously grateful for your support.

 

Unfortunately, as you probably know by now, the campaign did not reach its goal. In fact, it fell far short. The amount we were able to raise would not have even come close to allowing us to publish the book—and so, since we wouldn’t be able to meet our promises to you, Indiegogo has refunded your contributions.

We still want to see this project happen, and we’re looking at ways now to do that. We’ll be in touch once we’ve decided on our way forward, with information on how you can support the translation and get early access to the book in Spanish.

Thank you again for believing in this project.

La práctica del poliamor

 

El poliamor consiste en amar a más de una persona de forma consensuada, responsable y ética, con el conocimiento de todas las personas implicadas. Conlleva un vínculo emocional, por lo que no es comparable con el intercambio de parejas o swinging. El poliamor requiere confianza, integridad, comunicación y valor.

El libro More Than Two se publicó en el año 2014 y pronto se convirtió en un referente del poliamor, ya que se centra en exclusiva en este tipo de relaciones y ofrece multitud de casos prácticos y consejos útiles para su buen funcionamiento.

El objetivo de esta campaña es traducir y editar el libro en español, ya que no existe ninguna referencia escrita en nuestro idioma que trate el tema de manera tan amplia.

 

Basado en décadas de experiencia en relaciones poliamorosas, More Than Two ofrece las herramientas necesarias para el autoconocimiento, la toma de decisiones íntegras y éticas y la mejora de la comunicación en las relaciones personales, sean del tipo que sean.

 

¿Quiénes somos?

 

Somos un grupo de activistas de poliamor en España quienes apoyamos esta campaña con el objetivo de disponer de esta guía que consideramos básica y necesaria para la comunidad, así como para cualquier persona que quiera mantener relaciones éticas, responsables y felices. Estamos colaborando con Franklin Veaux y Eve Rickert para conseguir, a través del crowfunding, traducir y editar el libro en nuestro idioma, ya que existen muy pocos recursos escritos en español, y consideramos que las experiencias y consejos que nos ofrecen son de gran valor para el buen desarrollo de las relaciones poliamorosas.

Franklin Veaux es un escritor y activista poliamoroso cuya web y blog acerca del poliamor han sido un valioso recurso para la comunidad desde hace cerca de 20 años. Esta web es una de las más visitadas sobre el tema, aparece en segundo lugar al buscar en Google la palabra “polyamory” y recibe miles de emails de lectores agradecidos. Eve Rickert es escritora y editora profesional. En relaciones poliamorosas desde hace más de diez años, es activista y fundadora de varios movimientos poliamorosos en Canadá.

Karen Moan es periodista y autora del libro The Moan Club, una novela basada en una historia de poliamor. Realiza su labor como activista en la Asociación poliamor Madrid desde su fundación hace dos años.

Nuestro equipo de producción está repartido por el Mediterráneo y lo conforman E., Begoña y Yeray. E. cuenta con la experiencia en traducción necesaria para asegurar que nuestro mensaje llegue perfectamente. Begoña, como correctora con diez años de experiencia en el sector de la traducción, irá a la caza y captura de faltas de ortografía y frases de gramática poco elegante. Por último Yeray, como maquetador, se encargará de dar al libro ese aspecto bonito y agradable que tanto invita a leer. Los tres, como profesionales de estas tareas, cuentan con sobrada experiencia y pasión por el proyecto para crear un libro fantástico.

 

¿Cómo funciona el crowdfunding?

 

¿En qué consiste una campaña de crowdfunding? A través de la misma se comparte la financiación de un proyecto entre las personas que desean apoyarlo. En el caso de este libro, la totalidad de lo recaudado se destinará a la traducción, revisión y corrección (40%), impresión y envío de recompensas (50%), publicidad y producción (5%) y diseño (5%). Cada aportación, por pequeña que sea, ¡cuenta!, ya que muestra el interés colectivo por conseguir el objetivo de la campaña. Sin tu ayuda, no es posible. ¡Colabora!

 

¡Échale un vistazo al índice!

 

Prólogo de Janet W. Hardy
Agradecimientos

Introducción

Parte 1: ¿Qué es el poliamor?
1 Comenzando el viaje
2 Las muchas formas del amor
3 El poliamor ético

Parte 2: Herramientas para el poliamor
4 Cómo cuidarte
5 Cómo cuidar de tus relaciones
6 Las trampas de la comunicación
7 Estrategias de comunicación
8 Celos: domando al monstruo de ojos verdes

Parte 3: las reglas del poliamor
9 Límites
10 Reglas y acuerdos
11 El poliamor jerárquico: relaciones primarias y secundarias
12 Los acuerdos de veto
13 Relaciones empoderadas
14 Acuerdos poliamorosos prácticos

Parte 4: la realidad poliamorosa
15 ¿En qué son diferentes las relaciones poliamorosas?
16 En el medio
17 Abrirse desde una pareja
18 Las relaciones monopoliamorosas
19 El sexo y la colada
20 Salud sexual
21 Rompecabezas poliamorosos
22 Las transiciones en las relaciones

Parte 5: el ecosistema poliamoroso
23 Las parejas de tus parejas
24 Cómo encontrar relaciones
25 El resto del mundo

Despedida: Ama más, sé genial

Glosario
Notas
Recursos

 

 

 

Opiniones sobre la edición inglesa de More Than Two

 

 

“Este libro también puede ser útil para parejas que se identifiquen como monógamas, ya que para ellas podría ser beneficioso hablar por primera vez o volver a plantear las dinámicas de poder y las reglas que forman parte de sus relaciones”.

 

--Melissa K. Bergdall y Marie L.C. Blumer, Journal of Feminist Family Therapy

 

“Si quieres crear relaciones sólidas, en las que tus parejas se sientan cuidadas, seguras y capaces de abogar por sus necesidades, te recomiendo que leas este libro. Incluso animaría a las personas monógamas a leerlo, por las herramientas y guías que proporciona. Confía en mí. Nunca leerás un libro sobre relaciones que te empuje tanto a ser mejor persona con aquellos a los que amas”.

 

--A.V. Flox

 

 

Preguntas frecuentes sobre poliamor de Franklin Veaux

 

 

Estas son algunas de las respuestas de Franklin publicadas en su web.

Entonces, ¿qué significa "poliamor"?

El término "poliamor" viene del latín y el griego y significa "muchos amores" (literalmente, poly ["muchos"] y amor ["amor"]). Una relación poliamorosa es una relación romántica que implica a más de dos personas.

¿O sea, como los swingers?

No exactamente. Los swingers tienen un enfoque distinto: se centran en el sexo casual, aunque también pueden entablar amistades y formar vínculos más profundos. En cambio, el poliamor se centra en las relaciones profundas, aunque a menudo el sexo también es divertido.

Ya lo pillo: tienes una querida.

No, eso también es diferente. El término técnico para eso es "infidelidad".

Lo mismo me da, que me da lo mismo.

No. Lo que define a una relación poliamorosa es que todas las personas implicadas conocen la existencia del resto de participantes en la relación y están de acuerdo con ello.

Si estás casado y tienes una novia sin que tu mujer lo sepa, o si tu mujer lo sospecha pero no está segura, o si tu mujer lo sabe pero no le gusta, no eres poliamoroso, eres infiel. De la misma manera, si estás tirándote al fontanero mientras tu marido está fuera de la ciudad, no eres poliamorosa, eres infiel.

Lo que define al poliamor es el consentimiento informado de todas las personas involucradas. Sin él, no es poliamor. Si no puedes invitar a tu amante a la cena de Navidad con el resto de tu familia porque no quieres que nadie sepa lo que estás haciendo, probablemente no es poliamor.

Puedes encontrar más en Poliamor Madrid.

 

 

 

 

Cuando Franklin y Eve publicaron More Than Two en 2014, crearon la editorial independiente Thorntree Press en Portland (Oregón, EE. UU.). Se especializa en libros de no ficción sobre relaciones personales, amor y sexualidad, particularmente en modelos de relación no convencionales. Sus libros aportan un enfoque racional y basado en evidencias y comparten historias de la vida real.

Thorntree Press financia la producción y el marketing de todos sus libros mediante crowdfunding. Esto les permite mantener un nivel de calidad alto, arriesgar a la hora de seleccionar los títulos y hacer llegar a los creadores un porcentaje mayor en calidad de derechos de autor. Hasta la fecha han finalizado con éxito cuatro campañas de crowdfunding: la edición original de More Than Two en inglés, la lista de títulos para el 2015 (que incluye The Game Changer, el libro de memorias de Franklin), Ask Me About Polyamory: The Best of Kimchi Cuddles y Purple Prose: Bisexuality in Britain, con cientos de mecenas satisfechos.

Thorntree Press administrará las contribuciones a este crowdfunding y destinará los fondos a la traducción, revisión, maquetación, corrección, producción y costes de marketing. El destino de los fondos recaudados es el siguiente:

 

 

 

 

Las recompensas

 

 

Además de la edición impresa y digital de More Than Two en español (Más de dos) ofreceremos un amplio catálogo de recompensas de la editorial Thorntree Press, de sus autores y de otros creadores.

 


Pegatinas de Ama más, sé genial.

The Moan Club por Karen Moan, una novela de ficción basada en personas y hechos reales. Los temas principales son el poliamor, la liberación sexual y la pasión por la música.

Una póster del mapa de la no monogamia por Franklin Veaux, traducido al español.


Colgante, pulsera y llavero en forma de corazón con el símbolo del infinito de la artista Nancy Yoder, de Oregon.


Camiseta Dragón Poli o Ama más, sé genial (para hombre o mujer).

Una diadema con orejas (como las que aparecen en el video, de gato o de conejo). Descubre la historia de las orejas.

Por último, tenemos una recompensa muy especial para nuestros mecenas más generosos: a partir de 1500 $ podréis conseguir uno de los cuatro dibujos originales incluidos en el libro More Than Two (de la artista Tatiana Gill), además de una acuarela del creador de la portada del libro, Paul Mendoza.

 

Libros de Thorntree Press

 

Ponemos a vuestra disposición todo el catálogo de Thorntree Press, tanto en formato físico como digital.

 

 

Ask Me About Polyamory: The Best of Kimchi Cuddles
Tikva Wolf, 2016
Prefacio de Sophie Labelle
Un divertido y conmovedor cómic sobre poliamor, queer y genderqueer.

 

 

 

 

When Someone You Love Is Polyamorous: Understanding Poly People and Relationships
Elisabeth Sheff, 2016
Una guía esencial para los amigos y familiares de personas poliamorosas.

 

 

 

 

Purple Prose: Bisexuality in Britain
Antología editada por Kate Harrad, 2016
Prefacio de Sophie Labelle
Una guía de la comunidad bisexual del Reino Unido y una exploración de los problemas a los que se enfrentan las personas bisexuales en general.

 

 

 

The Game Changer: A Memoir of Disruptive Love
Franklin Veaux, 2015
Prefacio de A.V. Flox

El matrimonio abierto de Franklin y Celeste parecía perfectamente seguro... hasta el día en el que Amber entró en su vida y les enseñó por qué el corazón no obedece a reglas.

 

 

 

 

Stories from the Polycule: Real Life in Polyamorous Families
Antología de la Dra. Elisabeth Sheff

Una antología sobre las personas que viven en familias poliamorosas de todo tipo.

 

 

The Husband Swap: A True Story of Unconventional Love
Louisa Leontiades, 2015
Prefacio de Noël Lynne Figart

Cuatro personas comunes desafían a la monogamia para perseguir una utopía de amor sin límites.

 

Lessons in Love and Life to My Younger Self: A Companion Guide to The Husband Swap (solo edición digital)
Louisa Leontiades, 2015
Ilustraciones de Tikva Wolf, prefacio de Franklin Veaux
¿Qué aprendes acerca de la naturaleza de la vida, del amor y de ti misma cuando abres tu relación sentimental?

 

 

 

More Than Two: A Practical Guide to Ethical Polyamory
Franklin Veaux and Eve Rickert, 2014
Prefacio de Janet W. Hardy

Un manual muy completo y largamente esperado que explora el mundo de las relaciones amorosas en toda su complejidad.

 

 

 

Objetivos ampliados

21.000 $
Si alcanzamos esta cantidad, ¡Franklin y Eve harán una gira por cinco ciudades españolas! Visitarán Madrid, Barcelona y las tres ciudades adicionales que hayan contribuido más a la campaña. Los mecenas tendrán entrada preferente a las presentaciones y acceso a eventos exclusivos con los autores.

26.000 $
En el caso de llegar a esta cantidad, se traducirá al español el libro When Someone You Love Is Polyamorous: Understanding Poly People and Relationships de la Dra. Elisabeth Sheff. Los mecenas que aporten a partir de 5 $ recibirán la copia digital del libro y los que aporten a partir de 25 $, el libro impreso.

 

Notas aclaratorias importantes:

 

Sobre las donaciones: El botón principal “Contribuir ahora” os llevará a hacer una donación sin la posibilidad de elegir recompensa. Para escoger las recompensas, pinchad en el cuadro correspondiente.

Método de pago: No es necesario tener una cuenta de Paypal para realizar el pago, hay una opción de utilizar tarjeta de crédito sin necesidad de registrarse.

 

¿Dudas o consultas?

Si tienes alguna pregunta que no hayamos respondido envíanos un email a moankaren@gmail.com.

 

¡Gracias por tu apoyo!
story_txt:
Actualización 16/6/2016(English below)Queremos darte las gracias de corazón por contribuir a la campaña para traducir al español More Than Two: A Practical Guide to Ethical Polyamory. Estamos tremendamente agradecidos por tu apoyo.Desafortunadamente, como quizás ya sepas, la campaña no ha conseguido alcanzar la meta propuesta. De hecho, se quedó a bastante distancia, por lo que la cantidad recaudada no nos hubiera permitido publicar el libro. Por ello, dado que no habríamos podido cumplir con las recompensas prometidas, Indiegogo ya ha devuelto vuestras aportaciones.Aún seguimos queriendo que este proyecto salga adelante y estamos buscando maneras de conseguirlo. En cuanto hayamos decidido el camino a seguir, nos pondremos en contacto contigo para informarte de cómo puedes apoyar la traducción y disfrutar del libro en español por adelantado.Una vez más, gracias por creer en este proyecto.Update 16 June 2016 We want to thank you with all our hearts for supporting the campaign to translate More Than Two: A Practical Guide to Ethical Polyamory into Spanish. We are tremendously grateful for your support. Unfortunately, as you probably know by now, the campaign did not reach its goal. In fact, it fell far short. The amount we were able to raise would not have even come close to allowing us to publish the book—and so, since we wouldn’t be able to meet our promises to you, Indiegogo has refunded your contributions.We still want to see this project happen, and we’re looking at ways now to do that. We’ll be in touch once we’ve decided on our way forward, with information on how you can support the translation and get early access to the book in Spanish.Thank you again for believing in this project.La práctica del poliamor El poliamor consiste en amar a más de una persona de forma consensuada, responsable y ética, con el conocimiento de todas las personas implicadas. Conlleva un vínculo emocional, por lo que no es comparable con el intercambio de parejas o swinging. El poliamor requiere confianza, integridad, comunicación y valor.El libro More Than Two se publicó en el año 2014 y pronto se convirtió en un referente del poliamor, ya que se centra en exclusiva en este tipo de relaciones y ofrece multitud de casos prácticos y consejos útiles para su buen funcionamiento.El objetivo de esta campaña es traducir y editar el libro en español, ya que no existe ninguna referencia escrita en nuestro idioma que trate el tema de manera tan amplia. Basado en décadas de experiencia en relaciones poliamorosas, More Than Two ofrece las herramientas necesarias para el autoconocimiento, la toma de decisiones íntegras y éticas y la mejora de la comunicación en las relaciones personales, sean del tipo que sean. ¿Quiénes somos? Somos un grupo de activistas de poliamor en España quienes apoyamos esta campaña con el objetivo de disponer de esta guía que consideramos básica y necesaria para la comunidad, así como para cualquier persona que quiera mantener relaciones éticas, responsables y felices. Estamos colaborando con Franklin Veaux y Eve Rickert para conseguir, a través del crowfunding, traducir y editar el libro en nuestro idioma, ya que existen muy pocos recursos escritos en español, y consideramos que las experiencias y consejos que nos ofrecen son de gran valor para el buen desarrollo de las relaciones poliamorosas.Franklin Veaux es un escritor y activista poliamoroso cuya web y blog acerca del poliamor han sido un valioso recurso para la comunidad desde hace cerca de 20 años. Esta web es una de las más visitadas sobre el tema, aparece en segundo lugar al buscar en Google la palabra “polyamory” y recibe miles de emails de lectores agradecidos. Eve Rickert es escritora y editora profesional. En relaciones poliamorosas desde hace más de diez años, es activista y fundadora de varios movimientos poliamorosos en Canadá. Karen Moan es periodista y autora del libro The Moan Club, una novela basada en una historia de poliamor. Realiza su labor como activista en la Asociación poliamor Madrid desde su fundación hace dos años.Nuestro equipo de producción está repartido por el Mediterráneo y lo conforman E., Begoña y Yeray. E. cuenta con la experiencia en traducción necesaria para asegurar que nuestro mensaje llegue perfectamente. Begoña, como correctora con diez años de experiencia en el sector de la traducción, irá a la caza y captura de faltas de ortografía y frases de gramática poco elegante. Por último Yeray, como maquetador, se encargará de dar al libro ese aspecto bonito y agradable que tanto invita a leer. Los tres, como profesionales de estas tareas, cuentan con sobrada experiencia y pasión por el proyecto para crear un libro fantástico. ¿Cómo funciona el crowdfunding? ¿En qué consiste una campaña de crowdfunding? A través de la misma se comparte la financiación de un proyecto entre las personas que desean apoyarlo. En el caso de este libro, la totalidad de lo recaudado se destinará a la traducción, revisión y corrección (40%), impresión y envío de recompensas (50%), publicidad y producción (5%) y diseño (5%). Cada aportación, por pequeña que sea, ¡cuenta!, ya que muestra el interés colectivo por conseguir el objetivo de la campaña. Sin tu ayuda, no es posible. ¡Colabora! ¡Échale un vistazo al índice! Prólogo de Janet W. HardyAgradecimientosIntroducciónParte 1: ¿Qué es el poliamor?1 Comenzando el viaje2 Las muchas formas del amor3 El poliamor éticoParte 2: Herramientas para el poliamor4 Cómo cuidarte5 Cómo cuidar de tus relaciones6 Las trampas de la comunicación7 Estrategias de comunicación8 Celos: domando al monstruo de ojos verdesParte 3: las reglas del poliamor9 Límites10 Reglas y acuerdos11 El poliamor jerárquico: relaciones primarias y secundarias12 Los acuerdos de veto13 Relaciones empoderadas14 Acuerdos poliamorosos prácticosParte 4: la realidad poliamorosa15 ¿En qué son diferentes las relaciones poliamorosas?16 En el medio17 Abrirse desde una pareja18 Las relaciones monopoliamorosas19 El sexo y la colada20 Salud sexual21 Rompecabezas poliamorosos22 Las transiciones en las relacionesParte 5: el ecosistema poliamoroso23 Las parejas de tus parejas24 Cómo encontrar relaciones25 El resto del mundoDespedida: Ama más, sé genialGlosarioNotasRecursos   Opiniones sobre la edición inglesa de More Than Two
  “Este libro también puede ser útil para parejas que se identifiquen como monógamas, ya que para ellas podría ser beneficioso hablar por primera vez o volver a plantear las dinámicas de poder y las reglas que forman parte de sus relaciones”. --Melissa K. Bergdall y Marie L.C. Blumer, Journal of Feminist Family Therapy “Si quieres crear relaciones sólidas, en las que tus parejas se sientan cuidadas, seguras y capaces de abogar por sus necesidades, te recomiendo que leas este libro. Incluso animaría a las personas monógamas a leerlo, por las herramientas y guías que proporciona. Confía en mí. Nunca leerás un libro sobre relaciones que te empuje tanto a ser mejor persona con aquellos a los que amas”. --A.V. Flox  Preguntas frecuentes sobre poliamor de Franklin Veaux  Estas son algunas de las respuestas de Franklin publicadas en su web.Entonces, ¿qué significa "poliamor"?El término "poliamor" viene del latín y el griego y significa "muchos amores" (literalmente, poly ["muchos"] y amor ["amor"]). Una relación poliamorosa es una relación romántica que implica a más de dos personas.¿O sea, como los swingers?No exactamente. Los swingers tienen un enfoque distinto: se centran en el sexo casual, aunque también pueden entablar amistades y formar vínculos más profundos. En cambio, el poliamor se centra en las relaciones profundas, aunque a menudo el sexo también es divertido.Ya lo pillo: tienes una querida.No, eso también es diferente. El término técnico para eso es "infidelidad".Lo mismo me da, que me da lo mismo.No. Lo que define a una relación poliamorosa es que todas las personas implicadas conocen la existencia del resto de participantes en la relación y están de acuerdo con ello.Si estás casado y tienes una novia sin que tu mujer lo sepa, o si tu mujer lo sospecha pero no está segura, o si tu mujer lo sabe pero no le gusta, no eres poliamoroso, eres infiel. De la misma manera, si estás tirándote al fontanero mientras tu marido está fuera de la ciudad, no eres poliamorosa, eres infiel.Lo que define al poliamor es el consentimiento informado de todas las personas involucradas. Sin él, no es poliamor. Si no puedes invitar a tu amante a la cena de Navidad con el resto de tu familia porque no quieres que nadie sepa lo que estás haciendo, probablemente no es poliamor.Puedes encontrar más en Poliamor Madrid.    Cuando Franklin y Eve publicaron More Than Two en 2014, crearon la editorial independiente Thorntree Press en Portland (Oregón, EE. UU.). Se especializa en libros de no ficción sobre relaciones personales, amor y sexualidad, particularmente en modelos de relación no convencionales. Sus libros aportan un enfoque racional y basado en evidencias y comparten historias de la vida real.Thorntree Press financia la producción y el marketing de todos sus libros mediante crowdfunding. Esto les permite mantener un nivel de calidad alto, arriesgar a la hora de seleccionar los títulos y hacer llegar a los creadores un porcentaje mayor en calidad de derechos de autor. Hasta la fecha han finalizado con éxito cuatro campañas de crowdfunding: la edición original de More Than Two en inglés, la lista de títulos para el 2015 (que incluye The Game Changer, el libro de memorias de Franklin), Ask Me About Polyamory: The Best of Kimchi Cuddles y Purple Prose: Bisexuality in Britain, con cientos de mecenas satisfechos.Thorntree Press administrará las contribuciones a este crowdfunding y destinará los fondos a la traducción, revisión, maquetación, corrección, producción y costes de marketing. El destino de los fondos recaudados es el siguiente:    Las recompensas  Además de la edición impresa y digital de More Than Two en español (Más de dos) ofreceremos un amplio catálogo de recompensas de la editorial Thorntree Press, de sus autores y de otros creadores. Pegatinas de Ama más, sé genial. The Moan Club por Karen Moan, una novela de ficción basada en personas y hechos reales. Los temas principales son el poliamor, la liberación sexual y la pasión por la música.Una póster del mapa de la no monogamia por Franklin Veaux, traducido al español.Colgante, pulsera y llavero en forma de corazón con el símbolo del infinito de la artista Nancy Yoder, de Oregon.Camiseta Dragón Poli o Ama más, sé genial (para hombre o mujer).Una diadema con orejas (como las que aparecen en el video, de gato o de conejo). Descubre la historia de las orejas.Por último, tenemos una recompensa muy especial para nuestros mecenas más generosos: a partir de 1500 $ podréis conseguir uno de los cuatro dibujos originales incluidos en el libro More Than Two (de la artista Tatiana Gill), además de una acuarela del creador de la portada del libro, Paul Mendoza. Libros de Thorntree Press Ponemos a vuestra disposición todo el catálogo de Thorntree Press, tanto en formato físico como digital.  Ask Me About Polyamory: The Best of Kimchi CuddlesTikva Wolf, 2016Prefacio de Sophie LabelleUn divertido y conmovedor cómic sobre poliamor, queer y genderqueer.    When Someone You Love Is Polyamorous: Understanding Poly People and RelationshipsElisabeth Sheff, 2016Una guía esencial para los amigos y familiares de personas poliamorosas.    Purple Prose: Bisexuality in BritainAntología editada por Kate Harrad, 2016Prefacio de Sophie LabelleUna guía de la comunidad bisexual del Reino Unido y una exploración de los problemas a los que se enfrentan las personas bisexuales en general.   The Game Changer: A Memoir of Disruptive LoveFranklin Veaux, 2015Prefacio de A.V. FloxEl matrimonio abierto de Franklin y Celeste parecía perfectamente seguro... hasta el día en el que Amber entró en su vida y les enseñó por qué el corazón no obedece a reglas.

Una antología sobre las personas que viven en familias poliamorosas de todo tipo.

story:
Good Hooman Magazine - The World’s First Lifestyle Magazine by Dogs, for Dogs.

Good Hooman Magazine is the world's first lifestyle magazine designed by dogs, for dogs who want the best in life with their dear but misguided hooman beings.

Puggy Smalls is cover dog for Good Hooman Magazine

When we launched the first edition, a dachshund special, we received many requests for another edition, one featuring more breeds. Not wanting to disappoint our canine readers, we finally decided to do re-launch the original edition but this time with more dogs.

 

Featuring 64 pages of hard-hitting stories, interviews with famous pups, horoscopes, a crossword puzzle that will challenge even the smartest hound, dating advice, and fashion from our team of daring doggie reporters, Good Hooman is the first magazine in which stories are told from the dog's point of view.

In one enlightening exposé, Dr. Helmut Paws, resident professor of Hooman Studies, asks once and for all, “Do hoomans really want the ball?”

We tackle the tough issues and take a lesson on how to survive vacuuming day alongside survival and tactical barking expert Chuck Gnawriss.

Our intrepid reporter, Peanut, goes undercover and under the couch to discover what really happens when hoomans gather for their nights of strange behavior and synchronized howling, in the world exclusive,‘Secrets of Hooman Pack Night.

 

The magazine also features:

Fashion: What’s moving, shaking, and panting in the world of doggie fashion. In this edition, “Jackets, Sweaters and Snoods: Are They Really Good for Work and Walkies?

Food: Get the latest tail-wagging recipes for the culinary canine and then devour them mercilessly.

History: We delve into the previously untold story of the dachshunds and set the record straight about wieners through the ages.

Heart-warming stories: We meet the unsung heroes – dogs who have survived against the odds, saved lives, and provided comfort to sick and elderly hoomans.

Travel: We explore what’s hot in the world of poochy travel and then check in for a weekend at the Sausage Dog Hotel.

You’ll find these stories and more, only in Good Hooman Magazine.

 

You can even choose your own cover dog, something completely unique to any poochy publication.

World famous Crusoe the Celebrity Dachshund is just one of our cover dogs. Others include Quincy (Bichon Frise), Puggy Smalls (Pug) and Dobby 3Paws (Dachshund).  We will be announcing names of the remaining breed models as the campaign progresses. 

We chose the cover dogs based on connections we already have established on social media and elsewhere. We will add even more dogs if we reach our stretch goal (see below for details).

Please note that the the original Crusoe dachshund edition is currently available and if you order it will ship out soon.  

Our first edition, released in 2017, was a howling success. A few comments:

“Loved, loved, loved it. Hardest I have laughed in a while.”

“Adorable and funny! My kids love it! It’s our nightly reading! The vacuuming survival tips article was a hoot!!

“Awesome, entertaining read! Can't wait to buy the next one.”

The good news: most of the material has been written and finalized. But we need to finance the cost of creating the remaining content, illustrations and printing. By backing our campaign, you will not only receive Good Hooman Magazine, but you also help us print it. We chose a high-end printing company that produces quality magazines printed on thick, coated, glossy paper - just like the magazines you see on newsstands. To print a really fabulous quality magazine like this, we need your help.

We also hired world class writers to help us give the magazine that final touch of professionalism. If you help fund this project, it means we can:

  • Pay for printing and postage
  • Pay our outstanding writers
  • Pay our world-class designer to make every page spectacular

 

 

Good Hooman Magazine is pricier than your average publication. The reason is quite simple - first of all, we can't print millions like the big magazines, which means a higher cost per copy. And, unlike newsstand magazines, Good Hooman Magazine will only have a few ads and no sponsored content.

Good Hooman is an exclusive magazine where all content is carefully crafted. The unusual nature of the magazine means it is a time-consuming, creative effort that takes a lot of skill to do convincingly.  

And, unlike hooman magazines that come and go every month, Good Hooman Magazine is a timeless keepsake that you’ll want to keep for doggy years to come.

Choose your perk below. You will have our endless gratitude for helping bring the world’s first print magazine by dogs, for dogs to life.

Sorry, there are no tote bags or t-shirts - just a fabulous magazine. Pre-order your copy right away. For early bird pricing, see the perks at the top right side of this page.

Premium supporters can have their very own dog on the cover. You supply the photos, we'll ship all copies to you. The cost is $2,000.

Martin Brock: Grew up with a dachshund named Hazel and is co-founder of “Everyone loves a Dachshund”. For more than a decade, he has worked in the digital marketing field and have years of experience with web-based projects and campaigns. Although based in Denmark, most of his work activities revolve around the United States.

Dan Miles: When he’s not helping the dogs of Good Hooman Magazine, Dan also contributes to specialist hooman titles, including the Huffington Post, TNT and the New Zealand Times and is also a bestselling author with his debut novel, Filthy Still. His most fervent wish is that his own four-legged friend, Buffy, would just come for walkies without having to be bribed and stop staring at him when he’s trying to eat a sandwich.

Cecilia Perriard: With over 16 years experience in the publishing market, Cecilia has worked on major international magazines - such as Lonely Planet, Newsweek and Reader’s Digest- and is now in charge of Forbes Argentina cover every month.

Pre-order your copy of good hooman magazine for the early bird price of just $10, please choose go to where it says "Featured" at the top right side of this page.

You supply the photos, we'll ship all copies to you. The cost is $2,000.Martin Brock: Grew up with a dachshund named Hazel and is co-founder of “Everyone loves a Dachshund”. For more than a decade, he has worked in the digital marketing field and have years of experience with web-based projects and campaigns. Although based in Denmark, most of his work activities revolve around the United States.Dan Miles: When he’s not helping the dogs of Good Hooman Magazine, Dan also contributes to specialist hooman titles, including the Huffington Post, TNT and the New Zealand Times and is also a bestselling author with his debut novel, Filthy Still. His most fervent wish is that his own four-legged friend, Buffy, would just come for walkies without having to be bribed and stop staring at him when he’s trying to eat a sandwich.Cecilia Perriard: With over 16 years experience in the publishing market, Cecilia has worked on major international magazines - such as Lonely Planet, Newsweek and Reader’s Digest- and is now in charge of Forbes Argentina cover every month.Pre-order your copy of good hooman magazine for the early bird price of just $10, please choose go to where it says "Featured" at the top right side of this page.

story:
One million links on one website! 

I've set up the website One Million Reached (www.onemillionreached.com) because I started running my own Shopify store, I designed the layout well, great products placed on their and started to advertise..

As we all know, advertising cost's BIG money! I advertised the store through Social media, google adds, Facebook adds etc, this generated traffic, some sales, however, as soon as the advert campaign ran to a close, traffic dropped, sales went down demanding me to spend more and more money-No thanks! 

To be honest I’ve got sick of trying to find ways to advertise my site. Yes you can use social media but that doesn’t help as your comments or your posts get buried under new posts, so I’m creating my own website which I can advertise my site and I would like to share this with others who feel like me. I haven’t got hundreds off pounds to spend on advertising and trying to create back links and so on... So I’m going to be designing a website where anyone can add there page, group, online store,YouTube channel, Facebook page and many more from as little as £1!

Some of the features on the site are:

A grid can be setup to allow users to change their pixel image, text, URL and email address on their own via a user login account.

Unlimited traffic to the website in turn people can click on your pixel advert and be directed straight to your URL/site.

Once you have bought your pixels their is no renewing them, costing more money, subscriptions to pay, there yours, just a one off payment for a advert for years!

You can edit them, change your logo, email address and URL fully editable

What can I share?

People like to make youtube videos about their life or a product or show off there gaming skills with this website you can advertise to the world what your all about, you can link the pixels to your Favourite video, story or your facebook page, you can edit the URL on your account and change the picture/image to your desire

You can share your Business, your blogs you can share anything you want and you can edit this at any time!

What have I put into this?

 I have bought the Domain name, web hosting space and already set up accounts on Social Media, including Facebook, Twitter, Instagram and more to help promote this. My objective is to email companies/Business as well as general people who just want to get their site/channel known.

So is that all I'm going to do? no.. I will constantly be promoting the site through advertising campaigns, supporting people and getting the site out their!

What are the funds for?

The Funds I am trying to raise is for the software package plus an advertising campaign.

http://w...

 I will close by saying all I can offer is 100% dedication to this project and all my time and effort and I will make this happen! be part off something great and join me!

story:
Short Summary

And We Whisper is the first in a poetry series entitled And We Speak. A message which was initially spread through Instagram, and now taken on a new life in print as Aishwarya Mitra creates this coffee-table conversation piece with thought-provoking poems on many topics gracing the headlines and many others going unnoticed today.

Hoping to one day insight conversation on a larger scale, I, Aishwarya, a rising college freshman wrote this book filled with bright colors and often grim topics to try and understand others' plights while trying to understand the community in which I reside as well!

About the Author

Aishwarya Mitra is a rising college freshman majoring in bio-engineering. Though STEM was her first love, she has since become increasingly engrossed with the world of political creative writing and hopes to one day take on a career in this field.

What This Initiative Needs & What You Get

As this is a self-publishing endeavor, almost everything related to book design and distribution will be conducted by Aishwarya with some voluntary help from peers. By investing in this book, you will be helping Aishwarya run advertisements on social media platforms and contribute towards illustrations within the book.

By helping Aishwarya Mitra raise funds before the book launch, you will also get receive special perks!

  • Signed Books
  • Signed Handwritten Letters
  • Your name in the "Acknowledgements" for helping jump-start this project! 
  • A graphic of you inside the book.
  • An invite to my launch-party post-COVID!

The Impact

Though the goal of this project is to initiate conversation, 90% of profits generated will also be donated to the Government Accountability Project

Risks & Challenges

The biggest risk in investing in this campaign is the expected delivery date within the end of the year. As I am handling everything myself, from design to delivery, there is a possibility of delay, though updates will be made regularly. Additionally, if any books are lost-in-transit, this pre-launch will cover a fast replacement.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you would like to continue to spread the word of this campaign:

  • Please follow @andwespeak on Instagram and also feel free to share this page via links at the top of this page!

Hope you enjoy and thank you for the support!

Much love,

Aishwarya

story:
Lucasfilm wants this book! 

 

The narrative of this book will be organized according to The Phases of the Geeker Gate, which is really the most important finding to come out of all of this.  You can read about the Geeker Gate here.  It will detail the strategies and tactics used by SJWs when they infiltrated the Star Wars IP.  It will show exactly how things happened according to these phases so that you can recognize it when it happens in the next IP, because it will.

It will also offer potential countermeasures as to how to fight this scourge.

The book will then serve as a guide for others seeking to fight Geeker Gates in their own hobbies.

Since Disney is notorious for their lawsuits, and Disney Star Wars is a knock-off version of genuine Star Wars anyway, I will be recreating certain images with photographs of knock-off Star Wars Action Figures, such as Ideal's STAR Team and others.

This will serve as a nice souvenir or memento of the trials and tribulations that fans have endured over the past couple of years for the genuine Star Wars fan.

All books will come with a signature in silver paint pen on the cover from Itchy Bacca himself!

 

Discounted Tiers

 

There are discounted tiers for purchasing 2, 3, 4 and 5 books.  Make sure your schools and libraries are stocked up!

 

10% Lucasfilm Discount

Any Lucasfilm representative or employee that emails me at itchybacca@protonmail.com from a genuine lucasfilm.com email address will receive a special link to a 10% discount.  Surely there are good folks working there too, and this may help them blow off a little bit of steam.

 

#DisneyStarWarsIsDumb

 


If you can't contribute, that's okay!  There are other ways to help!


Please share this campaign on every social media account you have access to.  Email it to your friends, family, and colleagues.  


The most important thing you could do is contact your favorite YouTuber, and ask them to invite me on to pitch the IndieGoGo.  


But you can also respectfully beseech Pablo Hidalgo to tweet this new campaign out as well.  He's quite the social media influencer!
 

STRETCH GOALS

$30,000 STRETCH GOAL - All contributors will receive an Itchy In Pablo's Mind bookmark.

$50,000 STRETCH GOAL - Contributors will be able to request the original working Itchy In Pablo's Mind book cover as a variant for their book.

$100,000 STRETCH GOAL - Color interior images in all books for all contributors.

$200,000 STRETCH GOAL - All contributors receive a free The Kelly Marie Tran Instagram Incident DVD signed by Itchy Bacca.

$300,000 STRETCH GOAL - I will produce a new documentary based on Disney Star Wars Is Dumb: A Geeker Gate Story, and all contributors will receive a DVD.  This documentary will be released two years after the close of this IndieGoGo.  

If you haven't seen my documentary on the Kelly Marie Tran Instagram Incident, you can see it here:

 

 

If you have any questions or concerns, please email me at itchybacca@protonmail.com

Twitter: @ItchyBacca

story:
What's Alban Lake Publishing?

An excellent question! Alban Lake Publishing is an independent book publisher. We work directly with authors to help them make their dreams a reality to to get them out in the world. We try to be a faithful publisher to those who want to stay with us, and a great first step for those who want to break into the world of writing. 

Why do an Indiegogo?

To be honest, we want to take our business to the next level. Alban Lake has been around for nearly 11 years, but the past 3 years has seen it pass to a new generation and seen it take off. Now we need a boost to get us really out there and known in the world with advertising, new equipment, and more. We're essentially a new start up at this point, having brought the company to that point, and we need that starting income to really make it work. 

How your contribution helps. 

Your contributions will go to help make us bigger. Currently we're a small handful of editors (only around 7) and we're doing novels, novellas, several magazines, and anthologies. We want to help more, but without more people we can't. We need more editors and extra funds to publish more and advertise more to really get things going. We're on the cusp, our books now being bought by Barnes & Noble among others, but we can't put up a billboard or even really spread it with Facebook advertising and without that extra knowledge and push, we can't help our authors and editors much at all. 

To put it simply, since we as a business have no credit, your backing will ensure that we can get new computers for our editors that need them, secure extra book printings per month, help to get at least one of our magazines pro-rated for better selling and better pay for authors, and help get us advertising so we can put our name out there as a publisher that can help you break into the writing world. 

Special Rewards

We're always working hard to improve what we put out and we now have digital books as well as new books coming out all the time. You can get signed copies of books, a subscription that will grant you access to all our digital content for a full year, book plates, special books, book boxes, and more. You could even have your name in a book or magazine as a contributor for helping us. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Hey, don't worry if you can't contribute directly. We understand very well that not everyone has cash at the ready. That doesn't mean you can't help spread the word about the campaign! Share it on Twitter, Facebook, wherever you feel it's appropriate and let the world know that Alban Lake wants to jump to the next level and help more dreams come true!
