story:
Short Summary

My name is Twyla, I am 13 years old and I dream of becoming a Veterinarian, my love for helping and protecting animals gave me the idea to write about what I love.  I wrote this book to encourage kids to read, create and imagine.  The Book is titled: Glitter Girl, its's about  about a girl that dreams of becoming a superhero that saves animals from all of the evil in the world.  It all started when a girl named Sheree was sitting on her porch with her mom reading a book about Superheroes and she wondered what it would be like  to save animals and the  world....  

The next day  Sheree was walking and talking with her friends and she  tells them  that she dreams of becoming a superhero just like Wonder Woman. Her friends laugh and walked away. Sheree was walking home one day after hanging with her friends, and suddenly Glitter fell from the sky and sprinkled all over her and she got a weird tingly feeling and out of nowhere Glitter started shooting out of her hands,  Then Sheree ran way in shock, and Glitter Girl was a reality!! 

I worked so hard writing this project because I want kids all over to know that you can be anything you want to be, So DREAM BIG!!  This is my first book, and I believe it can change lives. The money will be used to self publish. I need to get my book edited,  Illustrated and the book need to be formed and then published so I can share on all platforms. I want to self publish so I will have all rights and ownership. I eventually want to create merchandise for the characters of my book. After the book is published I want to travel to my hometown to promote the book and other cities. Your donations will help with all of this.

I want to encourage kids to read again. I love to read and I believe reading help kids become creative. Please help me with my dream? I work really hard in school, and I wrote this book between school, cheerleading and homework. One day I want to create a cartoon for my book characters. I'm already starting on a 2nd book . Thank you reading my story and understanding why I really want to get my book out there.

What We Need & What You Get

I will need $2,000 to publish this book.  The $2,000 will go towards:

*Cover Design

*Editing

*Proofreading

*PR and Marketing Plan

*Distribution

*Publication and Proof Copy

PERKS!!

All Contributors will receive a free excerpt from the book. Contributors who contribute $15+ will receive a free signed  copy of the book Glitter Girl. Contributors who contribute $25+ will receive a free signed copy of Glitter Girl and a free e book download. Contributors who contribute $50+ will receive 2 signed copies of Glitter Girl and a dedication on my Author page.

 

The Impact

Glitter Girl is a book that teaches kids to dream no matter if people laugh at them.  This book will help kids gain confidence, self love, learn about friendship and forgiveness, kindness, it will make reading more exciting again. This book also help kids understand the importance of loving and protecting all animals.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

I understand than not everyone will be able to contribute financially. If this project appeals to you and you can  see the benefit of this  book, please  know that you can play a part in spreading the word about the book and this fundraiser. You can:

Like my Facebook Author page and share this fundraiser: https://www.facebook.com/Author-Twyla-Carter-85...

Follow my Twitter page and tweet about this fundraiser: https://twitter.com/AuthorTwyla

Follow my mother's Twitter and tweet about this fundraiser: https://twitter.com/lovelysheree40

Blog about Glitter Girl and share this page with others.

 

I thank you in Advance for all of your help in support of this project. All support and donations no matter how large or small are greatly appreciated.

story:
Overview

We are living in a scary and unknown time. Everyday it seems like things are constantly changing and new information about the Coronavirus surfaces. During these days it is critical we take care of those most vulnerable including the children around the world. I have written a children's e-book to help teach kids why we are staying home during this time, and how they can help contribute to the health and well-being of others. This e-book has already been kid tested and parent approved. I have a large family full of children who I specifically thought of while writing this book. Not only did they understand the simple concepts this book conveys (washing your hands, staying at home while others are sick, blowing kisses instead of hugs), they loved the colors, fun characters, and overall story. This is a book your child will want read night and night again. 

"Mikey Stays Home" is to be a resource for kids, as well as, a support effort to help those around the world affected by this global pandemic. 

For each e-book purchased you will receive a pdf file of "Mikey Stays Home," and I will be donating $1 to Global Giving's Coronavirus Relief Fund.

(https://www.globalgiving.org/projects/coronavir...)

The Goal 

Our goal is to sell 10,000 copies of this book so we can donate $10,000 to the Coronavirus Relief Fund. The book is finished and available for download with a $2.99 donation, and also available in the Amazon Kindle store (https://www.amazon.com/dp/B086822Y2J/ref=cm_sw_... know for every book sold on Amazon I will also be donating the same dollar per book sale to the Coronavirus Relief Fund. 

The more copies sold, the more money together we can donate to Global Giving's Coronavirus Relief Fund.

 

The Impact

Collectively we have the power to make a huge impact. Many may feel as though a donation during this time just isn't possible. For the small cost of under three dollars you will receive this resource while donating to those in need.

The Global Giving's Coronavirus Relief Fund will help with the following: 

-Send doctors, nurses, and other front line responders to communities in need

-Get masks, ventilators, and other lifesaving medical supplies to hospitals and clinics

-Deliver essential items to struggling families and older individuals in quarantined cities and refugee camps

-Feed children that rely on school meals as their only source of nutrition Support hygiene awareness efforts

And much, much more..

Other Ways You Can Help

If you would like to donate directly to Global Giving's cause please visit the following link:https://www.globalgiving.org/projects/coronavir...

During these days it is critical we take care of those most vulnerable including the children around the world. I have written a children's e-book to help teach kids why we are staying home during this time, and how they can help contribute to the health and well-being of others. This e-book has already been kid tested and parent approved. I have a large family full of children who I specifically thought of while writing this book. Not only did they understand the simple concepts this book conveys (washing your hands, staying at home while others are sick, blowing kisses instead of hugs), they loved the colors, fun characters, and overall story. This is a book your child will want read night and night again. 
"Mikey Stays Home" is to be a resource for kids, as well as, a support effort to help those around the world affected by this global pandemic. 
For each e-book purchased you will receive a pdf file of "Mikey Stays Home," and I will be donating $1 to Global Giving's Coronavirus Relief Fund.
(https://www.globalgiving.org/projects/coronavir...)

The Goal 
Our goal is to sell 10,000 copies of this book so we can donate $10,000 to the Coronavirus Relief Fund. The book is finished and available for download with a $2.99 donation, and also available in the Amazon Kindle store (https://www.amazon.com/dp/B086822Y2J/ref=cm_sw_... know for every book sold on Amazon I will also be donating the same dollar per book sale to the Coronavirus Relief Fund. The more copies sold, the more money together we can donate to Global Giving's Coronavirus Relief Fund.
 

The Impact
Collectively we have the power to make a huge impact. Many may feel as though a donation during this time just isn't possible. For the small cost of under three dollars you will receive this resource while donating to those in need.
The Global Giving's Coronavirus Relief Fund will help with the following: 
-Send doctors, nurses, and other front line responders to communities in need
-Get masks, ventilators, and other lifesaving medical supplies to hospitals and clinics
-Deliver essential items to struggling families and older individuals in quarantined cities and refugee camps
-Feed children that rely on school meals as their only source of nutrition Support hygiene awareness efforts
And much, much more..

Other Ways You Can Help
If you would like to donate directly to Global Giving's cause please visit the following link:https://www.globalgiving.org/projects/coronavir...

story:
“Tessa, my child is interested in men/women, and I don’t know how to help them. Do you have any resources?”

This wasn’t the first time a parent would ask me this question . . . and it won’t be the last.

I’m Contessa Louise Cooper. A writer, speaker, advocate and an autism mom. I’ve been outspoken about my struggles as a single parent, raising a child with autism without many resources, governmental or otherwise. Those experiences can be found in my first book, “Mad At The World: How To Move On And Find Peace When You’re A Special Needs Parent”.

 

I’ve watched my son grow from a child to a man. However, I realize that I’ve done him a disservice. I haven’t prepared him to deal with things like raging hormones, dating, marriage and intimacy. In my quest to protect him from the “evils of the world,” I kept him a kid in my mind and OVERPROTECTED him.

 

Unfortunately, I’m not the only parent who has done this. I’m here to correct my mistake and help others do the same. It’s better late than never, right?

 

What is Autism, Sex & Dating all about?

Autism, Sex & Dating is written for individuals with high-level functioning autism to help them navigate the modern world of dating and sex. Think of it more as of a guide or handbook to read over and over again to help them feel more confident, and answer their most private questions.

 

Some of the things we will discuss are:

  • Self-Identity
  • Self-Worth
  • Dating
  • Sex
  • Living Together

 

I am working to compose a “true outline,” as I’m interviewing adults and young adults, parents and experts.

 

This book is for everyone. I create spaces that are inclusive of everyone because culture, sexual identity, spirituality all matter when you are dating.

 

I’m also working on a glossary of term and video to model words, such as “flirting”.

 

What does all this have to do with me?

Do you remember dating? Are you currently dating? How’s that working out for you? Some people find dating “a chore” and one of those “necessary evils” you need to do, so you don’t end up alone.

 

Imagine trying to date when you have high-functioning autism and have some of the following behaviors:

• limited or inappropriate social interactions;

• "robotic" or repetitive speech;

• challenges with non-verbal communication (gestures, facial expression, etc.) coupled with average to above-average verbal skills;

• tendency to discuss self, rather than others;

• inability to understand social/emotional issues or non-literal phrases;

• lack of eye contact or reciprocal conversation;

• obsession with specific, often unusual, topics;

• one-sided conversations; or

• awkward movements and/or mannerisms, to say the least.

 

I interviewed someone who has autism and they said, “It not that we don’t want to date and have sexual relations. We just don’t know how to initiate conversations about it.”

 

This book project is bigger than me, and it’s bigger than you. This book can and will change lives. I can’t do this alone.

 

Right now, I need your help getting my Autism, Dating and Sex book into the hands of autistic folx, parents, caregivers and organizations. I'm inviting you to join my movement and to make a difference. Can I count on you to help make this project a reality?

 

Your Support Will...

  • Produce and promote and publish the Autism, Dating & Sex book!  The data for the content is being collected from interviews and transcribed into text. I still need to hire a designer for the cover, a publicist, marketing and printing fees.
  • Develop an online platform to serve as an educational resource for autistic folx. I am searching for web developer and videographer to create an online platform where you can find written and video that answers questions about dating and sex.

This project is in the beginning stages of development and your support can help finish the work!

 

In Return...

You can receive a book that can help change the lives of many who have high-functioning autism.  This awesome perk includes a digital book or a printed autographed book. (We will vote on the cover design, later in the campaign)

You can also show your love with our Autism & Dating t-shirt designed by the artists at The Sand Gallery. They are working on the design as I’m typing this.

 

Risks & Challenges

  • What if we don't reach our financial goal? If we don't reach our financial goal, we will have to limit the number of copies we print and the number of autistic folx, parents and caregivers we can help. But nothing can stop me from writing this book, and doing all I can to get the word out to the ones who need it the most.
  • Where do you ship? We ship worldwide! Enjoy free shipping to the continental United States and Canada.  We will include standard shipping cost(s) outside of the USA.
  • Can I buy a book as a gift? Yes, they make wonderful gifts!
  • How can you help support the Autism, Dating & Sex Book? You can support us by spreading the word! Sharing our campaign story on social media helps reach more people and ultimately will help me change more lives!. Follow me on Twitter, Instagram, and Facebook!
  • Are you a charity? No, but in early 2018 I’ll be filing for our 501(c)(3) to become a non-profit organization specifically assisting autistic folx with dating and relationships.

 

Thank You!

Your support means everything to us! Every dollar, every tweet and every time you talk about the Autism, Dating & Sex book it helps our campaign! THANK YOU!

-Tessa

Sponsors

 

***Corporate and Non-Profit Sponsorships are available.

***I would like to be a guest on your podcast, radio show or blog.

story:
GARAMONDE MAGAZINE.

It started with Lesfeminin. I started the website/online magazine in 2014 when I started getting frustrated with the difficulties young creative individuals had getting their work published and out to the world. I started to publish young emerging artists, business owners, writers, and other creative individuals that I felt needed to be voiced somewhere. I loved the idea of keeping everything open for submissions as well so everyone really has the freedom to publish.

Now is the next step.

After venturing out to seek interviews and collaborations I felt like I wanted to have something with more meaning and more depth into the idea of showing this vulnerable connection between life and art that we have every day. These inspiring creative people I would interview motivated me and made me want to voice their actions and pieces of work that gave me that inspired feeling in hope that it would make the readers feel the same. I wanted something personal, close-up, and relatable.

Print seemed to be the natural next step for the magazine. Having a publication of my own is something I’ve dreamed of and I knew I had to go forward with it. Along with the decision, came a turnover, and I wanted to re-define the magazine to fit my personal growth since I started the Lesfeminin website. As i’ve grown older, the website has changed and grew with me. This led to a re-branding and a focused mission driving the magazine.

Formerly Lesfeminin.
Now, Garamonde Magazine.

This Indiegogo campaign is a key element to making Garamonde happen. Garamonde’s goal is quality over everything and we would like to generate a self published and self designed quality print magazine and be able to properly compensate the creative individuals who generate the content and work for the magazine.

100% of donations will be non-profit and will directly go towards print production and to the small-staffed, female powered team behind it.

I would love to share the amazing team that has come together to help keep the magazine and website going.
Elizabeth Mooney 
Laura Young 
Alejandra Moran
 Jakelen Diaz

XX,
Anna Zeltins Founder/EIC
WWW.GARAMONDEMAGAZINE.COM
https://www.instagram.com/garamondemagazine/

story:
"This is a book about how stupid I am.
I get on a horse, I go to an abandoned country,
I accept a quest others have died in,
To travel the land and defeat mythological creatures in one-on-one battles, 
All to bring back my little brother's dead dog.
Is it worth it?
I'll let you decide that."

 

Deity? What's that? Why should I read it?

   Deity is a novel based around your good ol' fashioned fantasy quest. Set in a forbidden, abandoned country, our main character seeks and finds the fabled quest set by the old king. If they complete this quest (which, given their IQ level, isn't amazingly likely), they will be granted the power of resurrection, a power they intend to use on their little brother's dead dog. 

  • If this is all seeming a bit serious for you, don't be alarmed - the main character's not the most intelligent, heroic protagonist, so a book told from their point of view isn't going to be all doom and gloom. 
  • I've also written this book with a basic structure which is easy to keep track of - with each chapter comes a new foe and a new battle to fight, very much like a video game.
  • At its heart, Deity is a story of exploration and a growing bond between the main character and their horse, Opuh. Though the main focus is on the quest, that doesn't mean there aren't heartwarming moments. 
  • I believe that when you read a fantasy book, you're there to have a little fun. So, why not have a good laugh? 

 

Why Should You Give a Random Person Your Money?

WARNING! Some serious sappiness ahead. If you don't do well with sappiness, I suggest keeping a bowl nearby just in case. (Still read it, though. It's important.)

  Hello! I'm Susi, the writer and creator of Deity. As university student in the UK, obsessed with fantasy, whether it be in a book, video game, TV show or film, I've been part of fan communities for years and seen their unity and power first-hand. 

  Which is why I've come to you.

  You are the reader, you are the one who is going to be travelling to my world, fighting alongside my characters, and I care about what you think. This way, you can be involved with the publication of Deity. You can give me your feedback and you can be a direct, vital part of the story. 

  Now, excuse the sappiness, but if you pledge to this campaign, you won't just be helping me get an editor or print the book, you'll be buying the book, yes (thank you!), but you'll also be bringing me one step closer to making my childhood dream a reality - being a published author with a story I'm passionate about, and a community surrounding it which I love.

Right, well, now that the goopy stuff is done, let's sort out the finance shenanigans.

 

Okay, I Need Some Help, But What For ?

Let me break my £2,200 goal down for you:

  • Editor: £500
  • Cover Artist: £150 (if more is raised I'm definitely giving them more - they're amazing)
  • Printing and ISBN: £1286
  • Reserves: £264 (in case something disastrous happens)

 

Stretch Goals!!

If we meet the goals set below, I'll be pairing up with some artists and adding some merch to the perks! These will be able to be purchased separately to the books, so anyone who's already pre-ordered can come back and get the merch at any time!
Let's reach these goals, guys!

 

Yep, There Are Some Scary Things. How Am I Going to Get Over Them?

Okay so, as with anything, there are some risks. This risks include:

  • Not getting the word out to enough people
  • Not raising quite enough funds

HOWEVER! Don't you worry - you're here, reading this. If you're here, then I've done the first job, I've reached you. And, raising funds is pretty much in correlation with reaching people, so that's covered, too.  

 

Can't Donate? Don't Worry, I Get You, These Things Can Be Hard. But You Can Still Help!

Though it would help me a LOT if you could donate, it's okay if you can't, I understand! But there's still something you can do!

If there is anyone you know who you think would like this book, whether it be a family member, a friend, colleague or maybe even your followers, I would be incredibly grateful if you could share this page with them. You can use the sharing tools on this Indiegogo page, copy and paste the link in the search bar, or even just tell them!

 

 

Now, this is probably the bit you've scrolled all this way for: the first page and a bit of Deity! Enjoy!

 

1

Why I Don't Like Caves

It was my decision to leave.

For splendour, for treasure, for fun? Who knew? I didn’t. I had no pigging idea. But when you’re four days out from the nearest town and one day up the tallest mountain you could find, that’s when sanity is ready to be questioned.

And trust me, I’d questioned it many times, but riding horseback on a cliff-edge with a dead dog on my lap… this was the lowest of the low. Further than low, somewhere far, far lower than low. I couldn’t get much lower.

I kept telling myself: Ginny won’t be dead much longer. I’ll find the quest. I’ll resurrect her. I’ll do it. But really? A quest for the power of resurrection… in this day and age, that all sounded very much fake. If only I’d thought like this a week ago.

Mountains, sparse greenery and thick fog had awed me at first, scared me, but now I was bored, as if a record of my favourite song had been set to play on repeat for weeks on end. Rocks. Just rocks. Rocks and grey, steel sky. You couldn’t exactly play ‘I spy’ when there were only three answers tops, especially when the only person to play it with was a horse. My bum was sore, my fingers felt numb… it was alright for Opuh with her thick mane and fur coat. To be honest that was probably my fault for not packing the right clothes, but packing gloves and a woolly hat didn’t exactly fit in the picture when Rinku had been describing a land of diamond birds and ‘flowers as big as your head’.

I was kind of glad he hadn’t come with me now. Him with that skinny little body of his wouldn’t have made it three days on the mountains without wasting away to nothing. At first I’d been begging for him to come but now… well let’s just say this mountain path wasn’t exactly wide enough for two horses. It was high, too. He was scared of heights.

I wiped snot from my runny nose, sniffing and rubbing my freezing hands together. I hadn’t been expecting a relaxing holiday in the sun but this was a little of an extreme contrast. At least the cold kept me awake. Falling off Opuh here wouldn’t be very pretty.

A jittering snort caught my attention. That shivering hand on her shoulder, I leant forward to see what was wrong - she gestured with her muzzle and I followed her gaze. I couldn’t have been any happier.

A cave! We were heading straight for a gloomy, deep, dark cave. We could get out of the cold, out of the bitter wind and actually rest for a while without the scare of deadly drops. Finally!

We plodded through the wide mouth, feeling the wind drop, the metallic sound of horseshoes hitting the stone floor echoing and pushing the last remnants of light back. It was dark in here… I unzipped my bag, pulled out my handset and held the small sphere tight in a fist. I always loved playing with the torch on this. Best birthday present ever. Instead of the average slab of a phone, this baby’s screen were eye contacts. Eye contacts. How cool is that?! I squeezed the ball and the day’s date filled my eyes. I didn’t need reminding how long I’d been gone, so I twisted the ball right once, twice, then blinked. When I opened them… light! My eyes were the torch! I still had to get used to how awesome this was. They were like the headlights of a car and I was the car! Okay stop, stop, matter at hand.

I looked up. Rocks. Left. Rocks. Right- Oh hello.

Dismounting, balancing Ginny on the saddle, I hopped to the wall. That definitely wasn’t a rock. It was like a hologram? Round, red, glowing not quite as bright as my eyes, just big enough to fit my hand through… Should I? I looked around at Opuh, who was staring at me expectantly. Okay then.

It turned green, and a warm beam grazed my knuckles. I could only allude it to the scanners at school. It was a pleasant sensation for a bit, tickly. It buzzed, flooded the cave in a bright, acidic green.

Opuh yelped and my stomach flipped as the ground seemed to be whipped from under us. Whoops.

For a second I was plummeting through the dark void, eyes wide open yet feeling tightly shut until my knees hit hard rock and forehead bounced painfully off the ground. Ow. My head span, playing tricks on me, for a moment knocking a sense of where I was from my memory. Slowly, I struggled to sit back on my heels and the loose fragments of information found their way back into the right slots of my brain. That had hurt. It was dark, my torch had cut out, I could have sworn my leg was bleeding and gods this place stank. The sphere was gone. My heart leapt. That… would cost a lot to replace.

Where was I? Where was Opuh? Where was Ginny?

~fin (for now)~

Thank you so much for reading! If you want to see more and get frequent updates, or maybe just have a chat, follow my social medias:

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/DeityNovel

Twitter: https://twitter.com/SusiWarner

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/susilouwarner

For splendour, for treasure, for fun? Who knew? I didn’t. I had no pigging idea. But when you’re four days out from the nearest town and one day up the tallest mountain you could find, that’s when sanity is ready to be questioned.
And trust me, I’d questioned it many times, but riding horseback on a cliff-edge with a dead dog on my lap… this was the lowest of the low. Further than low, somewhere far, far lower than low. I couldn’t get much lower.
I kept telling myself: Ginny won’t be dead much longer. I’ll find the quest. I’ll resurrect her. I’ll do it. But really? A quest for the power of resurrection… in this day and age, that all sounded very much fake. If only I’d thought like this a week ago.
Mountains, sparse greenery and thick fog had awed me at first, scared me, but now I was bored, as if a record of my favourite song had been set to play on repeat for weeks on end. Rocks. Just rocks. Rocks and grey, steel sky. You couldn’t exactly play ‘I spy’ when there were only three answers tops, especially when the only person to play it with was a horse. My bum was sore, my fingers felt numb… it was alright for Opuh with her thick mane and fur coat. To be honest that was probably my fault for not packing the right clothes, but packing gloves and a woolly hat didn’t exactly fit in the picture when Rinku had been describing a land of diamond birds and ‘flowers as big as your head’.
I was kind of glad he hadn’t come with me now. Him with that skinny little body of his wouldn’t have made it three days on the mountains without wasting away to nothing. At first I’d been begging for him to come but now… well let’s just say this mountain path wasn’t exactly wide enough for two horses. It was high, too. He was scared of heights.
I wiped snot from my runny nose, sniffing and rubbing my freezing hands together. I hadn’t been expecting a relaxing holiday in the sun but this was a little of an extreme contrast. At least the cold kept me awake. Falling off Opuh here wouldn’t be very pretty.
A jittering snort caught my attention. That shivering hand on her shoulder, I leant forward to see what was wrong - she gestured with her muzzle and I followed her gaze. I couldn’t have been any happier.
A cave! We were heading straight for a gloomy, deep, dark cave. We could get out of the cold, out of the bitter wind and actually rest for a while without the scare of deadly drops. Finally!
We plodded through the wide mouth, feeling the wind drop, the metallic sound of horseshoes hitting the stone floor echoing and pushing the last remnants of light back. It was dark in here… I unzipped my bag, pulled out my handset and held the small sphere tight in a fist. I always loved playing with the torch on this. Best birthday present ever. Instead of the average slab of a phone, this baby’s screen were eye contacts. Eye contacts. How cool is that?! I squeezed the ball and the day’s date filled my eyes. I didn’t need reminding how long I’d been gone, so I twisted the ball right once, twice, then blinked. When I opened them… light! My eyes were the torch! I still had to get used to how awesome this was. They were like the headlights of a car and I was the car! Okay stop, stop, matter at hand.
I looked up. Rocks. Left. Rocks. Right- Oh hello.
Dismounting, balancing Ginny on the saddle, I hopped to the wall. That definitely wasn’t a rock. It was like a hologram? Round, red, glowing not quite as bright as my eyes, just big enough to fit my hand through… Should I? I looked around at Opuh, who was staring at me expectantly. Okay then.
It turned green, and a warm beam grazed my knuckles. I could only allude it to the scanners at school. It was a pleasant sensation for a bit, tickly. It buzzed, flooded the cave in a bright, acidic green.
Opuh yelped and my stomach flipped as the ground seemed to be whipped from under us. Whoops.
For a second I was plummeting through the dark void, eyes wide open yet feeling tightly shut until my knees hit hard rock and forehead bounced painfully off the ground. Ow. My head span, playing tricks on me, for a moment knocking a sense of where I was from my memory. Slowly, I struggled to sit back on my heels and the loose fragments of information found their way back into the right slots of my brain. That had hurt. It was dark, my torch had cut out, I could have sworn my leg was bleeding and gods this place stank. The sphere was gone. My heart leapt. That… would cost a lot to replace.
Where was I? Where was Opuh? Where was Ginny?
~fin (for now)~
Thank you so much for reading! If you want to see more and get frequent updates, or maybe just have a chat, follow my social medias:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/DeityNovel
Twitter: https://twitter.com/SusiWarner
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/susilouwarner

story:
Short Summary

We suffer when we lose someone, or they get Alzeheimers, a head injury or we just have forgotten the terrific stories of our children, our growth & development or our travels and journeys. Write Heart Memories® is a storytelling journey that transforms your spoken words into a personal storybook that ignites your memory and the reader with your self-expression and unique living legacy.

Comfort and trust are what helps someone open up to storytelling and the feelings and emotions around that story that makes a great story, so I build this foundation until that person is ready to record their story with me. First, I email or send a welcome kit to every individual that includes a welcome postcard, a pamphlet of why their stories are important, two books I've written about how to get at your great stories and questions for the individual to fill out and 3 brief movies showing how important our stories are to ourselves and each other. I exchange emails and phone calls until the individual knows me as a dear friend. 

I spend 120 minutes with each person, and that can be broken down into whatever time frame the person is comfortable in scheduling. This journey works on the telephone, Skype, Zoom or in-person. When I listen to someone talking, I don't have anything else going on in my mind. There is no mind chatter. My mind is calm, and my heart is open.  

Everyone has at least one great story to tell, and I am passionate about giving people a chance to do this. I keep costs reasonable so people can do this. This campaign is crucial to me, and it matters that I have your support in growing this company. The first step is an assistant to help me so I can focus on transforming storytelling into a handcrafted personal book. And then hiring more people and training people to write heart memory practitioners. I see global storytelling villages and people being able to tell their stories to trusted individuals getting these books for themselves and their loved ones. You can see a little bit of my building community and where I'm going with this when you go to my community page.  I only put their first name unless specified, so some level is confidential but most important, people can benefit from this person's life. Stories connect us to each other.

Imagine, if you will, a place online where you know that you can go to find a book that you are interested in because of the cover, the description or you want to read that person's story. You pay .99 cents (this money will go towards website upkeep and strengthening our global storytelling villages), download the book and read it.  Now, we are using each other and appreciating our life experiences to help us grow, learn, heal, laugh, feel compassion, be inspired, motivated and gain insights. Our stories connect us to one another, and I want Write Heart Memories® to be that place where people know they can go to tell their stories or read a great book about someone else's story. If you will, it's like sitting around the campfire and telling stories to each other, but it's at your free will. Where's the campfire? It's in the books that ignite us to the call-to-action we are feeling at the time we download the book. 

This campaign calls up my most profound sense of responsibility, honor, and integrity. Please help me strengthen this vision for storytelling and expand this storytelling that connects us to each other and our legacies.

Writing and interviewing people for their stories has always been my passion. I'm a good listener, and people sense my non-judgment as they tell me their secrets with confidence. I make people comfortable because I open their heart when they are ready. My background as an Occupational Therapist, Feldenkrais Practitioner, and Pharmaceutical Rep strengthened these abilities. I turned Professional Writer seven years ago when I knew I had to bring my dream to life. 

I love writing peoples' stories, and I've been doing it for seven years. I am more than happy to share my first story FINDING OTIS or other stories so you can see my craft.  

What We Need & What You Get

I need $25,000.00 so I can hire someone.  This money would allow me to offer a salary to someone for six months that can hopefully lead towards a full-time position. 

The Perks:

Everyone who donates will become a patron and will be mentioned on my Patron Page on my website: www.bethlord.com

$25.00 or under will get you on my Patron Page and ebooks of these two books:

 

 

 

$ 50.00 will get you on my Patron Page, the two ebooks, and your choice of a softbound, printed, a detailed journal that helps with storytelling. 

$100.00 will get you on my Patron Page, the two ebooks, journal choice and a $75.00 credit to use for purchasing any of our products.  

$200.00 will get you on my Patron Page, the two ebooks, journal choice and $125.00 credit to use for purchasing any of our products. 

$500.00 on up will get you on my Patron Page, the two ebooks, journal choice and a discussion about what stories you want in a book because WE ARE MAKING YOUR BOOK.  Yay!  

If I don't reach my entire goal, I am going to continue. I have been doing this for seven years, and I have to do this no matter what. Your contributions will help me further this vision. I am so excited to ignite the world with this method of storytelling that comes from our hearts and is a lifelong legacy and honor to that person's life. AND, we will be able to read it. 

The Impact

I started a Kickstarter Campaign in the summer of 2013. It failed, and my depression hit the roof. How to cope? I left three weeks later to become a pilgrim and walk The Camino de Santiago.  This quest was an extraordinary experience. I walked it again in 2014, 2015 and then I volunteered in 2016.  After the two weeks of volunteering, I was walking on The Camino del Norte, and I broke down after two days. I sat in front of the Atlantic Ocean and was quiet. The Camino spirit came to me, and she told me to go home. My Camino had been my volunteering. My sister had died that January and the Camino lovingly said, "I can't bring her back. I am through with the Camino as I knew her. My Camino was now going home and getting my company together so I could listen to peoples' stories because that was going to be my new Camino."

I have written many books, and I am more than willing to show you. Writing is time-consuming as well as transcribing, editing and formatting. I love doing these processes because it's part of the person's transformational journey in telling their stories and getting a book from these stories. The storytelling into books is nourishment for our hearts and souls. 

Each book is my favorite because each is hand-crafted with the highest quality. 

Jump on my website and take a look at it. Give me a call. If this project resonates with you, then trust your instincts. All I can say is that you will always be a patron of our Write Heart Memories and I appreciate whatever support you give. 

Risks & Challenges

The dangers and obstacles I face include whether or not people identify with what I'm trying to do and the value in such a personal interaction. I've made it a point to take care of myself. I had high glucose, and I've changed my diet and my stress reactions so I can be calm in all situations as an entrepreneur. Cash-flow is vital, so every amount of money has to be used in the highest integrity of what is the priority in maintaining cash flow.

I'm involved in a coaching program by a team of experts who help me stay focused and on point. What does that mean? Thank you Jen Kem Media Group.  It means being able to relate to your pain points, your emotions and feelings and balance them. Because it is the feelings that make a great story. My behavior for capturing your story utilizes all emotions, so the storybook is a reflection of someone's unique essence.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't financially donate, I still need your help. Please spread the word to people who are interested in getting their family stories into books or an entrepreneur who wants their stories in books. You can use the Indiegogo share tools and TELL people I need their help. Thank-You!

story:
If your Riffs were at the beach, would they get sand kicked in their face by a Heavier Riff?

If the answer is “yes”, then you need a Charles-Atlas-like program of Strength Building for your Riff playing and Riff writing. If you’re tired of being the “98 lb. weakling” of Guitar Riffers....

 

 

...then it’s time for training...it’s time for revenge...

...it's time to go on a Riff Rampage! 

 

 

About The Book

Successfully funded on Kickstarter, and now on IndieGoGo In Demand!

Playing and writing awesome Riffs is one of the most gratifying and fun things to do on Guitar. Trouble is, most Guitarists don’t have a clue about how great Riffs are born. Is it magic? Is it simply raw talent? Or is it something that can actually be taught?

Happily, it’s the latter! There are core musical and technical concepts behind great Riffing - things like expanding your ideas about Power Chords, utilizing Voice Leading, harnessing the unique sounds of Chord Extensions, injecting Rhythmic Variety, unleashing Scale Fragments & Chromaticism, and a lot more.

Unfortunately, in the World of Guitar, bringing these concepts together into a holistic, practical, and practice-able format has eluded Guitar instructors and authors - to the detriment of all Guitar Students hungry for Heaviness.

With this new book from Metal Guitar Academy (and me - Brett Miller!), all of that is about to change. You hear the ideas in this book used all the time in Power Metal, Thrash, Death Metal, 80s Metal & Rock, Prog Metal, Instrumental Rock -but no one ever seems to explain what you’re hearing! With Riff Rampage! you’ll be able to understand what’s going on in all those cool riffs...and be able to play like that yourself!

What You'll Learn

With Riff Rampage!, you’ll not only get a book chock-full of clear and comprehensive explanations about the why behind awesome riffing, you’ll also get tons of examples as well. Plus, you’ll get audio/video demonstrations of each Riff and exercise, in a YouTube playlist, so that you can hear what it’s all supposed to sound like. 

The book is being written right now, and here are just some of the topics in store for you Shredding Skirmishers:

  • Detailed understanding of intervals and their usage in Riffing
  • Inversions of intervals, and how to Riff with them
  • Scales, and how they relate to Riffs
  • What “Power Chords” really are (and how to expand your usage of them)
  • Three-string Power Chords
  • Extended Harmony Power Chords
  • Diatonic Power Chord sequences
  • Extensive Power Chord “codex”, with all shapes clearly written and demonstrated in context
  • Triads & Arpeggios in Riffs
  • Voice Leading for Melodic & Modern-sounding Riffing
  • Scale Fragments in Riffs
  • Speed & Accuracy
  • Muting techniques
  • Trem picking

And a lot more! Riff Rampage! is truly the first book of its kind, laying out a comprehensive, top-level, practical approach to understanding, writing, and playing Riffs for Metal & Rock. Guitarists of any ability level, from Beginner to Pro player, will benefit from using this book. 

Riff-centric Perks

In addition to the book itself, I've put together some unique (and fun!) personalized Items for you to choose from. Check 'em out, and pick one that suits your style! All the Perks are cumulative, so each higher-tiered Perk includes all the Items from each previous Perk.

About Metal Guitar Academy

My sole aim as a Guitar Instructor is to provide clear, concise, and practical information in three important areas of Guitar playing: Technique / Neck Knowledge / Theory. Here at Metal Guitar Academy, I call this the T.N.T. Guitar Strategy. 

As a pro Guitarist, author / instructor, recording artist, and video game composer, I’ve had a lot of experience with what works, and what doesn’t - both from a playing & practicing standpoint, and from a teaching standpoint. As a private teacher to Guitarists around the world for over 15 years, I’ve become quite adept at identifying people’s playing problems, and then quickly diagnosing a solution. Over those same years, I also began to notice the glaring deficiencies in most Guitar instructional material, and as a result, began to create books and courses through Metal Guitar Academy.

Your progress as a player is my passion, and I’m excited to make Riff Rampage! the next nail in the coffin of mediocre Guitar instruction!

But, Can He Walk the Walk?

Talk is cheap. I’d want to make sure someone can bring the goods if I were going to get a book by them, and I’m sure you'd want to as well.

Here are some excerpts from one of my Instrumental Metal records, Oath Of Dagon, as well as a vid of some improv jamming. Feel free to check out the Metal Guitar Academy site in general (https://www.MetalGuitarAcademy.com) if you’d like to see more of what MGA is all about, or some more info about the other MGA books & courses offered as part of the Rewards.

 

 

Thank You!

A huge "Thanks!' to everyone who backed this Campaign in the initial fundraising stage...you're the ones that brought this project to life! Now, with this next InDemand stage, it has the ability to reach even more Guitar students around the world.

I really enjoy putting these projects together, and even though it’s a ton of work, it’s all worth it because of the opportunity that you give me to share this passion for the Guitar, Music, and Metal. 

Please share this Campaign far and wide, and help me to bring this book to as many Rampaging Riffers as humanly possible. Keep Shredding!

Risks & Challenges

No challenges with creating everything, but let's talk about...International Shipping!

So listen, I'm located in New York, USA, and we all know that shipping internationally is an added cost. If you live outside the USA, and you're interested in one of the Perks, but you really don't care about getting the physical copies of things mailed to you, then just send me a message. We can work out sending you everything digitally (signatures as well!) in hi-res, printable PDF format, without added shipping costs.

Feel free to check out the Metal Guitar Academy site in general (https://www.MetalGuitarAcademy.com) if you’d like to see more of what MGA is all about, or some more info about the other MGA books & courses offered as part of the Rewards.

 

 
Thank You!
A huge "Thanks!' to everyone who backed this Campaign in the initial fundraising stage...you're the ones that brought this project to life! Now, with this next InDemand stage, it has the ability to reach even more Guitar students around the world.
I really enjoy putting these projects together, and even though it’s a ton of work, it’s all worth it because of the opportunity that you give me to share this passion for the Guitar, Music, and Metal. 
Please share this Campaign far and wide, and help me to bring this book to as many Rampaging Riffers as humanly possible. Keep Shredding!
Risks & Challenges
No challenges with creating everything, but let's talk about...International Shipping!
So listen, I'm located in New York, USA, and we all know that shipping internationally is an added cost. If you live outside the USA, and you're interested in one of the Perks, but you really don't care about getting the physical copies of things mailed to you, then just send me a message. We can work out sending you everything digitally (signatures as well!) in hi-res, printable PDF format, without added shipping costs.

story:
5 things. 31 days. 155 reasons to be happy.

The myfivethings notebook is handmade, and designed specifically to be the perfect size for capturing small moments of gratitude, and to be super portable.

It's small enough to fit into your wallet or pocket, and big enough to collect your thoughts for the day. The notebook is 2.325 x 3.5", and made using a heavy-weight card-stock cover and high-quality Mohawk Eggshell superfine 104 gsm. Each notebook is then hand-bound by me with a simple and elegant pamphlet stitch.

The notebooks have a printed hand-lettered assortment of covers designed by my friend @goldmedalist (go check her out!)

I'm also super excited that a friend of mine (@bchan.png) has offered to create some beautiful thank you cards which will be winging their way to you.

A little background on me and the project...

My name is Tom, and there are times when I've struggled to stay positive about my life and keep perspective around how fortunate I am for all the good things I have.

To help myself, I have started a habit: every morning when I wake up, I write down 5 things about my life which I appreciate or make me happy. I've found that recognizing those smaller parts of my life, and celebrating them, allowed me to remain more positive and improve how I felt. 

I'm pursuing this project because I really want to share this experience with more people, in the hope it can help them also. My hope is: with the 31 days this notebook provides, you will have time to notice an impact and to begin forming a habit for the future.

story:
¡HOLA!

Somos la Asociacion Universitaria Bocamina de la ETSIME. Surgió hace un tiempo la idea de relanzar la revista de la escuela para intentar mejorar el conocimiento de todos sus miembros de los eventos y actividades que tienen lugar en la escuela. Diversas asociaciones, organismos y empresas tanto de fuera como de dentro de la UPM ya han mostrado su apoyo a este proyecto, pero por desgracia todos los recursos aportados aun son insuficientes.

Se trata de un proyecto sin obtencion de beneficio económico dónde todos los ingresos irán destinados a la publicación de la revista y a la financiación de proyectos que cumplan con el mismo objetivo de mejorar la comunicación entre colectivos de la ETSIME.

Gracias a todos vosotros podremos conseguir una Escuela más interactiva, comunicativa, abierta y divertida con participación de todos nosotros.

Lo que necesitamos

Debido al alto precio de las imprentas nos esta costando mucho conseguir toda la financiacion necesaria para materializar el proyecto. Necesitaremos unos 2000€ para publicar durante este curso todos los ejemplares que tenemos pensados, unas 5 ediciones + la edición especial de Santa Bárbara (con todas vuestras fotos en color!!).

Esta revista esta abierta a todo el mundo que quiera participar o publicar en ella, y nos servirá para conectar a todos los miembros de la escuela y visibilizar mucho más las actividades de las asociaciones. Queremos que se trate de una publicación que responda a la necesidad de informacion y comunicación entre todos los alumnos y todos los organismos que componen la ETSIME.

Aunque no se consiga llegar al objetivo de la campaña de crowdfunding, ¡¡cualquier colaboración es bienvenida!!, nos ayudará a ir publicando los primeros números de la revista. Esto es muy importante ya que de esta manera podremos atraer a patrocinadores que quieran apoyar a la revista.

El impacto en la Escuela

La publicación de la anterior revista (hace ya 3 años del su último ejemplar) mejoró notablemente la comunicaión y la relacion entre las asociaciones, la escuela y los alumnos. Desde entonces se ha perdido poco a poco la sensación de comunidad entre los grupos que forman la escuela. Pretendemos revertir este pérdida y recuperar esa sensación mediante la publicacion de una nueva revista, y crear un referente común donde cualquier sector pueda expresarse.

Retos

Nuestro principal reto es generar contenido suficiente para llevar a cabo las ediciones que queremos publicar de la nueva revista. Para ello hemos diseñado una estrategia eficiente para llevar a buen puerto el proyecto:

  • Al contrario que nuestros predecesores, queremos publicar ediciones más cortas pero mensuales, lo que  nos permitirá abaratar costes y poder general menos contenido de una forma contínua y con una dinámica de trabajo establecida.
  • Un sistema de mecenazgo y financiación que permite financiar la revista, con el apoyo del resto de asociaciones, la dirección de la escuela y empresas y organismos proximos.
  • Una estructructura de trabajo basada en delegar responsabilidades a personas capaces y con espíritu de trabajo y voluntad de hacer de la ETSIME un lugar mejor

Otras fromas de ayudar

¡Que no puedas colaborar económicamente con nostros no significa que no puedas ayudarnos! Esta es una lista de cosas que puedes hacer:

  • ¡Haz ruido! Difunde esta campaña entre tus amigos y conocidos, cuelgalo en tus Redes Sociales, o manda el link por whatsapp. ¡Seguro que con tu ayuda llegamos más lejos de lo que nos imaginamos!
  • Participa creando contenido para la revista: Ponte en contacto con nosotros para ver como nos puedes ayudar.

Un sistema de mecenazgo y financiación que permite financiar la revista, con el apoyo del resto de asociaciones, la dirección de la escuela y empresas y organismos proximos.

Una estructructura de trabajo basada en delegar responsabilidades a personas capaces y con espíritu de trabajo y voluntad de hacer de la ETSIME un lugar mejor



Otras fromas de ayudar
¡Que no puedas colaborar económicamente con nostros no significa que no puedas ayudarnos! Esta es una lista de cosas que puedes hacer:


¡Haz ruido! Difunde esta campaña entre tus amigos y conocidos, cuelgalo en tus Redes Sociales, o manda el link por whatsapp. ¡Seguro que con tu ayuda llegamos más lejos de lo que nos imaginamos!
Participa creando contenido para la revista: Ponte en contacto con nosotros para ver como nos puedes ayudar.

story:
Nia's Journey...

Nia's journey to creating short stories began when she caught the attention of her family while reading her short stories.  As it turns out, these short stories were fun, engaging, and full of delightful messages.  Nia compels her audience by delivering her messages with passion, excitement, and intense emotion. With your help, these thematic stories will be delivered to the homes of children who will be enriched by the content and dazzled by the hand painted illustrations. As an added bonus, your support will help to develop a young aspiring author. 

 

 

 

I'd like to thank Greg Slade for his amazing hand painted illustrations.

Sketches...

story:
Please Do NOT contribute to this campaign. I’ve decided to postpone the project and issue refunds to all contributors. See the updates section for more details. Thanks!

 

Sales Success Stories - The Book (Volume 2)

After a successful crowdfunding campaign to raise the money to produce the first volume of this book series, it’s time to do it again! This more direct model allows us to better fund all of the up-front expenses related to putting together a professionally produced ebook, paperback book, hardcover book and audiobook without giving up large percentages to Amazon, Audible and the like. More importantly it allows us to involve you in the process and share tons of behind the scenes details and early bird access through advance review copies.

It also allows us to thank many of the contributors who make the project possible, by name, IN the book!

My name is Scott Ingram and I'm the host of the Sales Success Stories Podcast. This is my passion project as I'm also a quota carrying sales professional myself, and am always looking for ways to improve myself and my own sales results.

The driving force behind the podcast and these books is the desire to create practical and inspirational content for sales professionals, by sales professionals. But not just any sales practitioners. Every guest on the podcast and contributor to the book is a quota carrying seller who is either the #1 top performer on their team, or is in at least the top 1% on a very large sales team.

To get a really good sense of what you can expect as a result of this campaign, you can take a look at the first Sales Success Stories book, or the more recent B2B Sales Mentors book which is really more of a sampler that contains 10 stories from the first book and 10 preview stories from this coming second volume. Most importantly take a look at what people say in their reviews.

What's missing from the sales book marketplace in general is real stories from real sellers who are at the top of their game NOW talking about what's working for them. In this book you won't be preached at. Instead you'll just get to read or listen to raw, emotional stories from the best of the best about real deals and real experiences and what they've learned.

What We Need & What You Get

There are a myriad of details involved in publishing a book and audio book. Your support will help pay for the design, editing, proofreading, layout, printing and distribution of the book and the recording, editing, and distribution of the audiobook.

You can choose to receive any combination of the ebook, book, audiobook in addition to options for sneak previews of the content, opportunities to connect directly with some of the co-authors, videos from the first Sales Success Summit or a ticket to the next Sales Success Summit where we’ll officially launch the book and where you’ll be able to meet almost all of the story contributors in person

Need something special? Maybe a package of 37 books? Just reach out and I'll be happy to setup a custom perk for you.

ALL Contributors of $50 and above will get their name in the book AND access to a Google Doc where you can read all of the currently submitted stories right now!

The Authors

So far the following sales professionals have all committed to submitting some of their stories to the cause. All of them have appeared on the podcast and their names are linked to their respective episodes:

Nicole Miceli - PULSE Technology
Leila Mozaffarian - Zipwhip
John Reidelbach - Emerson
Scott Barker - Sales Hacker/Outreach.io
Carson Heady - Microsoft
Jeremy Leveille - LeadIQ
Evan Kelsay - Seismic
Jack Wilson - Cinch IT
Nora Edmonds - Hubspot
Abel Lomas - TrustRadius
Nate Branscome - Chili Piper
Jamal Reimer - Oracle
Craig Nishizaki - UpTop
David Weiss - ADP
Jelle den Dunnen - Bullhorn
Stephen Holgate - Dale Carnegie
Elizabeth Tolin - Chargify

Shipping

Shipping in the US is included for free. International shipments will be charged an additional fee to cover the difference in cost.

Keep in mind that books are heavy and that fee quickly adds up with larger quantity orders. Sorry. Come to the Sales Success Summit and take delivery for free! ;)

Delivery

You can expect to receive access to the final ebook and audiobook via email and the final paperback book delivered to you sometime in October 2019.

If you choose to take advantage of the preview options those will likely be available 1-2 months in advance.

Should you choose to receive access to the Sales Success Summit videos you will get access to those right away, with the remaining items delivered based on the schedule outlined above.

Risks & Challenges

There are always risks. The most significant risk associated with this project is a timing risk. We’ve delivered out last two project on time and even early, though with B2B Sales Mentors (self funded, not crowdfunded) the audiobook release was delayed by a couple of weeks due to some technical glitches with our distributor.

There’s extra pressure to be on time with this one as we’re planning to release this book AT the Sales Success Summit on Tuesday, October 15th. Unless something crazy happens we’re not going to miss that deadline.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you're not already subscribed to the podcast that's the best place to start. You can find links to all of the various ways to subscribe here.

Once you've done that, please share this campaign. Whether or not it makes sense for you to participate and contribute, please share this with your friends in sales and across your favorite social networks.

Thank you for your support of the Sales Success Community!

All of them have appeared on the podcast and their names are linked to their respective episodes:Nicole Miceli - PULSE TechnologyLeila Mozaffarian - ZipwhipJohn Reidelbach - EmersonScott Barker - Sales Hacker/Outreach.ioCarson Heady - MicrosoftJeremy Leveille - LeadIQEvan Kelsay - SeismicJack Wilson - Cinch ITNora Edmonds - HubspotAbel Lomas - TrustRadiusNate Branscome - Chili PiperJamal Reimer - OracleCraig Nishizaki - UpTopDavid Weiss - ADPJelle den Dunnen - BullhornStephen Holgate - Dale CarnegieElizabeth Tolin - ChargifyShippingShipping in the US is included for free. International shipments will be charged an additional fee to cover the difference in cost.Keep in mind that books are heavy and that fee quickly adds up with larger quantity orders. Sorry. Come to the Sales Success Summit and take delivery for free! ;)DeliveryYou can expect to receive access to the final ebook and audiobook via email and the final paperback book delivered to you sometime in October 2019.If you choose to take advantage of the preview options those will likely be available 1-2 months in advance.Should you choose to receive access to the Sales Success Summit videos you will get access to those right away, with the remaining items delivered based on the schedule outlined above.Risks & ChallengesThere are always risks. The most significant risk associated with this project is a timing risk. We’ve delivered out last two project on time and even early, though with B2B Sales Mentors (self funded, not crowdfunded) the audiobook release was delayed by a couple of weeks due to some technical glitches with our distributor.There’s extra pressure to be on time with this one as we’re planning to release this book AT the Sales Success Summit on Tuesday, October 15th. Unless something crazy happens we’re not going to miss that deadline.Other Ways You Can HelpIf you're not already subscribed to the podcast that's the best place to start. You can find links to all of the various ways to subscribe here.Once you've done that, please share this campaign. Whether or not it makes sense for you to participate and contribute, please share this with your friends in sales and across your favorite social networks.Thank you for your support of the Sales Success Community!

story:
Story

I am Cassandra Parker. I love the arts in all forms. Artist endeavors bring joy, a vision of the world, are passionate, and creative. I am the author if the Ride With Harley series. As I entered the writing life  I noticed in various writing groups a large number of talented people cannot get their work in print. In talking with artists, poets, and photographers, many had the same challenges.

My plan is to start an indie publishing company aimed getting unusual creative work to the public. These artists have stories that need to be told.

Contributions will go a long way toward reaching this goal and giving a voice to artists whi might not otherwise get their stories told. I am aiming to publish work from around the world, thus bringing a unique viewpoint to their work.

What We Need & What You Get

I'm looking for $2,500 usd to pay for initial copyright registration, printing, cover design, marketing, and shipping.

F I don't reach my entire goal the funds collected will still be used to help started. Full production will take longer to reach.

i am offering a unique perk: an autographed paperback copy of the first book.published.

The Impact

Unique artists will be given a voice to tell their stories to the world.

Risks & Challenges

As with any venue there is a risk failure.

I am building a dedicated team who will fine tooth comb every aspect of our venture. I have a list if potential editors, art directors, and designers ready to work smart and hard to make this project a success.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't financially help out, please post this campaign to your social sites such as Facebook, Twitter, My Life, blogs, Instagram, etc. Every effort made is appreciated.

Don't forget to make use of the Indiegogo share tools.

Thank you very much!

story:
Méthode de Musculation WARRIOR

Voici un programme hardcore qui va vous choquer par ses résultats.

Dans ce guide pratique je vous révèle:

  • Comment progresser depuis n'importe quel niveau jusqu'à devenir une véritable "machine de guerre".
  • Préparez-vous à une intensité d'entrainement comme vous n'en avez jamais connue.
  • Avec ces séances qui vont sans cesse vous surprendre, vous n'aurez pas d'autre choix que de progresser de manière spectaculaire.

La méthode WARRIOR, c'est quoi ?

Le programme Warrior est très différent d’un programme “classique” de musculation. Je l’ai conçu dans le but de créer le programme le plus complet possible.

Le programme Warrior va stimuler l’hypertrophie musculaire mais également vous permettre de devenir un athlète bien plus efficace. 

Vous allez gagner en force et en puissance sur les exercices les plus importants. Travailler la vitesse et l’endurance.

Plus qu’un programme de musculation au sens esthétique du terme, le programme Warrior est un programme de conditionnement physique total. Quand vous aurez maîtrisé ce programme, vous serez devenu une véritable machine de guerre.

Vous aurez l’apparence d’un guerrier, puissant et musclé… et surtout vous en aurez la force, l’agilité et la condition physique exceptionnelle.

Ce programme s’inspire des nombreuses disciplines que j’ai pratiquées au cours de ma carrière:

  • bodybuilding
  • powerlifting
  • crossfit
  • conditionnement physique pour les arts martiaux...
    Le programme s'appuie sur tout ça et en fait une synthèse qui vous fera progresser sur de nombreux aspects en même temps.

Les séances complètes du programme sont très exigeantes. C’est pourquoi la première partie de la méthode WARRIOR va vous familiariser avec la plupart des exercices et techniques d'entraînement.

Si vous n’avez pas le niveau pour pratiquer les séances de niveau difficile (Niveau III), vous commencerez par les séances de Niveau I.

Votre but sera de progresser du Niveau I au Niveau II jusqu’à être capable de vous entraîner au Niveau III.

Ne brûlez pas les étapes. Je vous donnerai dans le livre le moyen précis de savoir quand passer au niveau supérieur.

De cette façon, ce programme peut être pratiqué par tout le monde. Si vous êtes débutant votre objectif sera d’atteindre le niveau suffisant pour vous entraîner au niveau maximum. Et si vous avez déjà de l’expérience, vous pourrez peut être passer rapidement au niveau suivant.

À l'attaque !

Rassurez-vous, je ne vais pas vous encombrer de théories compliquées. Je sais que vous êtes impatient(e) de commencer votre transformation.

Dans le livre, je vous donne les explications techniques et théoriques nécessaires au fur et à mesures que vous pratiquerez vos séances. De cette façon vous pouvez les mettre en pratique immédiatement, dans la séance du jour.

Voici certains des points clefs de votre programme et comment il va être structuré.

#Attaque Surprise

Le programme change chaque semaine pour vous surprendre à chaque fois et garder le bénéfice de la surprise. Un programme qui varie souvent oblige votre corps à s’adapter et vous oblige à ne pas rechercher la facilité. Mentalement c’est un plus très motivant, le challenge est toujours présent et vous aurez hâte de savoir ce qui vous attend à chaque séance.

Lisez une première fois ce que vous devez travailler le jour même. Visualisez toute votre séance et vérifiez bien comment se pratiquent tous les exercices. 

Une fois dans votre séance, vous ne devez pas laisser la place au doute. Pas question de prendre une pause trop longue pour chercher le matériel ou vous demander combien de répétitions vous deviez réaliser.

Vous devez planifier votre séance avant, arriver sur place en conquérant et tout donner sans regarder en arrière.

Atout #Spécialiste

Certains exercices clefs sont travaillés de façon récurrente pour permettre la progression en technique et en force sur ces mouvements irremplaçables. 

Vous les rencontrerez à des moments différents de votre programme, en fonction des séances. Il est primordial de noter votre progression sur ces exercices clefs.

Chaque fois que l’un de ces exercices sera présent dans votre séance, je vous le signalerai. Vous devrez vous baser sur votre performance précédente et tenter de l’améliorer d’une façon ou d’une autre. Que ce soit en réalisant une répétition de plus, en utilisant plus de poids ou en étant plus rapide.

Atout #Force et Puissance

Vous allez travailler la force sur des exercices de powerlifting et des versions modifiées d’haltérophilie vous permettront de gagner en explosivité et puissance.

#Omni-Cardio

Durant le programme Warrior, vous n’aurez pas de séance de cardio à proprement parler. Le cardio est partout dans votre entraînement. Que ce soit par les pauses courtes de certains enchaînements d’exercices ou directement durant les #Assauts Cardio, vous allez travailler le système cardio vasculaire tout en brûlant les graisses, au sein même d’une séance Warrior.

Capacité #Beast-Fight (niveau 2 et 3)

Qui dit Warrior, dit entraînement de guerrier. Et l’attitude que vous aurez en pratiquant les techniques de #Beast-Fight devra refléter cet état d’esprit.

Quand votre séance fera appel à l’une de ces techniques, vous devrez tout donner. Il n’est pas question ici de se ménager en pensant au reste de la séance et en gardant de l’énergie pour plus tard. Si vous faites cela, vous le faites pour rien.

Les #Beast-Fight se font dans l’optique de la survie en milieu hostile. Vous aurez un certain nombre de répétitions à réaliser durant un certain temps. Et vous devez le faire exactement comme si votre vie en dépendait.

Je sélectionne des exercices qui ne nécessitent pas une technique stricte, de façon à éviter les blessures. Vous devrez utiliser votre visualisation pour vous donner à 100%. 

C’est dans ces moments là que vous allez repousser vos limites. Je vous donnerai des exemples de visualisions et de motivations quand il sera temps de pratiquer cette technique.

Bien sûr,  je ne révèle pas tout ici, il y plusieurs surprises dans le programme auxquelles vous ne vous attendez pas ! Si vous êtes prêt(e) à passer votre entrainement au niveau hardcore et progresser comme jamais...

Un conseil: Prévenez quand même vos amis avant de vous lancer dans votre transformation WARRIOR... d'ici quelques mois, ils risquent de ne pas vous reconnaître !

story:
"I bid you welcome..." Well, if you are here then you are someone whom is familiar with the subject of London After Midnight, starring Lon Chaney, the pioneering “Man-of-a-Thousand-Faces”. Directed by Tod Browning and released in 1927, critical consensus of the film was mixed...But of course, you knew that already didn't you? 

However, in the mid-1960s, a fire broke in the MGM vaults claimed what is thought to be the last known print of London After Midnight; a tragedy which has since, garnered it the legendary status as the “Holy Grail” of the lost silent film era. While numerous claims persist that a print may still exist somewhere in the world, all "theories" have so far proven fruitless and the wishful thinking of Chaney fans! Over ninety-years-later, so far, all we have been accustomed to is a series of photographs capturing Chaney’s iconic vampire, as well as many production notes and publications, yet, any trace of the film itself remains unfound and presumably lost forever.

Various reconstruction attempts of the film, although impressive and valiant, have only added to the mystique of London After Midnight’s legacy; in 1985, author, Philip J. Riley, created his own photo-reconstruction of the film’s plot. Then, in 2002, TCM presented a motion reconstruction of the film, completely comprised of still photographs, regarded as the nearest experience to seeing the film as was originally seen.

However, that is no longer a 100% fact anymore.

How is this book different?

With an affinity for the silent era, and a fascination of Lon Chaney, I set out to discover as much new material on London After Midnight as possible! With hard graft and many, many, many amazing and helpful leads, my research has resulted in perhaps the best discovery to-date on the so-called "lost" film... During my searching I was eventually blessed to discover over 30 frames from Lon Chaney's films which included the lost London After Midnight! My eyes went as wide as the vampire itself staring back at me on the fragments. "FINALLY" I thought! This, along with my many other discoveries, could now become the foundation for the book I always hoped to make since childhood and release a chunky book any die-hard Chaney fan would love to own!

Impact:

There have been a sleuth of articles and various book publications; a most-notable publication was by Thomas Mann; responsible for discovering a previously-unknown novelised magazine story for the film. I was later able to bring a new piece of insight to Mr. Mann’s original analysis which prompted his second volume for which I was kindly acknowledged within (adding to my London After Midnight credentials).

But now, the greatest find after years of hopeful searching, to date, a series of surviving nitrate fragments of the film ITSELF which have been agreed to debut in my book!!! Having searched archives and scouring for leads I was fortunate to witness these images for the first time and present them in full analytical study. Other impressive materials include a rare first draft script and new production photographs; shown here for the first time! A remarkable find for something so lost, yet, provides a new glimmer of hope for fans that London After Midnight might still be within closer reach than we think. However, now I require funding to acquire licensing rights to some of these important materials, and to create a fantastic book which is where YOU guys can hopefully help…

Risks & Challenges

Research resources can be a very costly venture if not backed by an institution, and it is an endeavour I’ve been very fortunate to embark on and achieve so much with my own limited resource. However, now, I need to begin assembling my materials around my written analysis of the film as so to deliver a visually striking, yet, highly informative book which is bound to excite and please those as equally as fascinated with London After Midnight as I have been for so many years.

The funding raised will be able to cover licensing costs to feature certain archival materials within the book; materials which are hundreds of dollars/pounds range just for their licensing for publishing usages. As a majority of the materials reside in international collections and archives, I am required to journey overseas to reference photograph them which funding would permit me to accomplish with 0 barrier, as well as examine various archives I am yet to visit. Also the funds raised will give the opportunity to have a creative graphic artist to design the book cover and create a visually striking book cover.

For those with a passion for Chaney films, London After Midnight or silent lost cinema, this book will deliver a great new treat for your shelves! It is REALLY important for me to be allowed to finish gathering this material to present it in its entirety to share with all wanting to discover more on this title for themselves. You will be amongst the first people ever to see this new-found material as well as receive some amazing rewards for your amazing contribution!

There are a range of amazing rewards to be had for your participation in helping to bring this scholarly endeavour to life; from books and DVD's, to special prints and informative documents, you will have full opportunity to own a piece of the experience for yourself!

Check out our rewards, and PLEASE help this project!
