story:
Bojo

Have you ever been bullied?  Felt like no one understood or supported you? Have you grown stronger from the experience, and felt like you have to give back to others who feel the same way?

Bojo: A new kind of superhero is a children’s book that was inspired by my real-life experience growing up. I decided to write this children’s book to instil the idea of hope and motivation in children. I want to educate them to know that they will overcome any odds, and learn to become stronger and love themselves for who they uniquely are.

Through this book, I want children to realise that everyone is created special. I also wish to teach children about the concept of giving back.

Bojo is a ninja dragon rabbit superhero, whose father is a dragon and mother is a rabbit. In school, he was bullied and teased because he came from two different creatures. He felt like a misfit. One day, he suddenly gained superpowers by consuming very bright neon blue water. He became strong and grew wings, and most importantly, he knew within him that he had to help others who were bullied, like he was, and help those who were in trouble. With these new superpowers, he protected the innocent.

Children are the most powerful beings of this world and we as adults are their gatekeepers, providing them with the education, love, protection, knowledge and tools to navigate through this life. I think of this book as a faint little whisper to children to follow their hearts and love themselves for who they are and pay it forward to others.

Now, I’m looking for support to get it published and distributed worldwide. I hope that my story resonates with a part of you and it could be told in a way that would make it easier to bring awareness to bullying.

With its beautiful illustrations, professional editing and high-quality colours with a laminated cover, this book provides many wonderful moments of hope, bravery and unyielding love to share!

 

 

This story is about a new kind of Super Hero Bojo. 

He is the product of George ( George is a dragon) and Martha ( She is a rabbit)

Under the large blue moon, two wonderful parents stood proud by their son’s crib watching him sleep peacefully. Bojo, the child, was created by the union of two different families: The Dragon and The Rabbit. George the Dragon met Martha the rabbit one night under a cherry tree and the two became fast friends. It wasn’t much longer before the two were married and had a son, Bojo. Most children from two different creatures will either look like one parent, and Bojo looked like both his parents. His silky fur was a bright green, the color of his father’s scales. His long green ears flopped around but stayed up. At first Martha and George thought that he was just a green bunny until he turned five years old and grew a set of sharp teeth and later would grow wings.

 

 

Bojo, Drinking from a neon blue pond and getting is wings and now can blow fire. 

Bojo's Aunt is giving Bojo a special ninja outfit that she was going to give to her own children but never had any. She knew this was meant for Bojo

Bojo, Learning from his father martial arts

He spent his days training with his father, learning everything he could. The Dragon Clan were proud ninjas. He started by learning how to look inside himself. Meditation was hard, it took Bojo months to sit still for an hour. As a ninja, it’s important that you know how to sit still and be able to focus on the things around you. After that he moved on to fighting without weapons. The dragon course was perfect for learning how to sneak without making a sound, jumping, and being able to climb walls. He also learned the basics of defense and kicking.

Bojo in the city and rescuing a lady and her baby from a fire buy make a whole to escape

What the money will be used for:

 

 

Risks & Challenges

The challenges in this project are minimal. I have very good printing service that has an excellent record for on time delivery and another great company that is going to produce the rewards. 

 

Another great way to help us achieve are goal is to share on social media. Thanks in advance
story_txt: BojoHave you ever been bullied?  Felt like no one understood or supported you? Have you grown stronger from the experience, and felt like you have to give back to others who feel the same way?Bojo: A new kind of superhero is a children’s book that was inspired by my real-life experience growing up. I decided to write this children’s book to instil the idea of hope and motivation in children. I want to educate them to know that they will overcome any odds, and learn to become stronger and love themselves for who they uniquely are.Through this book, I want children to realise that everyone is created special. I also wish to teach children about the concept of giving back.Bojo is a ninja dragon rabbit superhero, whose father is a dragon and mother is a rabbit. In school, he was bullied and teased because he came from two different creatures. He felt like a misfit. One day, he suddenly gained superpowers by consuming very bright neon blue water. He became strong and grew wings, and most importantly, he knew within him that he had to help others who were bullied, like he was, and help those who were in trouble. With these new superpowers, he protected the innocent.Children are the most powerful beings of this world and we as adults are their gatekeepers, providing them with the education, love, protection, knowledge and tools to navigate through this life. I think of this book as a faint little whisper to children to follow their hearts and love themselves for who they are and pay it forward to others.Now, I’m looking for support to get it published and distributed worldwide. I hope that my story resonates with a part of you and it could be told in a way that would make it easier to bring awareness to bullying.With its beautiful illustrations, professional editing and high-quality colours with a laminated cover, this book provides many wonderful moments of hope, bravery and unyielding love to share!  This story is about a new kind of Super Hero Bojo. He is the product of George ( George is a dragon) and Martha ( She is a rabbit)Under the large blue moon, two wonderful parents stood proud by their son’s crib watching him sleep peacefully. Thanks in advance

story:
Project Summary

I would like to introduce you to a 14-year-old boy with some very unique abilities. Taking place in the 21st century, Arthur S. Holmes was born in London, England and was adopted by an American family shortly after the accidental death of his parents. Arthur discovered, at a very early age, that he has abilities that others, even adults, don’t have. The first and most dramatic ability that he discovered is his ability to remember just about everything. Arthur has an eidetic memory. At first, it drove him crazy and he wasn’t able to cope with it. As he grew older, he learned to use this unique feature to help him and others in their daily lives. Along with his memory, Arthur can read extremely fast and fully comprehend all that he has read. He finishes full-length novels in a day and loves everything he reads. At the age of 10, he discovered one particular author by the name of Sir Arthur Conan Doyle. Arthur fell in love with the character, Sherlock Holmes. Having the same last name and similar abilities as the famous detective, Arthur swears that he is the descendent of the famous detective. It is then that Arthur decides to take on the name, Sherlock. After reading and re-reading the Sherlock Holmes novels and stories many times over, young Sherlock Jr. begins to hone his abilities of deductive reasoning. With his constant companion, a Golden Retriever that he named, Watson, he sets out to solve crimes. Not childish “who took my cell phone” complaints but major crimes that perplex even the police department. All during his work as a young, private consulting detective, he is constantly engaged in proving that Sherlock Holmes was a real person and that Holmes is, indeed, Arthur's own great grandfather. With his father being a television news anchor and having a true life arch enemy, Sherlock Jr. proves that youth is nothing to laugh at.

Sherlock Jr.'s Hat

Along with the actual printed (and e-book), there will be many features that will enhance the storyline of the Sherlock Jr. series. There is a Twitter account that was opened by none other than Arthur S. Holmes, himself. This is where he can share his ideas, thoughts, and clues with the readers of the book. The tweets will be written as though the main character is writing them directly to the readers. The Twitter account is @imsherlockjr. Another feature that will be corresponding with the books will be special videos on the internet that give a little bit more information about the cases in which Sherlock Jr. is involved. To view these videos, you will be able to scan a QR code or type in a URL to get directly to the videos that are hosted on the Internet. Of course, there is a Sherlock Jr. Facebook page that gives steady reports as to the current situation of the books and the storyline. This is where the audience may interact with me as the author.


What We Need and What You Get

As with any project, there are certain costs that come with its creation.  I am planning on publishing the first book myself.  If that doesn't work out due to unforeseen reasons, I will be searching for a publisher.  Either way, I am determined to publish the first book along with the remainder of the series.  The amount I am requesting is $8,000.  If I go beyond that amount, I plan on a great deal more to enhance the quality of the story.  I will be adding videos with live actors, Twitter feeds by Arthur S. Holmes, himself and many more exciting little additions.  If the funding is substantially higher than what I have requested, I plan on turning Sherlock Jr. into a television show.

Along with the pride in being part of a great story and helping young adults to improve their reading skills, you will receive many perks, depending upon the amount you generously donate.  Starting from simple illustrated wallpapers for your computer desktop, all the way to having the first book dedicated to YOU, there are many exciting perks that you will be claiming once you help out by donating.


About the Author

Very few people have the good fortune of ideas finding them.  It's not just that I had a great idea, it's that I even know the date that the idea came to me.  It was August 28th, 2015, somewhere around 7:45 in the morning.  I was getting ready for the day when a most fantastic idea struck me.  But, I'm getting a bit ahead of myself.  Let me start from the beginning.

Splash Page of Comic

I graduated from Long Island University, C.W. Post Campus with a Bachelor's Degree in Fine Arts.  I wanted to be a cartoonist and had the greatest of luck by living in between two of the best golden age comic book artists that ever were and my college allowed them to teach me.  It was a dream come true.  I began learning from Frank Giacoia and, after his unfortunate death, Joe Giella completed my training.  From then on, I was a cartoonist and graphic artist.  I have done many freelance jobs that included well known characters such as: Spider-Man, Bugs Bunny, Dick Tracy, and many others.  In 1993, I became very close to a well-known character, Sherlock Holmes.  I had obtained the rights from the Conan Doyle estate to create my own comic strip with the name Sherlock Holmes as the title.  It was published in newspapers around the country.  I became very attached to the character and when I stopped writing and illustrating the strip, I knew that was not the last I would see of the great detective.  Because of the quality of the strip, I was granted a contract to write a book on how to draw superheroes.  The book was published by North Light Books and was titled, How to Create Action, Fantasy, and Adventure Comics.  It went through three printings before it was discontinued (You can still find it on Amazon.com).  That was my first taste of serious writing and I was hooked.  I thought that I had the best abilities in the world.  I could draw AND write.  I can't keep this to myself.

Cover of Book

In 1994, my wife and I moved down to Florida.  I continued my freelance work but wanted to share what I knew and learned about art.  Six months later, I was granted the art teacher position at Meadow Park Elementary School where I still teach... 21 years later.  All during my teaching, I obtained many art jobs and created my own art.  I was constantly running around, looking for something better.  To improve myself even further, I attended Full Sail University in Orlando, Florida where I received my Master's of Science Degree in Education.  But, even that wasn't enough.  Right after graduation, I started my business, Zephyr Multimedia, LLC where I began to create apps for the Apple iPhone and iPad.  I loved it but, after having eight apps on the App Store, I realized that I was slowly getting away from my artistic background.  I wanted to get it back.  For quite a long time, I considered writing a children's book but knew how difficult it is to get one of them published since so many people want to do the same thing.  I wanted to be part of something very special.

Sherlock Holmes Pen & Ink

Some years prior, while I was at Full Sail, I started to play around with a website called, Second Life.  I had a blast.  I was even able to meet, face to face, with my old friends from Long Island... well, computer face to computer face... I mean, we were avatars.  But, it was great fun, nonetheless.  One area that I visited often was the Star Trek world.  I created an Admiral avatar and piloted a star ship.  That is when I came up with the idea that I wanted to write a Star Trek novel and be part of that great franchise.  I had a fantastic idea and began to write.  Well, one day, when shopping at the book store, I wanted to see what company publishes the Star Trek books.  I randomly chose a book off the shelf to look at the copyright page and was devastated.  I read that back cover and the description of the book was almost exactly my idea.  I couldn't believe it.  The author obviously didn't steal it from me, since I didn't even know him.  So, I had to drop that idea and look for the next one.  Well, it didn't take long.

The next morning, on August 28, 2015, I remembered my love for Sherlock Holmes and wanted to revisit the idea of working with him again.  I wanted to use the thought of Holmes but not him.  Immediately, a younger version of Holmes came to mind.  Young Sherlock Holmes?  Nah, it's been done and I definitely don't want to go up against Steven Spielberg with legal battles.  So, how can this work for me AND ONLY ME.  After thinking for a while and playing with the name of Sherlock Holmes, I (pretty quickly) came up with Sherlock Jr.  It's not Sherlock Holmes but a young man at the age of 14 who truly believes that he is the living ancestor of the greatest detective in the world.  His name is Arthur S. Holmes but he prefers to be called, Sherlock.

From that point, the whole world started spinning faster.  I did some internet searches and found that the closest thing is the film created in 1924 starring Buster Keaton.  But, this motion picture is so different in theme that I wasn't even coming close to the same idea.  After feeling comfortable that it was mine and mine alone, I began to set up a website,www.sherlockjr.net (which is still in the works), an AudioBoom podcast to talk about my creative journey, and the Facebook page and Twitter account previously mentioned.  I am currently in the process of trademarking the name, Sherlock Jr.  So, I am now ready for the next step.

Indiegogo was my next thought.  This is something that, I feel, is such a great idea and it will help young adult readers to become acquainted with the character, Sherlock Holmes.  The only thing missing is the finances for me to continue to follow the path to the final creation and publication of the first book in this series.

With your kind and generous donations, I will be able to pay for all the legal paperwork that comes with the protection of a name and the story along with the costs of editing the story, printing the actual books,  the fees involved in research, marketing and publicizing the book, and, finally, the distribution of the books to stores around the world.

Sherlock Jr. is an opportunity to help young adults to have a passion for reading and learn about one of the greatest characters that has ever been penned.

Thank you in advance for your help.

Tom Alvarez

Risks and challenges

As with any major project, there are certain risks and writing a book is no different. A problem is only a problem when it can't be solved. There are many ways to solve every problem that may arise from writing and publishing a book.

Perhaps there may be a time when I am unable to imagine a certain situation in the story. That would be best known as "writer's block". I am not fearful of such a dilemma due to the fact that I have a group of co-workers that have tremendous imaginations. It would simply take a brief meeting and, perhaps a few cups of latte' at the local Starbuck's, with one or two of my close friends to extract the particular text from my mind. At that point, I would be right back at my writer's desk plugging away.

Finance is one of the biggest reasons that many fantastic ideas never came to see the light of day. This wouldn't happen with Sherlock Jr. The main reason that I am submitting this Indiegogo request is to be absolutely sure that Sherlock Jr. fully and completely finds it's way to print. I will be using the finances that I receive from Indiegogo to publish and promote Sherlock Jr. Other than that, writing is a career that has very little overhead to speak of. I already have a computer and accounts with all the companies that I need to be connected such as R.R. Bowker for my ISBN number and Dunn and Bradstreet for my credit to name just a couple. So, there would be no stopping Sherlock Jr. due to money.

Finally, the only other stumbling block that might creep it's way into my development of this series would be time. Everyone today is running around with too many responsibilities to handle. Even I find myself forgetting small projects because I am so wrapped up in my career or family life. I must say that, in my case, this is the easiest risk to conquer. Being a very structured person, I set aside a specific block of time for my most major projects. With this being done, there is no way that I would miss out on any time to bring Sherlock Jr. to life.

So, you see, I am bound and determined to make the Sherlock Jr. series, especially the first book, a successfully completed project.


Other Ways You Can Help

I understand that there are those that think my idea is good and they want to support it but just don't have the means.  If this is your case, you can still help out by forwarding the link and talking about it on your Facebook page or Twitter account.  I would greatly appreciate it if you could help that way as well as financial help OR if you don't have the financial means.


Thank You So Much For Whatever You Can Do!

story:
Short Summary

The project, tentatively named The KDHX History Project (but sure to change before completion), will be an assemblage of 31-chapters, each dedicated to an aspect of the history of KDHX radio in St. Louis. From the methodology of individual programmers to the station's most memorable events to sidebars on podcasts, talk shows, cable access TV and more. Because it's an online project, we'll able to sprinkle in liberal amounts of photography, video and lists, lists, lists. The resultant work will be a website, organized as if a book, in which a reader can move easily through topics/chapters.

What We Need & What You Get

It's important to note here that the project is being run with the blessing of KDHX and with the resources of the station's print and digital archives, but is being done completely independently of the station, with no funds coming from the KDHX organization.

The curator of the project is myself, Thomas Crone. I've been a longtime station volunteer and programmer. The monies collected, at the projected $10,000 will be broken down: 10% to editing/research/upload/tech assistance; 5% to the funding source you're on right now; 5% to event needs, for a pair of release-themed gatherings; an added 5% for surprise needs; a full 30% pulled back for taxes. The remaining 45% will offset time created in compiling, editing, interviewing, writing (and scanning what's already looking like a big mass of print materials), all with an anticipated date of web release in January of 2019.

Oh, yeah: we have perks!

The Impact

As a longtime programmer at KDHX, I've often wanted a nice, single-source location for both simple historical background on the station, but also a place to find stories told by the many, varied people who've been involved. This work will touch on all the eras, from the KDNA origin story to those amazing yogurt dishes at Squatter's Cafe, plus all the good stuff in the middle.

If goals are met, the site/book will be entertaining and educational, providing historical context to what we all believe is one of America's great radio stations.

Risks & Challenges

Two main notes here:

1. This project was given the blessing of KDHX's management, but is being created independently of the station, with no station funds going to the project.

2. I'm opting for the fixed level, rather than the flexible level. In effect, if the goal's not hit, the project won't go live. My belief is the work will amount to something valuable to the KDHX community and, though I've spent hundreds of hours volunteering for KDHX, this is a level-up need and opportunity. As noted above, the cash will allow for a large chunk of my freelance time to be spent on this project through the remainder of 2018.

Other Ways You Can Help

Sharing is caring.

story:
www.chronicleofthetimes.co.uk

WHERE TO FIND REAL NEWS     

The world is facing great problems and great changes are happening as Brexit and the Trump election show.

But a major problem we have is of obtaining reliable information, real news. 

NOT IN THE MAINSTREAM MEDIA  

Mainstream newspapers of any country untrustworthy, their political and economic predictions hopelessly wrong and their opinion shallow and biased. 

The BBC and other media have long ago given up on providing unbiased factual reporting

ONLY ON THE INTERNET 

A lot of people, rely on the internet for news and opinion. Some of what you find is wrong or mischievous. But if you know where to look you can find the truth and get a grip on world events, at home and abroad. 

In this way the internet is the savior of those who want the truth. 

THE INTERNET HAS TWO PROBLEMS 

One, you can only access it through your computer or phone.
Two, it is difficult to know whether you have found a reliable source or not

CHRONICLE OF THE TIMES

       

I am Peter Kellow (read my biog at the About link, top right) and I am creating a new print newspaper that will provide a solution to these problems. I call it Chronicle of the Times or CTT for short. 


View full mockup.

I will take the role of Editor-in-Chief and for this role I am well suited having published over 200 articles on a very broad range of political and economic subjects. Many were peer-reviewed.
For links to articles written since 2008  

FREE OR BY POST 

*

It will be available only in print form in two ways. It will be distributed free on the streets and it will be available by post for a small administrative charge 

PRINT MEANS ANSWERABILITY AND TRUTH 

A basic principle is that there will be no internet version. We don't want to be lost in the hundreds of internet news site of uneven quality.

Being purely in permanent print form automatically makes demands on quality - even if the current print media have forgotten this

Once you have gone into print you cannot withdraw it. So you need to be right to maintain your reputation.

NO CORPORATE ADVERTISING 

Chronicle of the Times has a simple but original business model. Income will come purely from online donations *. 

Much of the bias of the mainstream media is because they are beholden to the interests of big corporate advertisers.  

Readers well know this And so a further basic principle of CTT is that it will carry no corporate advertising

THE PLEASURE OF PRINT 


View full mockup

Many people spend much time travelling to and from work and a quality alternative print newspaper will be welcome. 

And many people enjoy the simple, time-honored pleasure of reading print on paper. 

Many, like me, find it such a relief to get away from screens of any kind. Print carries authority and with that the demand to maintain standards

A GLOBAL COMMUNITY OF TRUTHERS 

Much of the content will come from the internet. But, and this is vital, it will be selected and sifted according to one single criterion. TRUTH.

We will determine the reliable sources, and so perform an editorial role. In this our readers will help us. 

There will be no internet version of CTT but readers will be able to comment online. 

In this way CTT and readers will form a community in pursuit of the highest standards of truth

MOCKUP 

You can see a full turn page mock-up of the Chronicle of the Times here. This includes a high proportion of my own articles but this will not be typical This mock-up is the only issue that will ever appear in online digital form

NON-ENGLISH SPEAKERS 

When CTT has expanded to a certain size we will produce it in different languages for non-English speakers and send it in the post. 

Non-English speakers are hugely disadvantaged at present in their ability to access internet news. We will put that right

*

So wherever you live, we need your help in our quest to disseminate truth and reason and participate in this international community of truth seekers.

*Until further notice all donations are made on this Indiegogo page

For more information and questions www.chronicleofthetimes.co.uk

Peter Kellow
Founder and Editor-in-Chief

story:
EACH PERK INCLUDES TICKETS TO THE LAUNCH EVENT!

 

MY STORY

When I was 10 years old, I was sexually abused by my grandad. Repeatedly. For over a year. For the next 14 years I kept silent, burying it all down inside me. 

As the years ticked by, I became more and more confused. I blamed myself, fought against depression, battled with suicidal thoughts and hated who looked back at me in the mirror.

Then in 2017 I broke the 14 year silence by sharing with the world my experience with sexual abuse. For the first time in my life, I confronted all my inner demons and allowed myself to be openly vulnerable.

And it was bloody liberating.

The world that I once thought would outcast me, actually welcomed me with open arms.

I became a brand new version of myself and embraced vulnerability at every chance I could get.

Then I made a commitment.

A commitment to help every sexually abused victim that I possibly could to harness their inner power and find the strength to break their silence.

I want to teach people how to step into the shoes of a hero rather than remain the victim.

So, I used social media to push my message out and reach as many people as I could.

But something was missing. I needed to crank up the volume on my message and reach all corners of the globe.

This is where my book comes into the picture.

‘Breaking The Silence’ is a book that is about more than just me.

  • It is about the 1 in 5 girls and 1 in 20 boys who are victims of child sexual abuse.
  • It is about the one child in every classroom who has been, or is currently being abused.
  • It is about the silent pain and suffering that people go through.

“Sexual abuse claims a victim every 45 seconds.” (InfoPlease, 2019)

How many of those do you think keep it buried deep down inside of them because they fear of what may happen when they speak out?

How many of these people are totally confused and can’t make sense of anything that happened?

My hope is that by the time anybody finish’s reading this book, they will have the strength to reach out and share their story.

To be vulnerable and speak openly about the experience. To drop all blame, shame and fear. To see themselves as the beautiful human being that they are, and not anything less.

The reason I am crowdfunding this project is because I want the book to be completely and entirely funded by people who believe about speaking out on sexual abuse.

So for anybody that has been closely or even distantly affected by sexual abuse - I am reaching out to you. 

I want every single person in the world that feels like this book needs to be written to have a piece of it.

Please get involved and become part of this project with me.

50% of ALL profits will be going to The Survivors Trust Charity, who specialise in giving care and support to survivors of abuse.

Be part of this movement to help impact thousands, if not MILLIONS of lives all around the world.

No one should stay silent, it’s time to break it.

THE BOOK - BREAKING THE SILENCE

The backbone to this book is my story. It’s about my experience of the abuse, how it affected me growing up and how I overcame it.

I go through exactly how readers can find their inner strength and courage, then use it to make sense of their story and share it in whichever way they wish.

There are two other key aspects to this book, and they’re the interviews.

I’ll be interviewing victims of sexual abuse, allowing them the space to share their story for the first time right inside the book. 

I’ll also be interviewing an abuser, someone who has sexually abused children, allowing them to also share their story.

This book is going to be POWERFUL.

WHAT I NEED & WHAT YOU’LL GET

This book will be published with Panoma Press, who are one of the best.

We need £20,000 to get the book written, edited, designed and on the shelves.

This crowdfunding campaign will be set up on a ‘pre-order’ basis. So to get involved, you simply pre-order a book (or many copies at once).

For everyone who orders Breaking The Silence, I’d like to show my appreciation by including each individuals name in the acknowledgment section of the book. (If you’d like to opt out and do not wish for your name to be included, message me after ordering).

As well as this, every book purchased will come complete with a ticket to the UK launch event in the summer 2020.

EVERYONE CAN GET INVOLVED.

Pre Ordering the book is a great way for us to generate the £20,000. Having said this, I would appreciate donations of any amount. 

I do not expect every person to make a financial donation. However, if you believe in the cause, please share this campaign. Spreading the word about this book is a vital step towards helping victims of sexual abuse. 

This is a project for the people, we need as many eyes and ears as we can get to push it out further.

Share it on social media. Text your mate. Call up your cousin. Talk to your dog.

Turn your silence into a whisper, whisper into a conversation and conversation into a voice. You DO have a voice.

Whatever you can do to turn the volume up on our mission would be greatly appreciated.

Thank you for all your love and support, you guys are rockstars!

 

Perry Power

 

 

BIBLIOGRAPHY

InfoPlease. (2019). Sexual Assault: The Silent, Violent Epidemic. [online] Available at: https://www.infoplease.com/us/gender-issues/sex... [Accessed 7 Sep. 2019].

story:
Overview

"From the Universe with Love: The Spiritual Ass Kicking You Need in Everyday Situations" will be book one of a "Conversations with God" meets "Chicken Soup for the Soul" series. 

Everyone has or will face crises brought about by their current paradigm, aka their belief-system, and the results they desire vs. the results they are getting.  The human experience called "life" is filled with many twists and turns that are labeled as "challenges", "obstacles", and "hardships" but this is due to the conditioning they have had since they were a baby growing in utero. This conditioning dictates how they perceive their current life experience, situations, and how they react as a result of the beliefs held within their current paradigm. 

Each chapter will address an issue that mankind struggles with on a daily basis and will start with the current understanding of it as it pertains to the living, followed by a From the Universe with Love perspective, and a section called the "Transcendence" where it will provide tangible ways to implement these lessons into your life.

In future books, the "From the Universe with Love" series, will address worldly problems; war, violence, prejudice, terrorist attacks, etc. and the spiritual perspective the Universe offers on them. Another book within the series will address common ways people transition from this world; cancer, suicide, abortion, accidents, AIDS, etc. and the spiritual view on each of them and what happens when they become one with Universal Consciousness. 

Many people wonder what happens to the soul when we die and what the purpose of the life experience is  -- what we learn, and the From the Universe with Love" series will become their missing manual. 

About the Author

William Constantine is an internationally acclaimed Psychic Medium, Intuitive Life and Business Mentor, Spiritual Teacher, and Inspirational Speaker. For more than twenty years, he has consulted clientele ranging from the working-class person to CEOs, as well as celebrities, heads of state, royalty, models, TV & Film stars, and entertainment professionals. He has been utilized as a source by federal and state law enforcement agencies, attorneys, private investigation companies, organized crime and more. He has been a featured expert on many top-tier media outlets like; CNN, ABC, NBC, CBS, FOX, SIRIUS/XM, Shirley MacLaine's Independent Expressions radio, Thrive Global, and so many others. 

The Opportunity

Balboa Press, the self-publishing arm of Hay House Publications, has been talking to me since 2018 about the possibility of writing a book for them. For years, my fans have also been asking me / telling me that I should write a book; however, writing a book is not something that I just wanted to jump into. 

Now, with Covid gripping the world in fear - I feel it is a good time to birth the first book of the "From the Universe with Love" series. 

The cost is $5,599 which includes;

  •  Editorial Assessment
  •  Press Release – Web-Optimized Edition
  •  Book Signing Kit
  •  Index Service (Up to 1,000 words)
  •  Cover Copy Polish
  •  The Empower package also includes:
  • ISBN Assignment
  • Author Volume Discount
  • Online Worldwide Distribution
  • Cover Design
  • Personalized Back Cover
  • Interior Book Design and Page Layout
  • 10 Image Insertion/Text Treatments
  • B&W Interior, Color Cover
  • E-book Formatting and Distribution
  • Barnes & Noble "Read Instantly"
  • Amazon "Look Inside" and Google Preview
  • Complimentary Author Copy
  • Sold on Amazon.com, Barnes&Noble.com
  • Personalized Balboa Press Bookstore Page
  • Included in Balboa Press Catalog
  • 30 Complimentary Softcover Copies
  • 10 Complimentary BookStub™ Cards
  • U.S. Copyright Registration
  • Library of Congress Control Number
  • Hardcover Publishing (10 Complimentary Copies Included)
  • 300 Promotional Materials
  • Booksellers Return Program - 1 year
  • Author Website Setup - Premier
  • Book Buyers Preview
  • Social Media Setup Guide

Any additional monies raised will go towards stretch goals which may be a more expansive package and a bulk purchase of the book so that I can autograph a copy for those that pledge $250 or more. 

The Impact

This book being out in the marketplace will help people change their lives by giving them tools, techniques, and higher conscious insights into everyday situations. 

 

Ways You Can Help

We are asking for a minimal donation of $25 per person which means we are seeking 260 backers to help fund the campaign. If, for whatever reason, you cannot donate $25 you can still help by:

  • Asking folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Share the campaign to all your social network platforms via the share tools and ask your friends, family, etc. to help!

story:
About us

 

Escritores y Libros is a project to create a publishing house. In Escritores y Libros we believe in Latin talent and we bet on this.
We want to create a publishing house that gives opportunity to new talent, and for that we raised funds that will be used in our first printers and books.
The first book we launched is the classic Pride and Prejudice of Jane Austen, a new illustrated version by the Mexican artist Maribel Guadalupe Pucheta Diaz.
Each book has 12 beautiful illustrations created in natural watercolor.

The book comes in hard and soft cover, Spanish or English version. We have also created amazing and beautiful gifts for those who decide to support the project.

 

 

 

Little story, great visionaries

 

Escritores y Libros started as a facebook community in 2015, since then it has been growing in diverse networks. We like to provide quality content and with this thought we have created free or cheap curs to teach novels to young literates. We believe that now is the time to move forward and publish novels.
In the first instance we want to publish illustrated classics with high quality content. Our first projects are: Pride and Prejudice, Alice in Wonderland, Alice Through the Looking Glass, Alice and the Underworld, The Little Prince, From the Earth to the Moon, and others.

 

What do we believe?

We are convinced that every business or company must provide security to its customers.
Regardless of whether we reach the goals or not, we are committed to delivering each of the rewards we offer.

 

 

 

 

 

Initially we thought to finance this project, however, our community grew internationally and we want to offer everyone the same opportunities and services.
A vital point for us as an editorial is to give a voice to communities and artists that are not represented by being in certain countries. We know that there is great talent in the Latin American region and we want to make it flourish.

 

Goals

story:
When Eric Lost His Imagination is a picture book for children aged 5 to 8 that tells the story of an imaginative little boy named Eric, whose sensory perception is enriched by his intense and vivid imagination.  Through it, he experiences various dimensions of fantasy, in a pleasant, constant, endless way. Almost.


Eric will lose his imagination due to the pressure of society to become mature at an early age, the rupture causing him a lack of purpose. Years have passed without an aim, and now Eric is a becoming teenager in search of the lost times to reclaim the greatest ability he possessed. His actual intention is to help solve problems and to create new technologies for the world . Further, the story will reveal how the boy changes his destiny, driven by the burning impetus to recover his imagination.

Do you recall being a child engaged in pretend play and distorting the reality of things, out of pleasure and fun?

Eric is you or your child in a different form. His imagination  is a force present in all children, allowing them to experience the joy of creating. However, the ability lasts as long as the child has faith in his own capabilities and reasons to create.

This means he needs the support of the environment, of parents and society, to build his own world and the larger world outside, but not only.
Eric and your child will learn together to believe in themselves because the world is not always there for them.
 
To read Eric's story to your child, is to encourage him to imagine and create; to ensure him that changing the world or building it from beginning is not an illusion, but a possibility. He will find the three keys to unlock the door of creation, that are:
The Reason/Cause, Will, and Imagination.

The illustrations I present are some of the ones portraying Eric in moments spent before losing his imagination.  More illustrations will be exposed soon.

 

 

 My name is Catalina Olaru. I am the author of When Eric Lost His Imagination, a young mother, artist, writer and graphic designer. My aim is to offer through my book an inspiring and transformative experience to children and hopefully, to adults as well.


I have chosen to write the book inspired by my son. He likes ever since a baby to play and imagine the objects and places having different dimensions and attributes. He is endlessly fascinated by nature and the way we can experience life through our senses. This made me remember my own childhood and the beauty of it and I wonder where it disappered. When did the adulthood come to take away those brilliant abilities, dreams and passions? It was everything so pleasant as a child, even the problems were easier to be solved. 


As an adult I struggled with depression for years and looked for ways to find my place in the world and the reason of my existence. Slowly, I found pleasure and relief in sewing, creating, expressing myself through painting, digital art and writing. My eternal personal motto is: 

“Build the world you dream of!” ;  and for that I present to you Eric, the boy who discovered all the reasons to abandon the world, and yet , he chose to build it better than he found it. Thank you for reading my words, my story and for believing in me!


Thank you also for being a valuable reader, sponsor and supporter of my campaign! Enjoy the ride towards next destination: Creativity! Please, if you find it within your power, pay it forward!
 

 What we need and what you get

 This book will be published with Penguin Random House. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:
 
•    The Cover Design of the book+ illustrations
•    The Editor I will work with to revise and publish by April 2022 ( Unfortunately, the book will               not be available for Santa this Christmas, but you can certainly contact the Easter Bunny to arrange a gift for your favorite children, when he comes in the town)
 
•    The Layout Design for the interior of my book (paperback, hard copy, e-book formats, flipbooks, etc)
 
•    The Copyediting for my book to check and correct the grammar and spelling, prior to publication
 
•    The Launch & Promotion activities for the book

       

I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:


•    You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish and a handwritten thank-you note.
•    Your name will appear in the Acknowledgments section of my book (“with Special Thanks to”).

 
•    I will have some bundle perks listed during the campaign. 

 
•    And some surprises!
 

Campaign Goals
Tier 1: Hit £6.000 and the ebook/softcover editions get published 

Tier 2: Hit £8.000 and the book will get a hardcover edition

Tier 3: Hit £10.000 and we’ll get a facinating audiobook edition.

story:
I started writing my first novel back in grade 10. It was in French class and I sat behind a girl that I really liked. Being a massive nerd I wasn't quite sure how to approach the topic of actually speaking or charming anyone in anyway. So I thought I would write a story. The characters in the book were all people I knew. Friends and other people from school that I didn't know that well but I thought I might like to know. I told everyone about it and got them to sign funny little contracts so that it was okay for me to use their name and description in my book. It was just as dorky as it sounds.

 

The book ended up taking me five years to write. But I did finish it. It was 1132 pages long when I was done. All of it handwritten. All of it terrible. Extremely derivative stuff. A high-concept fantasy novel that borrowed very, very, very heavily from other books. But it started me on my journey of writing. And I haven't stopped since then.

 

If you don't really know who I am, then you could Google me or just let me give you a quick crash course in Ian Fortey.I started writing for Cracked.com back in 2007. I saw an open call for writers and I submitted an article idea. My very first article was about medication side effects. I remembered seeing a commercial around that time for a kind of medication that had the increased urge to gamble as a side effect. That struck me as very weird. So starting with that as the basis I researched more stuff and pitched the article and it was accepted.

 

I went on to become, if not Cracked’s most prolific writer, certainly one of the top three. Later I was offered the position of managing editor of my own website. From there I went on to write for sites like CollegeHumor, Syfy, Break, Hustler, and dozens of others. I have written over 3000 articles since my first one. That's over six million words published. That's a lot of writing.

 

Recently I've started branching into fiction again. I wrote a novel called ‘ Jerry the Scary Dead Clown and Harry Houdini Save the World.’  That's been submitted to publishers and hopefully will be in bookstores before the world comes to an end. I've had a few short stories published in horror anthologies as well.

 

Sometime near the beginning  of covid I started making jokes on Twitter about writing a novel to make some money. Tweets to billionaires like Elon Musk and Mike Bloomberg. I told them I'd write a novel about them saving the world from Martians if they paid me to do it. There was mostly a joke, although I absolutely would have done it if anyone had replied and taken me up on the offer. But then I started thinking, why not do this for real? I had a goofy idea for a story in which a hero and his Sasquatch sidekick would take on Martians from the Moon.

 

And so here we are. Instead of asking a billionaire to throw a pile of cash at me to write this book I am asking all of you to help me make it come to life. As you can see from the support tiers you can become the central character of the book, or just a passing name that gets dropped somewhere in the story. I thought this would be a fun way to be a part of a big, crazy story I had that could involve as many people as want to be a part of it.

 

I’m a fast writer, so if I can get enough money to make it worth my time to do it, I can get this written in just a couple of months. Then I can edit it, and everyone who contributes will get their own copy of it.

 

I really want to write novels for a living. That's been my dream since back in that 10th grade French class when I was trying to impress a girl. I want to be able to impress all of you with this crazy story right now, too. I've been writing professionally for 14 years so enough people in the world think I'm good enough at this job to keep paying me for it. I want to show what I can really do. Just let loose with story ideas and have some fun with it. It's going to be weird. It's going to be funny. It's probably going to have a few creepy parts as well. Those are the stories I like to write. If that sounds like fun, why not contribute? Immortalize yourself as a character in the book. Or give it as a gift to a friend. Admit it, Father's Day would be more impressive this year if you told Dad that he was going to be the Martian Viceroy. Or a robot triceratops.

 

So that's the deal. As long as I can get enough money to pay my bills while I write the book, then I'm absolutely going to write the book. And you all can be a part of it. It's a win-win for everyone.

THE BOOK

What do I mean when I say a book? This is no picture books we're talking about here. I don't mean a short story or a novella. I mean a serious, full-on novel. At least 80,000 words in length. Like an actual, real book.

 

The story, as far as I have it plotted out, is about a hero and a Sasquatch who lives undercover among humans fighting off an invasion plot from Martians. Is here a lot more to it than that? Of course, but I can't spoil it all here now can I?

 

Now it's not going to be printed in hardcover or anything like that. You're going to get an e-book when this is done. Likely a PDF file that you can read on your phone, your victrola, your Zune or whatever you do that you use to read PDF files these days. I can't keep up with you kids and your technology.

 

And look at it this way. At the lowest level of support you're going to get an entire novel for $1. When's the last time you got a brand new, custom-made novel for $1? You have to go to that weird used bookstore in town that smells funny if you want a whole novel for $1. I'm not asking you to do that. You don't even need to get out of the bathtub. You can just support me here and when the book gets written, which I expect to have done sometime in May of 2021, the book will be yours. Easy breezy beautiful.

story:
Short Summary

3 ordinary human beings suddenly started to see and hear the world of internet and algorithm. The journey which leads them to be computer guru may lead us to see that may be we are created by the universe we think we created...

It’s been a dream of mine for many years to write a book about computer programming; how simple and fun it is.I think now is the time to combine my knowledge with my writing experience.

IT, DNS, IP, P2P, B2B, WWW, HTTP, HTML...

It is a wonder how the computer world is full of these incomprehensible and scary abbreviations. People of computer sector must have reached a conclusion to make it look like very complicated which requires great talent. I find it  natural since the history is full of such deceits.

I’ve been working as a programmer for more than 21 years. I’m also known by my close circle, somebody with good writing skills though writing has been an enjoyable hobby for me and it only concerned reading and writing scenarios and blogs and joining scenario competetions.

All my life, I’ve been hearing ”You are a computer programmer! What a spectacular job you’re doing. I never get these things”. And each and every time, I recalled my high school math. teacher’s saying:

“Questions may appear difficult to you but answers are always simple.” 

I want to present simple answers to the hard (!) questions of the internet world in a funny and fun way woven into a fantastic story to the best of my ability so that people holding the book should wonder if they’re reading a novel, an advanced technical book or a guiding book for beginners, laugh at the caricatures and when they reach last page of the book, they can say: “Damn. Is it that simple?”

Please feel free to read the first 20 pages i could finish and hopefully you will want to learn about the rest!

Turkish Version

English version

What We Need & What You Get

At the very end, i plan to publish the book as a trilogy of 750 pages in both Turkish and English. I’ll need a budget for the project  as follows (in US Dollars):

Phase1: To write and publish one book of 250 pages only in Turkish;

For my personal living expenses for durations of writing the book: 2.500

Caricature works(approx.30 caricatures)  : 3.000

1st printing cost of 1.000 book: 5.000

Stamp: 1000

Taxes: 2.500

Total (min): 14.000

If i can find extra funding;

Professional  editorship support  : 800

Advertisment and promotion budget   :3.000

Total (next): 17.800

If i can continue more with funding, i will start by the translation of the first book

English translation  : 2.500

1st printing cost of 1.000 book: 5.000

Taxes: 1.500

Total (next): 26.800

If i can still continue with more funding, i will finalize the project of 3 book in 2 languages;

For my personal living expenses for durations of writing the book: 5.000

Professional  editorship support  : 1.600

English translation: 5.000

Caricature works(approx.70 caricatures)  : 7.000

Printing cost of 1.000 books set in 2 languages: 10.000

Advirtising and promotion budget: 7.000

Stamp: 1.000

Taxes: 5.000

Total (final): 68.400

I’m thinkng of a different revenue plan. I’m not proposing book sales for your contributions but a partnership system where you can be repaid for your contributions and more;

I’m hoping to gain net 20 USD income on a 3-book-set. I will pay back 16 USD (80%) of each set to contributors. This will go on until every contributor is fully repaid.

Considering reprinting costs will be less, when we reach 5.000 sets, project cost  will have been fully refunded.

After that point, I’ll  continue to pay 12USD out of 20USD (60%) on each sale  to contributors.

Thus, you will be joining a partnership where you’ll be receiving the amount you contributed on each 5.000 sale.

This is a prediction of being able to finalize the complete trilogy. 

If  20USD which I call “net income”  is lower or higher, I’ll be sharing its cause with you. 

The Impact

I wll be very happy if I can make a few people join the programming world or make some people  love computers instead of being scared of them.

I don’t think the book I write will only appeal to computer illeterates. I’ve seen many programmers who completed their projects wthout knowing why they do what they do. I also want to show those people reality of that world and basics of the things they do. 

I think I’m getting old; assuming writing a book or something will change the world!

Risks & Challenges

Even when I was writing attached first 20 pages

Turkish Version

English version

 I searched simpler and more coherent ways to tell it. At the end of the day, I must make the reader visualize vividly in their minds a highly mathematical subject with tasks and definitions. The greatest risk of this project is me not doing it properly as a writer.

I hope the back-ground story will help me to achieve that. I also must keep the excitement level of the story throughout 750 pages where I explain programming. It will be another challenge.

Other Ways You Can Help

I know that not everybody will contribute to the project financially but it will no doubt help me in this project which I’m very excited about,  to cross roads with some people when you mention it in social media and share this indiegogo project page link.

Advertisment and promotion budget   :3.000
Total (next): 17.800
If i can continue more with funding, i will start by the translation of the first book
English translation 
: 2.500
1st printing cost of 1.000 book: 5.000
Taxes: 1.500
Total (next): 26.800
If i can still continue with more funding, i will finalize the project of 3 book in 2 languages;

For my personal living expenses for durations of writing the book: 5.000
Professional  editorship support  : 1.600
English translation: 5.000
Caricature works(approx.70 caricatures)  : 7.000
Printing cost of 1.000 books set in 2 languages: 10.000
Advirtising and promotion budget: 7.000
Stamp: 1.000
Taxes: 5.000
Total (final): 68.400
I’m thinkng of a different revenue plan.
I’m not proposing book sales for your contributions but a partnership system
where you can be repaid for your contributions and more;
I’m hoping to gain net 20 USD income on
a 3-book-set. I will pay back 16 USD (80%) of each set to contributors. This
will go on until every contributor is fully repaid.
Considering reprinting costs will be
less, when we reach 5.000 sets, project cost  will have been fully
refunded.
After that point, I’ll  continue to pay 12USD out of 20USD (60%) on
each sale  to contributors.
Thus, you will be joining a partnership
where you’ll be receiving the amount you contributed on each 5.000 sale. 
This is a prediction of being able to finalize the complete trilogy. 
If  20USD which I call “net income”  is lower or higher, I’ll be sharing its cause
with you. 

The Impact
 

I wll be very happy if I can make a few
people join the programming world or make some people  love
computers instead of being scared of them.
I don’t think the book I write will only
appeal to computer illeterates. I’ve seen many programmers who completed their projects
wthout knowing why they do what they do. I also want to show those people
reality of that world and basics of the things they do.  
I think I’m getting old; assuming
writing a book or something will change the world!

    Risks & Challenges 
Even when I was writing attached first
20 pages
Turkish Version
English version
 I searched simpler and more coherent ways to tell it. At the end of the day, I must make the reader visualize vividly
in their minds a highly mathematical subject with tasks and definitions. The
greatest risk of this project is me not doing it properly as a writer.
I hope the back-ground story will help
me to achieve that. I also must keep the excitement level of the story throughout
750 pages where I explain programming. It will be another challenge.

    Other Ways You Can Help 
I know that not everybody will contribute to the project
financially but it will no doubt help me in this project which I’m very excited
about,  to cross roads with some people
when you mention it in social media and share this indiegogo project page
link.

story:
In October last year we published 'How To Story' (Lannoo Publishing), a book on storytelling for broadcast and online journalists. We focussed on Dutch speakers, because, well, we speak Dutch. But soon enough our mailbox was flooded with this simple question: 'Where's the English version?'

So here we are, hoping to put out a version fit for English speakers. Out of respect for our audience (you bet!) we need a translator. And they're costly. Because they do an awesome job! But still, costly... That's why we're launching a campaign on Indiegogo, hoping you'll want to help us put out a book that we believe is a great tool for starting journalists, curious storytellers and experienced reporters who'd like a fresh take on things.

You can read a summary of the book below.

Don't forget to check out our blog on www.howtostory.be.

General

Telling stories is hard. Very hard. As a journalist you have to make tough choices every day: what's the angle of my story, who should I quote and how do I tell a compelling story that will stand out in the daily stream of news stories?
Storytelling is a craft, it's hard work. But you can learn it. In 'How To Story', the authors Tim Verheyden, Tom Rumes and Andries Fluit guide you through tips, tricks and storytelling techniques to push the boundaries of broadcast journalism in tv news stories and online packages. 

In ten chapters the authors share their passion for visual stories and make you rethink the role of journalism today.

Storytelling is more than putting beautiful shots in the right order and hoping for a good story. This book helps you pick the right platforms to distribute your story and offers tips that make your story stand out. It analyses the characteristics of a well told story and is not just useful to journalists but to marketeers and filmmakers.

How To Story is a very practical book, supported by examples and interviews with Bob Sacha (award winning multimedia producer, City University of New York), Adam Westbrook (digital publisher), Björn Soenens (Editor in chief broadcast news VRT Belgium, author) and Kris Hoflack (Editor in chief broadcast news VTM Belgium), etc.

The Book

Introduction: 
We take you back to the Arab Spring of 2011. Tim was in Egypt, on Tahrir Square, the center of  the uprising. Without a cameraman but a lot to capture, Tim started filming with his iPhone and a small camera. That moment he understood the difference between reporting and storytelling.
Chapter 1: Well, whatever. Never Mind.
Stories make us feel things: love, pain, hope, anger, etc. They can even change you! To know how stories work we have to understand what a story does to our brain, how we process a well told story. This chapter is about the science of storytelling.
Chapter 2: If a dog bites a man, that is not news. If a man bites a dog, that is news.
How do you find good stories? How can you be creative? How do you build on existing stories to create your own? And how do you avoid idea killers? This chapter is all about ideas and how to make good stories out of them. Besides tips and tricks in this hands-on chapter we talk about different forms of journalism, like constructive journalism, and about finding the right angle for your story.
Chapter 3: By failing to prepare, you are preparing to fail.
How often do you start filming without not fully realising what the story is about? In chapter 3 you'll learn about the importance of a good baseline, decent research, a shot list, the backstory of your characters and the filmmaking style. Preparation is key to making your project work. And it comes in handy when you're on a deadline. You'll also find tips and tricks to help you avoid pitfalls.
Chapter 4: The Universe is made of stories, not atoms.
What's a good technique to tell your story? Fly on the wall? Reporter driven? In this chapter we focus on different forms of narrative, based one of the most important things in every story: a compelling character. We combine the art of asking the right questions with the right form of storytelling.
Chapter 5: There is no terror in the bang, only in the anticipation of it.
The point of telling a story is to have a point. And you have to guide your viewer towards it. It all starts with a good story, but then you have to tell it right. In this chapter we discuss a much used model, the three-act structure, also known as the dramatic arc. In its simplest form: beginning, middle and end. You'll learn the importance of a strong starting scene, how conflict fuels your story and if there's difference between the inciting incident and plot point one. After this you should be able to recognize the pattern and flaws of a story. And then the fun starts: building compelling stories. Once you own the rules, forget them. French moviemaker Jean-Luc Godard said: 'A story should have a beginning, a middle and an end … but not necessarily in that order'. 
Chapter 6: Show, don’t tell
What, who, when, where, how. Every piece starts with these five simple questions. This chapter helpt you sculpt them into a televised item, following the inverted piramid method. A scenario and shotlist are helpful tools in conveying the story visually, so that it sticks and doesn’t just fade away in the news stream.
Chapter 7: Techniques, a necessary evil
Choosing your film equipment can have a major impact on how you tell your story and how the viewer percieves is. In this chapter we help you choose the right equipment for every situation, be it inconspicuous point-and-shoot smartphones or high end cinema cameras that let you create an intimate canvas of your character.
Chapter 8: Don’t dissolve me
Every edit is lie. Editing is directing all over again. You can’t fix a bad story in post, but you can make a strong story even stronger. We talk about editing tools and, more importantly, what the effect is on storytelling. What’s the importance of sound and music? Or the lack thereof? Forget the wipes or cross-fades in non-fiction reporting. Kill your darlings or cherish that end quote. It’s about knowing your ending before you start editing, trail and (t)error, and starting over again … and again.
Chapter 9: F*ck the format

These are exciting times for journalism. Technology and news are intertwined. Just bringing the facts isn’t enough anymore. The past ten years new types of journalism have emerged. Think of mobile journalisme and interactive documentaries. Remember Snowfall? New York Times' piece is a starting point of sorts. Today it has evolved in immersive stories or gamification. With this revolution came new distribution platforms like YouTube or Snapchat, and content aggregation tools, but also new ways of media consumption. To keep its relevance, journalism has to evolve. Storytelling has to do the same. In this chapter, we take a good look at non-linear storytelling techniques so your stories can get even more compelling, ready to survive online. 

Chapter 10: Ask your money back

In this concluding chapter we urge you to watch and learn, to practice and make a lot of mistakes. And then throw away the book. Because you’ll need to develop a storytelling style that suits only you. But you might want to keep the part where we summarize ten essential tips we covered in the book.

story: Hello, my name is Matiss Filipsons. I am a graphic designer and a writer and have just finished my book LIFE OF DESIGNS. This book is less about graphic design, but more about my struggle throughout my first years of life. I was born in family of 3 children and having a father suffering from serious alcohol addiction. Mother worked as waitress at small cattery and sometimes could not even afford a bottle of water. Living on food stamps made my school life miserable and very hard. Working in grocery store at cashiers was not the path I aimed for after high school, but was the only way to I could see to move out of parent’s house. The only thing I knew was that I have to start the journey of developing myself. How I worked as a cashier and started helping others late in nights with graphics starting from using paint to advancing to professional graphic programs was struggle I believe a lot of individuals have nowadays. How I struggled to pay the rent and advanced to professional freelancer is a real life story summarized in LIFE OF DESIGNS.

story:
VERY IMPORTANT: Short Summary

Our E-BOOK will TOTALLY change your point of view on Science, Religion and Life.

The research will be accessible, in a second moment, to everyone completely for free. 

Our final aim is to share it with as many people as possible in the world and to help them find the love for God.

Your donations will help us to complete our research, create media files and communicate our findings with the world through social media and advertising.

Together we can stop this trend of idolizing Atheism.

What We Need & What You Get

More in details your donations will be used for:

- Complete the Research (on the latest scientific discoveries and on the Bible)

- Translate the Essay into different languages to reach also people who can't speak English

- Create Videos and other media files that will be more engaging to watch or read

- Share our Essay, Videos and other Media Files through Social Media Advertising Campaigns (such as paid You Tube ads, Facebook, Instagram etc.)

The Impact

Our objective is to make people aware of how magic and precious is life. 

We would like people to be grateful for the miracle of the existence and to focus more on love rather than hate, which is totally nonsense.

Risks & Challenges

There is no risk as we have already almost completed our research (on the latest scientific discoveries of theoretical physics and on the bible) and we are just  completing the essay with all the findings.

Once again, we aim to share our research for free with everybody. Your contribution will just help us in reaching our objective.

Other Ways You Can Help

Just share this campaign on the social media and talk about us, so that  people can be aware that Science, which usually is used to support Atheism, can actually support the existence of God.

BIG THANK YOU TO ALL OF YOU. WE HOPE THAT ALL OF YOU CAN FEEL THE LOVE OF GOD.

story:
Synopsis of the victorious Don Black

MAXIMILLIAN (“MAX”) BLACK, a teenager who had trouble that started with him being a product of the best kept secret between the master and a servant way back in the sixties in apartheid  South Africa. He led a life in squalor until, unbeknownst to him, he was adopted by the master himself, after his mother’s death. He had earlier, this being his first of many crimes, almost murdered his uncle in self-defence for his younger sister, SIBONGILE DHLAMINI, when the uncle tried to force himself on the sister. 

At his new school of predominately white students, Max then had the opportunity to meet his alter ego, ALPHONSO ’Al’ DEVONOIUER. Together they started all the shenanigans — from merging their small time school gangs, to trafficking weed, to growing their own weed, to trafficking cocaine and crystal meth. Then they graduated to running underground brothels for the politicians and the wealthy. As a result of a life full of murder and deception, Max started to develop some migraines and erratic sleeping patterns, which interfered with his life. He was then referred to a well-known therapist by the name of JOEY KUMALO, but instead of being psychoanalysed, Max started a kryptonitic romantic relationship with Joey. Max did not give the relationship time, and all the while the lady became conceited and bossy.

 So Max left for a two year study stint oversees, where he was unfortunately shotlived, and interrupted by ghosts from the past in the form of a petition by parents of people he had wronged or murdered during his heydays.After returning from overseas and re-joining Al on the dark side of life, he embarked on a mission to avenge the death of his guardians. AL, with Max, planned a hostile takeover of the company of the man who was the financial advisor to his dad, a plan that would see the man commit suicide. After the takeover, all the proceeds went to the receiver because they could not pinpoint where they got the capital to avoid jail time. The bad things were now following the guys, with Max’s house being vandalised and then Al’s parent’s house being burned. There was then a drive-by shooting where most of the clan where around for some braai session; Joey was hijacked and almost killed; and Al’s cousins were shot execution style one Sunday morning.

How you contribution will be used

The funds will be utilized to:

  • Pay editors
  • Subscribe to Grammarly.com to check all related grammar issues
  • For publishing costs 
  • Should I not reach my goal I will add on by taking up credit card 

The Impact

The story, although fictitious,  captures the many sufferings and destitute life of black people in the Apartheid South Africa , many shenanigans that the youth embarked on to earn a living and the obsession with western life that led some to take their future fortune into their own hands - It reveals some history and the struggle  which were real and observed by the author although based on a victicious character.

Risks & Challenges

The only possible risk is that of not being published though very low . I have an interested publisher (Sarah McGregor  of www.clockworkbooks.co.za )
 ) but should they renege on the promise since we do not have a signed contract yet , there many solutions in this day and ages of technology , listed below

  • Amazon Kindle publishing 
  • On demand print 
  • Audible for audit book
  • Authorhouse
