story:
Pourquoi lancer Creativa ?

Les avancées de la technologie subissent depuis moins de dix ans une accélération phénoménale. Difficile par exemple de croire que l'iPhone, objet indispensable de notre quotidien, n'a pas encore fêté ses dix bougies.

D'ici quelques années, le monde dans lequel nous vivons aujourd'hui nous semblera déjà complètement dépassé et certains domaines de notre quotidien quasiment archaïques.

Dans cette course effrénée vers l'avenir, le Québec tient une place dont il n'a pas à rougir : jeux vidéo, effets spéciaux, réalité virtuelle, réalité augmentée, la province est en train de devenir un carrefour technologique de renommée mondiale. Pourtant, de nombreux Québécois ne sont pas au courant de cet état de fait, c'est pourquoi nous avons décidé de créer le magazine Creativa afin de faire connaître les talents locaux et leur contribution au domaine technologique.

Why launch Creativa?  

Over less than a decade, technology has advanced at a phenomenal rate. Just consider how hard it is to believe that the iPhone – such an indispensable tool in our everyday lives – is not yet ten years old. 

In the next few years, our world as we know it today will come to seem totally outmoded, and some aspects of our day-to-day lives will have become practically archaic.

In this breakneck race to the future, Quebec has staked out respectable ground in video games, special effects, virtual reality and augmented reality. This province is becoming a renowned technological crossroads with a worldwide reputation. And yet many in Quebec are unaware of this.

We decided to publish Creativa to spread the word about local talent and contributions to technological fields. 


Quelle est l'ambition du magazine ?

Creativa entend devenir le magazine de référence consacré à la découverte des acteurs québécois de ce changement, qu'ils soient entrepreneurs, artistes, programmeurs ou visionnaires. Vous y retrouverez des dossiers complets accompagnés d'entrevues, de détecteurs de tendances et d'autres surprises qui vous donneront les clefs nécessaires afin de comprendre et d'appréhender le monde excitant qui nous attend demain et qui se construit ici, au Québec.

What are we aiming to achieve with this magazine?

Creativa intends to become the top news source for the driving forces behind technological change in Quebec, including entrepreneurs, artists, programmers, and visionaries. Reports will include interviews, trend forecasts and some surprises that will open up an understanding of the exciting world of tomorrow that is being built here in Quebec. 

Combien coûtera le magazine ? À quelle fréquence sortira-t-il ?

Notre plan est de sortir le magazine quatre fois par année, chaque numéro tournant autour d'une thématique spécifique. Les prochains numéros seront ceux de SEPTEMBRE, DÉCEMBRE, MARS 2017 et JUIN 2017.  

  • Un exemplaire de Creativa coûtera 15$ + frais d'envois et de distribution.

  • Un abonnement annuel coûtera 50$ + frais d'envois.

  • Un abonnement de deux ans coûtera 100$ + frais d'envois.

Afin d'obtenir ce prix, nous avons analysé nos coûts fixes, ainsi que ceux des magazines existants, et convenu qu'il s'agit d'un prix honnête, abordable pour les lecteurs et nous permettant d'assurer la publication des numéros suivants.

How much will the magazine cost? How often will it come out?

We plan to publish four issues per year, each with a specific theme. The next ones will be available in SEPTEMBER, 2016; DECEMBER, 2016; MARCH, 2017; and JUNE, 2017. 

●  One issue of Creativa: $15 + delivery and distribution

●  An annual subscription: $50 + delivery

●  A two-year subscription: $100 + delivery

To set a fair price that will be affordable for our readers while providing for the publication of future issues, we analyzed our fixed costs along with those of existing magazines.

Que trouverez-vous dans le premier numéro ?

Dans l'édition de septembre, vous trouverez un dossier complet sur la réalité virtuelle, mais aussi plusieurs articles d’applications, d’actions et de projets ambitieux créés au Québec. Il y aura notamment un article sur Téo taxi, le nouveau taxi québécois, ainsi que la rétrospective d’une grande dame pionnière du développement de l'industrie numérique québécoise.

What will you find in the first issue?

In our September issue, you will find a full report on virtual reality, as well as articles about applications and ambitious projects and events in Quebec. Of note is an article about Téo taxi, a new Montreal-based service, and a profile of one of Quebec’s great female digital pioneers.

Pourquoi une campagne de sociofinancement ?

Bien que nous soyons confiants dans la réussite de ce projet, lancer une campagne de sociofinancement nous permettra de confirmer certaines de nos hypothèses, telles que l'existence d'un intérêt marqué pour ce qui se passe au Québec. Cela nous permettra également de lancer le magazine avec une base existante d'abonnés, de solidifier nos partenariats et d'entendre vos suggestions pour améliorer l'expérience Creativa.

Why the crowdfunding campaign?

While we are confidant that this project will be a success, launching a fundraising campaign will allow us to verify some of our hypotheses and confirm that there is a particular interest in what’s going on in Quebec. It will also mean that we’ll launch the magazine with a list of existing subscribers, solidify our partnerships and get feedback that will improve the Creativa experience. 

  • Fondateur / Founder: Laurent M. Abecassis

  • Gestionnaire de projet / Project Manager: Alice Bruyneel

  • Responsable éditorial / Editorial Manager: Marie Pâris

  • Editeur et contributeur / Editor and contributor: Charlie Maréchal

  • Journaliste / Journalist: Gabrielle Brassard-Lecours

  • Journaliste / Journalist: Fanny Bourel

  • Journaliste / Journalist : Denis Wong

  • Traductrice / Translator: Jennifer Westlake

Risques et défis

La création d'un projet de cette ampleur n'est pas sans risque, il y a notamment des frais incompressibles qu'il nous faudra couvrir, tels que les frais d'impression, de distribution, de mise en page, de marketing ainsi que bien évidemment la paie de nos journalistes, nous permettant de vous fournir des articles approfondis et de qualité.

Dans le but de garantir la première année de parution du magazine et de faire face à tous les coûts engendrés, nous lançons cette campagne de financement afin d’assurer les différents acteurs participant à sa création de la solidité d'un projet qui n'aura pas à faire de compromis pour d'atteindre ses ambitions.

Notre plan d'affaires nécessite donc 50.000$ de financement, que nous sommes confiants d'atteindre grâce à votre soutien ! Peu importe le montant, c'est grâce à vous que nous y arriverons. Nous vous encourageons également à passer le mot et à partager dans vos réseaux, afin de rejoindre le plus grand nombre !

Toutes vos remarques, suggestions et messages d'amour, nous y répondrons dans les plus brefs délais !  

Risks and challenges

Creating a project of this scale is not without risk. In particular, there are essential expenses that we must cover, such as printing and distribution costs, layout, marketing, and obviously the fees for our journalists, who provide well-written, professional articles.

We are launching this financing campaign to defray all the expenses of the first year of issues and ensure that the ambitions behind the creation of this worthy project are not compromised.

We are confident that the $50,000 our business plan requires can be raised with your support. Whatever you are able to contribute, with your help, we will make it. We encourage you to spread the word and share this information with your networks to reach the greatest audience possible!

Your feedback is welcome! We will answer your comments, suggestions – or fan mail! – promptly.
story_txt:
Pourquoi lancer Creativa ? Les avancées de la technologie subissent depuis moins de dix ans une accélération phénoménale. Difficile par exemple de croire que l'iPhone, objet indispensable de notre quotidien, n'a pas encore fêté ses dix bougies. D'ici quelques années, le monde dans lequel nous vivons aujourd'hui nous semblera déjà complètement dépassé et certains domaines de notre quotidien quasiment archaïques.Dans cette course effrénée vers l'avenir, le Québec tient une place dont il n'a pas à rougir : jeux vidéo, effets spéciaux, réalité virtuelle, réalité augmentée, la province est en train de devenir un carrefour technologique de renommée mondiale. Pourtant, de nombreux Québécois ne sont pas au courant de cet état de fait, c'est pourquoi nous avons décidé de créer le magazine Creativa afin de faire connaître les talents locaux et leur contribution au domaine technologique.Why launch
Creativa?  
Over less
than a decade, technology has advanced at a phenomenal rate. Just consider how
hard it is to believe that the iPhone – such an indispensable tool in our
everyday lives – is not yet ten years old. 

In the next
few years, our world as we know it today will come to seem totally outmoded,
and some aspects of our day-to-day lives will have become practically archaic. 
In this
breakneck race to the future, Quebec has staked out respectable ground in video
games, special effects, virtual reality and augmented reality. This province is
becoming a renowned technological crossroads with a worldwide reputation. And
yet many in Quebec are unaware of this. 
We decided
to publish Creativa to spread the word about local talent and contributions to
technological fields. Quelle est l'ambition du magazine ?Creativa entend devenir le magazine de référence consacré à la découverte des acteurs québécois de ce changement, qu'ils soient entrepreneurs, artistes, programmeurs ou visionnaires. Vous y retrouverez des dossiers complets accompagnés d'entrevues, de détecteurs de tendances et d'autres surprises qui vous donneront les clefs nécessaires afin de comprendre et d'appréhender le monde excitant qui nous attend demain et qui se construit ici, au Québec.What are we aiming to achieve with this
magazine?
Creativa
intends to become the top news source for the driving forces behind technological
change in Quebec, including entrepreneurs, artists, programmers, and
visionaries. Reports will include interviews, trend forecasts and some
surprises that will open up an understanding of the exciting world of tomorrow
that is being built here in Quebec. Combien coûtera le magazine ? À quelle fréquence sortira-t-il ?Notre plan est de sortir le magazine quatre fois par année, chaque numéro tournant autour d'une thématique spécifique. Les prochains numéros seront ceux de SEPTEMBRE, DÉCEMBRE, MARS 2017 et JUIN 2017.

story:
The Blurb

David

The cops are after me, I think. My psychologist wants to keep me out of the forensic hospital, but all I want to do is smoke weed and taunt Jehovah's witnesses. I should keep myself from becoming obsessed again, but Lilli is unlike any girl I've ever devoured, and that makes her perfect. Moloch be pleased.  

Lilli

I don't want to complain, but trying to hide several forced miscarriages from your parents while balancing a normal life is annoying. I'm trying to work through my shit with therapy and daily random hookups with the most boring men this town has to offer. When I meet David I think he's a little weird, a little sad, and a whole lot of mysterious. As soon as I get rid of this stillborn I think I might try to date him.

A SYMBOL AND A SIGN is horror novella that will turn your stomach, while tickling your funny bone. It's really grotesque...you'll love it.

 

Short Summary

I have been a writer/publisher for 7 years. I really believe in this work. I feel it is my best.

What We Need & What You Get

I need 5k to pay for editing, the cover, and living expenses. You will receive copies of CUTTERS, I AM YOU ARE, and A SYMBOL AND A SIGN

The Impact

This book is about toxicity. I feel it is important to birth out into the world

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't pledge, please share this project with others you think it will resonate with.

story:
Hi, I'm Emese Szoges. I am an author of the YA novel Liars and Scoundrels published in Hungary. I'm seeking to present charming YA stories to the readers - and now with You we can make it happen!

I have hired a skilled translator, descendant of '56 refugees living in the US, and with the approval of my publisher, my novel will be available in both printed and electronic versions.

And here is where I need You. I need your help raising money to translate my book into English. I already have a great translator, but I also need your support.

Why support an author like me since there are many YA authors out there? Here's a few paragraphs of the first chapter translated from the novel, so you can see if you like it.

"A postcoach rattled through the quiet, somnolent town.
  It was the weekly diligence from the borough of Heilborg, heading to the capital Freienwil, that left every Monday precisely at seven from the stoop of the Heilborg post office. Per the itinerary, and weather permitting, of course, it would arrive in Freienwil in four days, with rest stops overnight in Klerleuw, Wieldhein, and Salzbeck.
  Overnight showers had left shining puddles dotting the well-beaten road, but already the bright May-tide sun was doing its best to dry the soil. Afore the coach the two bays in harness tossed their heads proudly, as if heading a wedding procession and not a mere postcoach. They drew stares accordingly, from the women hurrying home laden with fresh baked goods, to the tradesmen sweeping in front of their shops, and between the day laborers trekking to work. The chassis bucked as its rear wheel dropped into a rut, sending the head of the passenger sitting above the axle jerking forward. It so happened that it was a bristlebrush mustachioed officer seated there, and his justified indignation sounded loudly from the back. (...)"

 

Thank you. I will be forever indebted to you.

 

FAQ

What will happen if you don’t collect all the money?

I will still be able to pay some of the expenses and I’ll give rewards to everyone who’s donated. That’s why I’ve chosen Indiegogo. I will still give all perks to the backers.

What will happen if you’ll collect more money than the target amount?

It depends on how much more it’d be. Depending on the amount, I can give extra goals, like hiring an artist to add more illustrations to the existing ones or to make artwork for posters.

Can’t you translate the story yourself?

Despite being confident in speaking and writing in English, the first-class translation of a literary text is clearly out of my league.

If I get a character named after me, how will it be included in the book since you are translating a book that is already finished and published in different language?

This and my upcoming novels has secondary and tertiary characters and it’s no problem to change some of the names in a different language edition. Translators often change names of characters and places if they have some special meaning in a given language. This is similar.


Story synopsis - Liars and Scoundrels

"A kidnapped princess, on whom the fate of a kingdom rests - and a scoundrel, on whom the princess depends. 
One moment, Johanna is riding the postcoach en route to the capital, and the next, her feet tread the corpses of her servants in the dirt as she is strongarmed from the carriage. Timar lives one day the dull, but predictable life of a highwayman, and the next finds himself facing a decision where he must cast aside what little he has to proceed. And because the fates are cruel, even if he chooses not to: they may well take it from him anyway.
As Johanna and Timar flee their trained pursuers ever further, it becomes clear that the only people they can count on are each other. But how will the journey of two vulnerable children end in a world where the strong rule absolute, and the line between truth and lie is razor thin?" 

 

With love and gratitude,

Emese Szoges

PS: Like this idea? Share it on Facebook, Twitter or Instagram. Friends love being involved in uplifting projects, don't leave them out of the fun!

https://www.instagram.com/szogesemese/

https://www.facebook.com/szogesemese/

story:
WARNING: If you don't like space battles, cyborgs, diverse flawed characters, aliens, AIs, mechs, robots or bad anguage this book may not be for you.

THE LAST MARINES

Having been replaced by robots and drones, veterans Ben Corbin and Sam Garrett go into business for themselves towing derelict vessels and space junk out of the shipping lanes around Mars.
Business was good but a couple of malfunctioning service robots had caused them to return to Earth for replacements. Aliens attacked the freighter they’d booked passage on, slaughtering and feeding on the crew and passengers. Only Corbin and Garrett managed to hold their own until they could hide in stasis pods.

200 years later

Earth and her colonies, governed by the Commonwealth of Nations, are at war with a race of aliens known as the Nineteenth. Not with the Gar Rei Jhi who had attacked Corbin and Garrett so many years past. That war had been fought and humans lost. This was a new alien threat whose origins and motives are unknown.
What information humans have on this new enemy comes from the uneasy alliance with the Gar Rei Jhi who’ve been fighting an even longer war with the Nineteenth. Though long ago, Corbin and Garrett’s history with the Gar Rei Jhi hasn’t been forgotten. They are to be ambassadors serving at the pleasure of the same aliens that attacked them.

Thrust into a new age of engineered soldiers, interplanetary politics, and self-aware robots, Corbin has to quickly decide who he’s going to trust as he journeys back to the Mars colony. But his search for truth may come at the cost of his life, and the fate of the Commonwealth may rest on his decision.

Lawrence N. Oliver

I've been very pleased with the reviews and responses from readers but for indie authors especially, the returns aren't what one would expect and the expense of turning out a quality product is pretty hefty. So I'm asking for help to get the next installment out to readers. I'm also working on a spin off series in the same "universe" but instead of being set in the distant future it takes place in the American West of the 1880s. Scifi/ zombie/ western. They tie together in that through out THE LAST MARINES series certain creatures of Earth lore are explained as having alien origins.

With your contributions I'll be able to hopefully get the second book in THE LAST MARINES series out by the end of the year depending on my editor and cover artist's schedules.

My goal is to raise $5,000 to be spent on editing, cover design and proofreading.

If you are unable to contribute financially at this time please like and share this link or one or all of the links listed below. Follow me on Twitter @Ollie3104 or on my Facebook page. Also reviews on Goodreads.com or Amazon.com, if you are someone who has read the THE LAST MARINES, are a tremendous help. 

Please use the Indiegogo share tools as well.

or

 https://www.lawrencenoliver.com/

https://www.amazon.com/kindle-dbs/entity/author...

https://twitter.com/Ollie3104

https://www.facebook.com/LawrenceNOliver/

https://www.goodreads.com/book/show/44581652-th...

story:
UPDATE: Our story has been accepted by a publisher!  Thanks for participating in the prelaunch, let's keep the momentum going!!

It's time to set the record straight

This Christmas Santa's not the only one coming to town. It's about time the holiday season had a holiday heroine in addition to the lineup of old men - Santa, Frosty, and that foul Grinch! 

This year we tell a new inspiring story, answer the question your daughters have all been asking, "What's Mrs. Claus' Name?" and add a Christmas heroine to the lineup. 

Hi, I'm Chris and this my second children's story. I wrote my first to help my two little brothers get excited about reading. This project is geared towards my beautiful nieces. Every girl should have a Christmas heroine too! 

 

 

 

Get us illustrated and get drawn in!!!

Help us get our story illustrated, on the shelves and in your hands. 

  • Your contributions go directly to illustrations and publishing.
  • We want you to be a part of the book too! Check out our unique perks where you or someone special can be a part of the story.

 

 

Help us get the word out!

We know this book might not be for everybody, but everybody knows someone who'll love it!

  • Please share with your favorite loved ones who would like it!
  • Don't forget to use the Indiegogo share tools!

Follow us on Facebook (fb.me/MrsClausName) and help us choose what Mrs. Claus and her story looks like! What will she wear? What color is her hair? You don't have to get the book to help us tell the story. 

Thanks for checking us out and thanks for supporting the Mrs. Claus story!!!
story_txt:
UPDATE: Our story has been accepted by a publisher!  Thanks for participating in the prelaunch, let's keep the momentum going!!
It's time to set the record straight
This Christmas Santa's not the only one coming to town. It's about time the holiday season had a holiday heroine in addition to the lineup of old men - Santa, Frosty, and that foul Grinch! 
This year we tell a new inspiring story, answer the question your daughters have all been asking, "What's Mrs. Claus' Name?" and add a Christmas heroine to the lineup. 
Hi, I'm Chris and this my second children's story. I wrote my first to help my two little brothers get excited about reading. This project is geared towards my beautiful nieces. Every girl should have a Christmas heroine too! 
 


 
 
Get us illustrated and get drawn in!!!
Help us get our story illustrated, on the shelves and in your hands. 

Your contributions go directly to illustrations and publishing.
We want you to be a part of the book too! Check out our unique perks where you or someone special can be a part of the story.



 
 
Help us get the word out!

We know this book might not be for everybody, but everybody knows someone who'll love it!

Please share with your favorite loved ones who would like it!
Don't forget to use the Indiegogo share tools!

Follow us on Facebook (fb.me/MrsClausName) and help us choose what Mrs. Claus and her story looks like! What will she wear? What color is her hair? You don't have to get the book to help us tell the story. 
Thanks for checking us out and thanks for supporting the Mrs. Claus story!!!

story:
The Story

Return to Avani

Sixteen year old Tierra has no choice but to follow her instincts and the magical letter she was given to find her real home. Shadowed in the darkness of no memories, she goes on an adventurous journey. Bumping into her so called brother, a few weird and wonderful creatures and has great fun exploring new worlds. This escapade helps her grow her own special abilities, self belief and self worth. A possible love interest surfaces but there is far too much chaos around for her to focus on him. Will she make it home? Will she find her truth? Or will she pay the ultimate price? 

This is the Part one of six of the exciting young adult, fantasy series - 7 Pieces of 6 - 

 

Story Inspiration

Growing up I used to escape from the pressures of competitive sport by living in these weird and wonderful places in my head. I would often escape to these worlds creating crazy creatures and people and talk my mom's ear off about them. I realize now that it played a really important role in me relaxing, refocusing and remembering my own self worth. 

This book has been written and rewritten many times, with a short self published stint ten years ago.  Since then I have settled with the story line and I am excited to bring it to the world, with a new and fresh feel. 

My ambition is to inspire hope and courage to any person who might be battling with difficult times, not only by reading the book but also by knowing that it has taken me courage and perseverance to put this book out there after ten years of personal growth and change. I want to show that if they can find the courage and belief in their heart anything is possible. No matter what age they are.

 

About the Author

I am the youngest of two sisters, grew up in Zimbabwe, then spent fifteen years in South Africa before settling in Milton Keynes (UK) at the end of 2019. I have been writing for close on twenty years now, dabbling in poetry initially before deciding twelve years ago to give novel writing a go.  My debut novel “ Return to Avani” I wrote with the hope of showcasing my love and excitement of creating and describing new worlds and characters that people can get lost in or become part of, much like I did throughout my years. I continue to learn and grow as I write the rest of the series.  It has been and still is a humbling yet exciting journey. 

 

What I need

In order to complete this process, I need your help! Return to Avani will be printed as a high quality, soft cover book and hard cover book. Your generous donation will go towards several aspects of the book, from the design, editing, layout, cover designs, social media marketing, printing and publishing process. 

Where the Funds go

  • Editing
  • Layout and formatting
  • Cover design
  • Social media marketing
  • Printing
  • Shipping and packaging
  • Perks

Ideally we would love to meet the target, but if that unfortunately does not happen, all funds raised will cover all expenses already incurred, such as the editing, cover designs and book trailer but all the perks will definitely be honored. 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you aren't looking to contribute right now, there are other ways you can support! Please consider sharing this campaign on your social media, with friends and family and schools who you might think will enjoy the story and the message. 

If you have any contacts with any media outlets you think may be interested please feel free to drop me an email, or if you would like to send some love or ask any questions, I welcome it! info@brigittemileson.com.

Thank you so much, this project really means a lot to me!

story:
Campaign Update

To my friends and supporters. As we wind down the year and I approach Nicky's 10 year heavenly anniversary, the "overwhelming" love-felt support has made me rethink the direction of my book.

I continue on my journey of unconditional love, as any parent would. The book is a very important part of my family love, support and commitment. But there is a greater cause that I wish to embrace moving forward.

We are enormously appreciative of your genuine support for the crowdfunding campaign and trust that you understand that I am closing only this chapter of the book. The book of a mothers love and Nicky's life will always continue to evolve.

www.heart2heart.love

heart2heart   "A Journey of Unconditional Love " is a story of the journey Michele as a single mother and her son Nicky took in the face of Ewing's Sarcoma, a rare form of Cancer.  You will travel with them through the ups and down, share in the events that took place, the people they met throughout the journey and how they both, in a most unique approach to life, come to terms together in the face of much adversity. The story will make you cry as well as smile. As we learn through their unique experiences how death is not the end of life. This book is about the celebration of life and living it, and love as seen through the thoughts and eyes of two very unique people. A story of great value to all who may be experiencing a similar fight in life. A guide to the human soul and it unrelenting power to survive.  7 Years of writing this magnificent book, we have now released on Nicky's 10 year heavenly anniversary, a campaign in hopes to complete this beautiful story.

My book is registered with The Writers Guild of America, West, Inc.


Dad Gets Fired from His Job

In the above clip, you will find similarities that replicate Michele's story. 
  • Melissa Weaver gets hit in the leg during a soccer game (1992)
  • Nicky Bell Gets kicked in the leg at a basketball game (2001)
  • Melissa Weaver is disagnosed with Primitive neuroectodermal tumor (PNET)
  • Nicky Bell is diagnosed with Ewing's Sarcoma 
Current evidence indicates that both Ewing's sarcoma and PNET have a similar neural phenotype and, because they share an identical chromosome translocation, they should be viewed as the same tumor, differing only in their degree of neural differentiation. 
  • Melissa Weaver's Father gets fired from his job (1992)
  • Nicky's Mother gets fired from her job (2002)
  • Melissa meets Bill Clinton in the oval office (Make-A-Wish-1992)
  • Nicky's Make-A Wish-2002 cruise learns about the FMLA law
Melissa and her family went to Washington to fulfill the last wish of the little girl's life. The visit might not have been possible had Mr. Bill Clinton lost the election. Two weeks into the new administration, Congress passed the family leave bill for the third time. This time, it was signed into law the next day. 
Follow our Facebook post each day for new videos.

What We Need & What You Get

Your dollars and pledges are the fuel to make heart2heart   "A Journey of Unconditional Love " a reality and bring it to print.  My first draft is complete and ready for the world to see.  Publishing and marketing is expensive. I have put the past seven years and nearly all my money into bringing this story to life.  I have sold my truck, taken on extra jobs and used nearly every avenue I can to get this book out into the world.  

Here are just a few of the perks that you can receive for your donations:

  • Private Dinner with Chazz & Gianna Palminteri
  • Autographed book by Robby Benson "I'm Not Dead Yet"
  • Autographed basketball by Shaq
  • Mentalist Adult Show with Mr. Renzo
  • David Cone autographed baseball, hat & glove
  • Jerry Rice signed picture
  • Private photoshoot
  • Professional hair and makeup session
  • #TeamNicky Baseball Hat

And in a passionate thanks, I have included these Perks from my heart to yours that I feel will say an adequate “thank you for your generosity”.  Please pledge whatever you can, a dollar or two helps boost our Gogo factor.   Receive an autograph book, magic show or choose any perk we have so many to offer.  You will be the person to make this book a reality. 


Changing Lives

My story is about finding the will to live, and discovering a depth of courage, I hope will help parents who have lost a child and anyone who has lost someone they love.

It is about being. It's a book about a son’s profound courage and a single mother’s own “near death of self” to become a rising phoenix in spite of it all.  It is about being fully alive, in the face of death. 
I hope this book will make you smile, cry and love every moment of your life and cherish your loved ones, as it is, above all else, a book about hope and discovery. Unconditional love is a rare love;  a love without strings, expectations or need.  It is the most spacious kind of love and my son Nicky gave us each a chance to learn more than we ever could have imagined.  You will treasure this book and want to give it to those who mean the most. 



People Nicky Touched

Nicky's journey crossed many paths, and touched many lives.  Actors, athletes, models, such as Chazz & Gianna Palminteri, Robby Benson, David Cone, Shaquille O'Neal, Vida Guerra, Mayor Ed Koch and many more. They were impacted by what an inspiring individual he was.

In this campaign some of these very individuals have committed to assist in bringing this book to the world through various gracious donations of their time.

Where will funds go?

I feel so strongly about the message of this book, I have personally invested $12,000 of my own funds.

With the funds raised for this campaign, we can complete all writing, editing, illustrations, printing, shipping, and marketing expenses. We know exactly how much we need; these amounts won’t increase:

An Angel Lands on a Mother's Doorstep


Other Ways You Can Help

There are lots of ways you can help and they're all great tokens of kindness! Word-of-mouth and your excitement helps multiply the value of your support.

  • Share on Facebook to help us spread the word
  • Tell your coworkers and anyone else who might be looking for a worthwhile place to do a last minute donation before the end of the year
  • Get the word out by phone, email, and talking it up
  • Even better, post a link to the campaign video
  • Tweet a link to our IndieGoGo page
  • Share the perk pictures on Instagram!
  • Visit our blog to see all the other wonderful things we offer
  • Familiarize yourself with Our "Dove" Story and share this powerful story

*Some people are not yet familiar with the power of crowd-funding. Explain how it works and motivate someone to check out our Journey of Unconditional Love campaign.

story:
Short Summary

In order to help as many people become  as self actualized, the aim is to fund a book tour in the U.S. and Europe initially, later in other parts of the world. The purpose of my book is to raise the awareness level of people in order for them to discover their true passion and share the unique gift each of us possesses.  In this way we raise the level of awareness for all.

I wrote the book in 6 weeks after a Conscious Writing retreat in the U.K. in 2015. I was inspired to write it and the topic chose me. Through life events such as death of a loved one, divorce, which helped me clarify topics in the book albeit painfully at times, I did self publish in January of 2018.

My background as a veteran public relations and digital marketing professional of 30 years has helped me manage promotions, social media, PR with ease.

A portion of book proceeds will fund a center for youth awareness in Atlanta, Georgia.  It is my dream to instill self awareness in youth through mindfulness training, yoga, holistic healthcare and other education and exercise techniques free of charge to all children who attend classes or services.

Initially I plan on touring the Southeastern U.S. and have started doing so in Florida and Atlanta already with independent bookstores. I'd like to visit other cities and do book signings at independent bookstores. I'd like to offer the books to youth in college and high school as well. The companion work book helps people go through the process after reading the book, in order to build a daily habit of  mindfulness and figuring out what makes them happy. When people know their passion and share it  we share happiness.

The value to the world is to raise the planet's level of happiness to one day have a world where we are all on the same page and helping each other be at peace.

As a successful entrepreneur for 14 years and having succeeded at my career for 30, I am highly organized, dynamic, educated, experienced and passionate about this project.  I want to help people and I believe in the best of human beings.  I will succeed through sheer tenacity and a positive attitude if nothing else!

I need your help to spread the word worldwide!  I will use the funds to do a book tour and fund talks at colleges and universities to get the youth of educated world involved as well as adults.

With any contribution you will help share the light. I look to initially raise $10,000 to fund travel and gifts to non profits and youth organizations. If you can't contribute then if you can share on social media thank you!

Read the press here about the book and how I wrote it: http://www.palmbeachpost.com/lifestyles/pro-new...

I look forward to meeting you all one day on the tour!

story:
A Fat Cow in China is a comprehensive no-nonsense, no holds barred guide on how a foreign entrepreneur can set up a business in China. Too often, books on the subject are tech heavy, based on personal anecdotal evidence and backwards-looking. A Fat Cow in China is based heavily on actual research I conducted over a 7-year period and from my personal experience of building my own business in the region. The book is finally backed up my doctoral research on Chinese market entry and attempts to be forward-looking by nature. This book will connect with small business owners and aspiring entrepreneurs who have an interest in Asia in general and China particularly. There are also general lessons to be learnt about entering emerging markets. This book attempts to set out a roadmap for beginning a start-up in China.

The fundamentals can easily be applied to any part of the world, but the contents have been geared towards China, using Hong Kong as the preferred starting point. No knowledge of the region is assumed, and the reader is expected to use this book as a springboard for further investigation - particularly as Chinese laws and regulations can change overnight. Furthermore, this is the first edition and a new edition will be updated and produced at the beginning of each new year in order to keep abreast of the changing legal and business environment in China. This will be the first forward-looking annual compendium on entry into the Chinese market.

story:
A new business book that generates critical value

The book presents a new logic how to integrate strategy, innovation and foresight to generate new value.
  • Presents a new logic how to integrate strategy, innovation and foresight
  • Focus on generating new value in the present and the future
  • Published in Portuguese with ELSEVIER (#90 sales rank on amazon.com.br in its category)
  • The framework has +35k views and +350 downloads at Slideshare
  • 12 people from around the world participated in the insight section
  • 15 years of professional experience packed into the book + stories
  • Presents a how-to logic with many practical concepts
  • Written in English - ready to go
  • The goal of the campaign: to self-publish the English version

This 230-page business book integrated doers thinkers and different concepts. More than 12 thinkers and doers took part and the book has a guiding logic how to implement Future Value Generation in your organization. It integrates #design #innovation #strategy and #foresight.


Sneak Preview of the logic.

Interested in the book?You can also explore the key logic of "The Future Value Framework" at SLIDESHARE which  counts 30k views, 380 downloads (English, Italian, Portuguese)


Doers and Thinkers participating in the book.

I am grateful to each of the participants for sharing their insights and ideas. Thank you all!


  • Antônio Leitão, Manager at Mongeral Aegon - https://br.linkedin.com/in/antonio-leitao-90437747/en
  • Aga Szostek- CX/UX Innovation (User Research and Design)https://pl.linkedin.com/in/agnieszka-sz%C3%B3stek-5aa2321
  • Artur Arsenio- Innovator | Manager | Engineer | Passionate about new technology businesshttps://pt.linkedin.com/in/artur-miguel-arsénio-5932a91
  • Erica Orange- Executive Vice President & Chief Operating Officer at The Future Hunters -https://www.linkedin.com/in/ericaorange
  • Érico Fileno- Strategic Designer & Service Innovation Leader -https://br.linkedin.com/in/efileno
  • Harry West- CEO at frog -https://www.linkedin.com/in/harry-west-3aa9a77
  • Jeffrey Tjendra- Business Innovation by Design -https://ca.linkedin.com/in/jeffreytjendra
  • José Souza-  Senior Partner at Ayr Consulting - https://pt.linkedin.com/in/jose-eduardo-garcia-de-souza-35584620
  • Luís Gustavo - Serial entrepreneur. 6x founder, 3x investor, 3x advisor and 2x CEO -  https://www.linkedin.com/in/luisbebop
  • Malcolm Ryder- Strategy, Design and Change management for Products, Knowledge and Services - https://www.linkedin.com/in/malcolmryder
  • Maria Paula Oliveira- Strategic Projects & Planning Director, Experian, Asia Pacific - https://sg.linkedin.com/in/mariapaulaoliveira
  • Mattia Crespi- Futurist, Technology Evangelist, Speaker - https://it.linkedin.com/in/mattiacrespi
  • Norman Wang- Director of Business Development at Opaque Multimedia - https://au.linkedin.com/in/norman-wang-0284535a


Who am I.

We exist in a society where we are often feel that we need more options. This applies as individual, society and organization. I embraced as a life-goal to generate new alternatives. I do so for 15 years now as an executive, entrepreneur, consultant, mentor of startups and author. The book, Future Value Generation, is one important step in keeping me going. Up to now, more than 30.000 people viewed the logic on Slideshare, and the book is alrady on sale on Amazon in Portuguese. 

To know more, please check me out at Google or LinkedIn. 


For what I will use the funds?

The book is written in English and already published in Portuguese. But my goal is to share it internationally. The funds go to structure-, line- and copyediting and giving the book the visual kick. Also there is quiet some taxes and fees involved and 30% of the value goes  to the perks, printing the book and to deliver it to your front door.


What does the book look like?

The campaign starts with a paperback, 6″ x 9″, quality pages and black&white. I really hope we can get the additional funds to go for hardcover ;) 

The cover used in the mock-up is an example and varies from the final design.

Some say the book is the next promising logic after Blue Ocean Strategy and Business Model Canvas. I am grateful for these opinions. 


Timeline.

March - May                           Edits (structural, line and copy). Udemy Course Online.

May - June                              Interior Design and Front Cover

June - July                              Publication. Signing. Shipping.


The perks.

I know that a perk is a promise.  It is all about reputation and trust. I have been building my reputation for years now, and so there is no chance on earth that you will not get your perk. 

No risk is involved. The book is already written in English and the Udemy course 80% recorded. Get the e-book or the physical book + Udemy Coure.


 10% of the profit goes back to other campaigns.

My objective is to generate value. So I added a special feature. 10% of the book profit will be re-invested in crowdfunding campaigns. My special focus will be book projects. The idea is about gratefulness and we keep going to support people achieving their ideas.



You will get access to the Udemy course.

I am finishing (80% already recorded) the Future Value Generation Udemy course which is integrated in selected perks. Why? Because it is all about sharing, learning and interacting. The book and the course complement each other with exercises, ideas and reflections. You will gain lifelong access to the course which will run with a final market price of  USD 465.


A really Special Perks. Be grateful.

This might be one of the most special perks. You can thank someone in the book who really helped you achieve your professional goal, Your gratefulness will be part of the book in the digital and physical copies. BACK THIS PERK


Please. Please. Share-it!

Please share the campaign. I am thankful for any tweet, post and comment. I know how strong the Indiegogo community it is an honor to be part of it.  

  • I like it (tweet)
  • I am a backer (tweet)

Thank you!


Additional Information.

Please note that for the backers who live in countries where VAT and other import taxes apply, these additional fees are to be borne by the backer. I cannot be held liable for any extra fees applicable within individual countries. I appreciate your kind understanding.


How do I add Shipping? 

When you enter your shipping address, shipping is added.

Why is international shipping so expensive? 

There is double shipping involved. I will revive the books, autograph them and then send them out.

Where do I add my shipping address? 

You can add it when you contribute. 

The electronic version will be "protected". What does that mean? 

It means only people who purchased, it can view it.

story:
Story of My Book

Mid-term goals suck! You do not need mid-term goals; you just need one long term goal (or vision) and a series of short-term goals in order to achieve that end goal. Having short-term goals of about a year (or less) in length ensures that you have constant tangible targets to meet, which will keep you motivated enough to continue along the journey to achieving your end goal.

This applies to people and businesses alike. What is the point of placing 24 or 36 month targets in the forefront, when an ever changing work environment could lead to this going to waste? Several rounds of adjustments would have to be done on those goals every quarter just to blindly re-adjust to an already blind target. It is senseless!

In this book, I am going to show you how to move from the dreaming phase of a goal all the way up to achieving that goal and beyond.

What I Need

This book will be self-published and the pre-orders help me covering the costs of:

  • Editing & Proofreading
  • Graphics & Designing
  • Marketing & Promotion
  • Shipping books to the backers

What You Get

I am offering some exclusive rewards for people who backed me by pre-ordering my book:

  • Personally signed copy(ies) of the papaerback edition of my book
  • A personal thank you note for pre-ordering my book
  • Your name (and title, company name, ...) will appear in the Acknowledgements section of my book
  • The opportunity to review my manuscript and give me early feedback
  • Write a foreword for my book (including your name, title and company) for 10 people
  • Write on the back cover of my book (including name, title and company) for 1 person
  • Being invited to my launch ceremony
  • A 30 min in-depth talk about my book at your event 

The Timeline

About the Author

Mohsen Zargaran is a speaker, author and coach who started his journey long ago. Mohsen began his journey to becoming the self-help and inspirational coach that he is today by helping friends and colleagues who were seeking a better life. He spent countless hours being a shoulder upon which they could lay their burdens, and worked with them on finding positive solutions to their problems. He has always been of the mindset that self-awareness is of great importance. Learning about the laws that govern our universe paired with a willingness and openness to change, is the very first step to removing yourself from a place of mental suffering, and on to a place of happiness and fulfillment. Try as anyone may, unless the person in question is open to change, nothing anyone else does for them will matter.

As a seasoned business manager, Mohsen led a diverse range of people, across various corporate teams in multinational companies such as Samsung, Siemens and Nokia. He understands the power of personal transformation with all his being. Mohsen went through an emotionally devastating experience that, after two years, in April 2009 led to what he has termed: “a soul awakening,” thus beginning his journey into the man that he is today. Mohsen is passionate about sharing his experience with others and see people live happily without fear or stress.

Mohsen has long transformed his boring, stressful, gloomy, and hopeless life to one that is happy, peaceful, and passionate. No one should be down in the depths alone, and it is for that reason that he would love to share his experiences with everyone so that they can make the necessary transformations in their life.

You can reach him at mohsen@mohsenzargaran.com

Other Ways You Can Help

Please Share my Campaign on your social networks. Every single view counts and means a lot to me.

My Wish for My Book

My wish is for my book to reach millions of people and to help them change their lives for the better. I hope it plays a role in reconnecting them with their souls and reaching their goals. My aim is to help as many people live a life without stress and fear; to help them live limitlessly.

It is possible.

story:
The Story Behind the Idea

Like many young boys, I was infatuated with machines of all kinds - cars, planes, boats, and trains. The leading interest, however, was automobiles. At six I could identify most any vehicle on the road, sometimes even the year it was produced.

At age 13, with some help from my parents, I purchased a 1964 Chevrolet Corvair Monza, which I still have almost ten years later (along with an acquired 1968 model as well).

After writing children's books, I decided to write a car book. At first it started as a book with only supercars and hypercars. As I researched, I realized that the book was not unique compared with a flooded market of books about Ferrari's and Bugatti's. What followed was a massive project of listing and discovering sports cars, coupes, grand tourers (GT), supercars, and hypercars. My list grew into the thousands spanning cars from every corner of the globe. 

Due to the size and span of automobiles in my project, it will be published as a series of multiple editions of around 500 pages each. These editions will include: early GT and racing cars from Alfa Romeo, Jaguar, Ferrari, Mercedes, and Auto Union; Eccentric designs from Bugatti, Delahaye, Auburn, and Talbot Lago; American Muscle cars from AMC, Chrysler, GM, and Ford; Design concepts from Italdesign, Pininfarina, Touring, and Zagato; record setting supercars like the Jaguar XJ220, Bugatti Veyron, McLaren F1, and SSC Tuatara; rally cars like the Abarth 131, Ford RS Cosworth, and Audi Quattro; and many, many, more! 

This Campaign

This campaign is for my first Volume of the encyclopedia. The first edition will include cars beginning with the letter "A" from manufacturers like Abarth, AC, Alfa Romeo, Allard, AMC, Aston Martin, Audi, and many more. The book will be a 8.5" x 11.25" book in full color, with only a few black and white photos. Each page contains a large color photo, a brief history of the car, and technical specifications. The edition will be available in both paperback and hardcover copies. 

What you Get

By buying the book through this campaign, you will be getting it for less by buying it early. Since I will be buying copies directly from the printer to fulfill the perks on this campaign, I skip the distribution costs of selling through Amazon and other retailers, which allows me to pass the savings along to my backers on Indiegogo. I will also have a limited amount of signed copies available, still for less than the Amazon retail price.

Challenges

Since the book is not published, I am setting an August deadline to have the book in the publishing stage. However, sometimes formatting changes have to be made for printing, which can delay the process until revisions are made. Regardless, I am planning to stay as close to the August deadline as possible, and will update the campaign with progress reports. 

Legal Stuff

The photographs shown in this campaign, along with those in the book, are either used under a creative commons license or by direct permission from the copyright holder. The contents of the book, along with this campaign, are not endorsed by any photographer, manufacturer, or retailer and the opinions expressed therein are solely my own.

story:
Omvänt uppror

Tonåring och gift med en pashtun

Jag vill spela in min bok Omvänt uppror som ljudbok och ge ut den som E-bok. Den handlar om hur en stor kärlek vänds till en djupt olycklig pga religion, kultur och framförallt PATRIARKAT.

Jag vill berätta min historia om hur jag liftade till Pakistan och förälskade mig i en man från en hederskultur och hur de bästa avsikterna kan gå så fel och vad det beror på.

Jag vill  beskriva med empati hur en man kan ta sig rättigheten att kontrollera och slå en kvinna. Jag vill öka förståelsen för hur religion och kultur kan förstöra ett samhälle och en stor kärlek.

Tacksam för den hjälp jag får. Kanske tycker många att varför inte stödja något mer behjärtansvärt som tex LÄKARE UTAN GRÄNSER, och ja du har rätt, därför tänker jag skänka 10 % av de gåvor som kommer in till just Läkare utan gränser.

Jo, vi var unga, det var andra tider, men har så mycket förändrats, både ja och nej. Diskussionen om de patriarkala värderingarna inom religionerna är en viktig diskussion.

Jag är inte emot mångkultur eller islam, jag är emot förtryck av kvinnan, jag vill höja rösten utan att bli betraktad som islamofob.

Det finns mycket vackert inom tex inom den mystiska sufismen inom islam, men som det nu ser ut är sufismen oftast förbjuden. I namnet av religion, alla religioner sker förtryck.

Det fanns en tid före talibanernna, före de fundamentalistiska IS och det fanns en tid innan Ryssland invaderade Afghanistan. Det är den tiden jag pratar om, jag var 17 år och liftade genom Europa. Jag var religiöst lagd och sökare, jag var öppen för intryck. När jag träffade Shahid föll jag pladask. Detta handlar min första bok om.

Det är ett tidsdokument från 70-talet, vill du läsa den, vill du höra mig berätta? Kan du bidra med en valfri slant? Många bäckar små.

Själv lever jag min dröm, som konstnär och författare och pensionär, tacksam för den sponsring som kommer min väg. Ödmjukast och med välönskan, tack! För att bidra klicka på bilden, skrolla ner och finn rutan där du kan fylla i summan.

I augusti spelar jag in boken, med din hjälp, tack!

  • Jag vill publicera min bok digitalt och spela in den som ljudbok.
  • Genom att få ekonomisk hjälp kan jag som själv-publicerande författare nå ut med boken utan krånglig distribution, lagerhantering och kostnader som vida överstiger intäkterna.

Vill du kunna lyssna på min berättelse i bilen, på väg till jobbet, när du är ute går det kommer att bli en spännande och intressant resa. 

Vad som behövs

  • 6000 kr går till inspelning av boken, redigering och mastring. 1000 kr går till att lägga på den på portal som ljud respektive bok. Hon avser använda Ingram Spark, en plattform som levererar till Adlibris och Amazon med fler. 5000 kr går till designer för att lägga upp boken digitalt så att den kan laddas ner till dator, läsplatta och mobil.
  • Du får uppleva spänning, drama och en unik historia med självbiografiskt innehåll.
  • Om det blir för lite pengar här hoppas jag kunna finna bidrag från annat håll. 

Din påverkan

Jag vill berätta om hur det såg ut innan radikala militanta islamistiska rörelser började härja i Pakistan och Afghanistan, det enkla livet på landet men också de kulturella konflikter som gjorde denna kärlekshistoria omöjlig.

Boken översattes till engelska med hjälp av er här för några år sedan. 

  • MY BOOK IN ENGLISH: Uncommon Ground: Hippie to Hijab and Back – order in English!
    by Franciska von Koch
    Link: https://www.amazon.com/Uncommon-Ground-Hippie-Hijab-Back/dp/9188097749

Risker

Det finns inga ekonomiska risker men en önskan 

  • Att rösten håller.
  • Att du blir nöjd med resultatet

Om du inte har råd att hjälpa till ekonomiskt

Kanske du kan sprida den här informationen i alla fall.

  • Låt denna kampanj nå ut
  • OBS: Indiegogo har delningsverktyg!

Tack!

Tonåring och gift med en pashtun
Jag vill spela in min bok Omvänt uppror som ljudbok och ge ut den som E-bok. Den handlar om hur en stor kärlek vänds till en djupt olycklig pga religion, kultur och framförallt PATRIARKAT.
Jag vill berätta min historia om hur jag liftade till Pakistan och förälskade mig i en man från en hederskultur och hur de bästa avsikterna kan gå så fel och vad det beror på.

Jag vill  beskriva med empati hur en man kan ta sig rättigheten att kontrollera och slå en kvinna. Jag vill öka förståelsen för hur religion och kultur kan förstöra ett samhälle och en stor kärlek.
Tacksam för den hjälp jag får. Kanske tycker många att varför inte stödja något mer behjärtansvärt som tex LÄKARE UTAN GRÄNSER, och ja du har rätt, därför tänker jag skänka 10 % av de gåvor som kommer in till just Läkare utan gränser.
Jo, vi var unga, det var andra tider, men har så mycket förändrats, både ja och nej. Diskussionen om de patriarkala värderingarna inom religionerna är en viktig diskussion.
Jag är inte emot mångkultur eller islam, jag är emot förtryck av kvinnan, jag vill höja rösten utan att bli betraktad som islamofob.
Det finns mycket vackert inom tex inom den mystiska sufismen inom islam, men som det nu ser ut är sufismen oftast förbjuden. I namnet av religion, alla religioner sker förtryck.
Det fanns en tid före talibanernna, före de fundamentalistiska IS och det fanns en tid innan Ryssland invaderade Afghanistan. Det är den tiden jag pratar om, jag var 17 år och liftade genom Europa. Jag var religiöst lagd och sökare, jag var öppen för intryck. När jag träffade Shahid föll jag pladask. Detta handlar min första bok om.
Det är ett tidsdokument från 70-talet, vill du läsa den, vill du höra mig berätta? Kan du bidra med en valfri slant? Många bäckar små.

Själv lever jag min dröm, som konstnär och författare och pensionär, tacksam för den sponsring som kommer min väg. Ödmjukast och med välönskan, tack! För att bidra klicka på bilden, skrolla ner och finn rutan där du kan fylla i summan.
I augusti spelar jag in boken, med din hjälp, tack!

Jag vill publicera min bok digitalt och spela in den som ljudbok.
Genom att få ekonomisk hjälp kan jag som själv-publicerande författare nå ut med boken utan krånglig distribution, lagerhantering och kostnader som vida överstiger intäkterna.

Vill du kunna lyssna på min berättelse i bilen, på väg till jobbet, när du är ute går det kommer att bli en spännande och intressant resa. 

Vad som behövs

6000 kr går till inspelning av boken, redigering och mastring. 1000 kr går till att lägga på den på portal som ljud respektive bok. Hon avser använda Ingram Spark, en plattform som levererar till Adlibris och Amazon med fler. 5000 kr går till designer för att lägga upp boken digitalt så att den kan laddas ner till dator, läsplatta och mobil.
Du får uppleva spänning, drama och en unik historia med självbiografiskt innehåll.
Om det blir för lite pengar här hoppas jag kunna finna bidrag från annat håll. 



Din påverkan
Jag vill berätta om hur det såg ut innan radikala militanta islamistiska rörelser började härja i Pakistan och Afghanistan, det enkla livet på landet men också de kulturella konflikter som gjorde denna kärlekshistoria omöjlig.
Boken översattes till engelska med hjälp av er här för några år sedan. 
MY BOOK IN ENGLISH: Uncommon Ground: Hippie to Hijab and Back – order in English!by Franciska von KochLink: https://www.amazon.com/Uncommon-Ground-Hippie-Hijab-Back/dp/9188097749


Risker
Det finns inga ekonomiska risker men en önskan 

Att rösten håller.
Att du blir nöjd med resultatet


Om du inte har råd att hjälpa till ekonomiskt
Kanske du kan sprida den här informationen i alla fall.

Låt denna kampanj nå ut
OBS: Indiegogo har delningsverktyg!

Tack!

story:
Short Summary

Teachers, homeschoolers and kids have embraced what we are doing, and we are grateful for that.   We are excited that grandparents are starting to reunite and reconnect with their grandchildren; and what better way to do that then with a brand new picture book from Happy Valley Publishers.

Our second children's picture book, ELEPHANT GLUE is ready to go, layout is done and sent to printer.  We will get proofs back in July to correct and/or approve. We should have finished books back from printer in November to ship to our backers just in time for Christmas.

Our first picture book, HEAR WHAT'S HERE, introduced children to the concept of homonyms and specifically homophones.  We are confident kids, educators and families will like ELEPHANT GLUE too.  (See comments from actual kids in the "What Are People Saying About ELEPHANT GLUE?" section and video of 9 year old, Drue, reading the book to her siblings below.) 

You can get both books via this Indiegogo campaign (see the "Double Dipper Deal"), and additional copies via add-ons.

This is a mockup. Final cover art may vary from above.

 

By the way, we want to give major thanks to the people during our last campaign who bought multiple books and who, we later found, gave some of the extra copies to schools and libraries. People are good and good people are wonderful.

 

 

Yes, just in time to make wonderful Christmas/Holiday gifts!

 

Our Commitment

We have a track record of delivering quality products that have sold in stores and online all over the world. We will do this right – hard cover, full color, picture book.  Our last children’s picture book was a well received, quality product.  We are doing all we can to keep Elephant Glue as affordable as possible for parents and grandparents. We know picture books are selling for a lot these days.  We understand the economics of it all, however, we want to keep the price for Elephant Glue as low as possible. You can get Elephant Glue for a great rewards price when you pledge today.

** We apologize shipping costs are so high outside the US. There is no “media rates” shipping outside the US.

Inside the US the media rates are quite reasonable.

 

Risks & Challenges

This is our second children's book, and we've learned a lot from the first time. The artwork is done and the story is complete. However, we still have many steps after the completion of the campaign (which is normal in a process like this). We have factored those into the timeline to help reduce delays. The biggest risk to the project is COVID. We've raised our concerns with our manufacturer and they've assured us that our timeline is reasonable and very achievable. That said, if there are any delays due to COVID or weather, we are committed to giving timely updates to keep you in the know. Hear What's Here was our first book. You can check out the progress of that project and the success we had in fulfillment.

story:
Because this is a children's book it is important for kids of all ages to be able to enjoy the book without damaging it. Hitting the funding goal of $4900 will allow a first run of books that includes board books for toddlers and babies, paperback books for younger children, and hardbacks for older children and adults to enjoy. $4900 includes the cost of manufacture, delivery, and storage of the first run of books.

If we do not reach the funding goal, then we either have to try again or shelf the project. When I took the initial pre-orders, I was only able to get five sales. The price of printing 5 paperback books was $17-25, and I can't sell the books at $10 at prices like that. I opted for all or nothing funding because it is hard to make these books happen without hitting a certain number of sales. If we don't make the full goal, your money will be returned to you.

But, let's try really hard to make that not be the case! Funding of this goal means the ability to provide lots of donation books for schools and children's programs. 

I wanted to be able to offer a few different options of books, as I explained above:

Children's Board Book:

6.5 inches x 6.5 inches. Thick Card book with gloss pages. These are the really hard books that tend to be aimed towards small children because of how durable they are. The pages are super thick so they won't be ripped, and slobber can be wiped off of them fairly easily!

 

Paperback Book:

8 inches x 8 inches. ~16 pages, made for slightly older children. This book option is more economic than the hardback, and allows more copies of the books to be donated. 

 

Hardcover Book:

10 inches by 10 inches. ~16 pages. This book is aimed towards older children, but would be lovely for an adult to use for bedtime stories. It is also good for people who want the book to have personally--I have quite a few "children's books" in my personal collection! The hardcover books are in better shape, of course. Which might be important to consider if you plan to keep this book for a long time. 

Signed giclee prints:

Because I am an artist first, my primary concern was that the paintings were moving and beautiful. I am proud to say that I created one of my favorite pieces that I've ever made. I go back and forth, but it is in my top 3 pieces of all time! My Little Girl is that print. I have picked two other prints from the book as well, "For Always," and "She's Mine Pt.2" (named after the heartfelt song of the same title by J. Cole). Giclees are acid-free archival quality prints, printed on acid free watercolor paper with acid free ink. The color quality can last for 300 years, and they make wonderful gifts! The prints have a one inch border and are 24 inches by 12 inches. 

The goal is for everyone to be able to enjoy the art in these books as well, which is why there are prints available!

The objective is to get this book in as many hands as possible. 

If you can purchase a copy for yourself, that is great! If you can purchase copies for friends and families, that is awesome too! If you can purchase one of the gift classroom sets, that is so awesome for SO many people! The current plan is for classroom sets to be donated to teachers as well as school libraries, but in the event that there are logistical hurdles to that (such as policies for approving books) the focus will be on after school programs and daycare centers. Basically, the places where kids have lots of downtime to actually become immersed in books! The goal, too, is to also be able to get copies of the book into the hands of people who can't afford them. In order for these books to make an impact on a child's life, they have to actually make it into their hands!

Please spread the word about this campaign. And keep your eye out for future publications from Chromata. This is the first book, but it most certainly won't be the last!

 

Thanks for making it this far! My name is Dare Coulter, and I'm an artist, sculptor, and muralist. I work in a wide range of mediums, although my most frequently used are spraypaint, acrylic, graphite, and ceramic. I graduated from North Carolina State University's College of Design in December 2011 with a Bachelor's of Art + Design, and have been working as an artist ever since! My first full solo exhibition was in March 2016 at the African American Cultural center at NC State, and life has been spinning!  If you want to keep up with me and my art, follow my facebook page at www.facebook.com/DareArt or follow me on Instagram at @DareCoulter
